Review: Waktu sampai sekitar sebelum Maghrib, barisan belum panjang, tetapi di sini ada disediakan surau, jangan risau. â€¦
English Review: When it arrives around before dusk, the line is not long, but here is a surau, don't worry.â € ¦

Review: Streamline food ordering, fast moving lane.  Self service. Spacious dining area, can pay extra for AC space. Food is above average. Took chicken, cockles, squid with a syrup drink is RM 22. You can get free filter water at the hand wash â€¦

Review: Their nasi lemak tasted normal. â€¦
English Review: Their nasi lemak tasted normal. â€¦

Review: Had this famous nasi Lemak for breakfast today. Came at 8:30am (public holiday today). It was open and already half full. There was a que but it was moving fast, thanks to ordering process. â€¦
English Review: Had this famous nasi Lemak for breakfast today. Came at 8:30am (public holiday today). It was open and already half full. There was a que but it was moving fast, thanks to ordering process. â€¦

Review: Serving only nasi lemak, this huge restaurant offers various sides, fruit juices/smoothies, and dessert. There are 2 lines for either dining in or take out. Portions were not too big and the food was delicious. Lots of workers and plenty of â€¦
English Review: Serving only nasi lemak, this huge restaurant offers various sides, fruit juices/smoothies, and dessert. There are 2 lines for either dining in or take out. Portions were not too big and the food was delicious. Lots of workers and plenty of â€¦

Review: While I was recommend over to this place by a friend, I gotta say as a nasi lemak specialty place, I'd had expected a little more flare from the taste and overall presentation. Whilst the food had not amazed me much (since I'm Malaysian â€¦
English Review: While I was recommend over to this place by a friend, I gotta say as a nasi lemak specialty place, I'd had expected a little more flare from the taste and overall presentation. Whilst the food had not amazed me much (since I'm Malaysian â€¦

Review: Spacious and clean, with several staff waiting to clear the tables for the next group of diners.They upheld a reputation in Kampung Baru for decades, with many fans who swear â€¦
English Review: Spacious and clean, with several staff waiting to clear the tables for the next group of diners.They upheld a reputation in Kampung Baru for decades, with many fans who swear â€¦

Review: Delicious nasi lemak with plenty of side dishes. As expected due to their popularity the price is higher than regular nasi lemak. Cleanliness seems ok. Service was also friendly. Donâ€™t know what the bad service criticisms are about. Either they had bad luck or some competitors trying to give bad remarks about them.
English Review: Delicious nasi lemak with plenty of side dishes. As expected due to their popularity the price is higher than regular nasi lemak. Cleanliness seems ok. Service was also friendly. Donâ€™t know what the bad service criticisms are about. Either they had bad luck or some competitors trying to give bad remarks about them.

Review: Saya jenis makan nasi portion mmg sikit, satu nasi lemak sllu susah nk habis, yg ni sikit sangat sangat portion nya terkejut pulakðŸ˜… (nampk dlm gmbr je byk tu sbb dia lenyekkan) â€¦
English Review: I'm the type of person who eats small portions of nasi, one nasi lemak is always hard to finish, this one is very small portion

Review: There was already a queue when I arrived for breakfast today. A queue for dine in and another for take away. It was quite systematic and it didn't take too long for my turn. We added the chicken rendang and the sambal sotong each on top of â€¦
English Review: There was already a queue when I arrived for breakfast today. A queue for dine in and another for take away. It was quite systematic and it didn't take too long for my turn. We added the chicken rendang and the sambal sotong each on top of â€¦

Review: Food was very good and offer a good variety of dishes. I like the way they sell their food, you can see what you want and ask them to add it to your plate. Price are right. The natural fruit juices were very good and it is a big cup! Love â€¦
English Review: Food was very good and offer a good variety of dishes. I like the way they sell their food, you can see what you want and ask them to add it to your plate. Price are right. The natural fruit juices were very good and it is a big cup! Love â€¦

Review: I like the atmosphere here. It was clean, bright, and spacious.Staff was smiley,  friendly, and helpful. â€¦
English Review: I like the atmosphere here. It was clean, bright, and spacious.Staff was smiley,  friendly, and helpful. â€¦

Review: Nasi lemak taste good, offer alot of varieties and the counter service is fast. They also seperate lanes for dine-in and take away. Got to try the fruit juice, very refreshing and tasty. Alot of private parking nearby.
English Review: Nasi lemak taste good, offer alot of varieties and the counter service is fast. They also seperate lanes for dine-in and take away. Got to try the fruit juice, very refreshing and tasty. Alot of private parking nearby.

Review: A great reputation as one of the best Nasi Lemak is undisputed. Thou not many choices but each item is done to perfection. Highly recommend the Ayam Goreng. A+
English Review: A great reputation as one of the best Nasi Lemak is undisputed. Thou not many choices but each item is done to perfection. Highly recommend the Ayam Goreng. A+

Review: The Nasi Lemak Egg + Fried Beef Lung is delicious.  Recommended.  If you visit Kuala Lumpur, make time to stop for dinner at Nasi Lemak Wanjo in Kampung Baru.
English Review: The Nasi Lemak Egg + Fried Beef Lung is delicious.  Recommended.  If you visit Kuala Lumpur, make time to stop for dinner at Nasi Lemak Wanjo in Kampung Baru.

Review: Wanjo Kampung Bharu is specialized in Nasi Lemak. They have a large variety to choose from and the staff is very helpful in explaining the various options. â€¦
English Review: Wanjo Kampung Bharu is specialized in Nasi Lemak. They have a large variety to choose from and the staff is very helpful in explaining the various options. â€¦

Review: Love the food and smoothies here! Went there two times. The avocado and chocolate smoothie (9MYR) is tasty and filling.Asked the locals to recommend me a variation of Nasi Lemak plate. Whatever she â€¦
English Review: Love the food and smoothies here! Went there two times. The avocado and chocolate smoothie (9MYR) is tasty and filling.

Review: Located at Kampung baru, lots of people need to que, can select from whole bunch of dishes, nasi lemak sangatlah sikit, small portion, ayam goreng good, sambal sotong and sambal nasi lemak was nice, if want to eat there with better â€¦
English Review: Located at Kampung baru, lots of people need to que, can select from whole bunch of dishes, nasi lemak is small portion, ayam goreng good, sambal sotong and sambal nasi lemak was nice

Review: Average Nasi lemak. They attract quite a crowd and Iâ€™ve heard good things about them. Went to try it and just felt the taste and all were just okay. Can get equal or better tasting ones elsewhere.
English Review: Average Nasi lemak. They attract quite a crowd and I have heard good things about them. Went to try it and just felt the taste and all were just okay. Can get equal or better tasting ones elsewhere.

Review: Nasi lemak sikit je tapi condiment je banyak..mcm takpuas makan tambah nasi lemak kosong ..dengan ayam goreng dan rendang ayam sedap..harga tak berapa sesuai  la dgn makanan yg diberi anyway ok to try
English Review: Nasi lemak is a little portion but there is a lot of condiments.. I'm not satisfied with plain nasi lemak.. with fried chicken and chicken rendang is delicious.. the price doesn't match the food given anyway ok to try

Review: The queue is long but they work quite fast. Waiting time is short.As for the food, it's one of the best nasi lemak I've had, except that the fried chicken was a bit dry. â€¦
English Review: The queue is long but they work quite fast. Waiting time is short.As for the food, it's one of the best nasi lemak I've had, except that the fried chicken was a bit dry. â€¦

Review: Restaurant is bright, looks welcoming.Food is alright. Sambal is a lil bit sweet. Always get the begedil & lauk limpa here.
English Review: Restaurant is bright, looks welcoming.Food is alright. Sambal is a little bit sweet. Always get the begedil & lauk limpa here.

Review: It's delicious, but not mind-blowing. However, the portion size is adequate as the rice isn't too much. Unfortunately, the price is a bit expensive, perhaps due to its location in a tourist area. When dining here, there's no need to order drinks as they provide a complimentary water dispenser. The Ayam Masak Merah is tasty and tender!
English Review: It's delicious, but not mind-blowing. However, the portion size is adequate as the rice isn't too much. Unfortunately, the price is a bit expensive, perhaps due to its location in a tourist area. When dining here, there's no need to order drinks as they provide a complimentary water dispenser. The Ayam Masak Merah is tasty and tender!

Review: The crowd keep coming in...look like the queue just keep going ...many varieties, food not bad, sambal is slightly sweet and not hot. Paru is nice, sotong also ok. Mango smoothie is good, orange juice just normal. Need to pay RM1 to sit in air-cond room. Nowadays, nasi lemak also not cheap...quite pricey.
English Review: The crowd keep coming in...look like the queue just keep going ...many varieties, food not bad, sambal is slightly sweet and not hot. Paru is nice, sotong also ok. Mango smoothie is good, orange juice just normal. Need to pay RM1 to sit in air-cond room. Nowadays, nasi lemak also not cheap...quite pricey.

Review: Tempat makan selesa. Aroma nasi agak unik. Pilihan lauk yang banyak. Harga jangan citer...
English Review: Comfortable dining area.The aroma of rice is quite unique.A lot of side dishes.Pricey

Review: Nasi lemak is good. Lauk sedap. Sambal agak manis. Pilihan lauk need more varities. Great family place but not during peak hours. I super love the mango smoothies. Pricing for nasi lemak is on the high side but for smoothies its great value.
English Review: Nasi lemak is good. The side dishes are tasty. The sambal is somewhat sweet. There should be more variety in the choice of side dishes. It's a great family place, but not during peak hours. I super love the mango smoothies. The pricing for nasi lemak is on the high side, but for smoothies, it's great value

Review: So we arrived around 10.30am. The queue was long but moves very fast. 100 for the service. We really love their rendang daging and sambal kerang. The freshly made avocado + mango smoothies were really good too! Parking was quite hard to â€¦
English Review: So we arrived around 10.30am. The queue was long but moves very fast. 100 for the service. We really love their rendang daging and sambal kerang. The freshly made avocado + mango smoothies were really good too! Parking was quite hard to find â€¦

Review: If you want good, affordable, Malaysian Food, you have come to the right place.After walking for at least 25 minutes from where I stay, I found this gem of a â€¦
English Review: If you want good, affordable, Malaysian Food, you have come to the right place.After walking for at least 25 minutes from where I stay, I found this great Nasi Lemak â€¦

Review: Nasi dia sedap. Boleh rasa lemak. Tp sambal biasa2 je. Mcm kurang masak pun ye. Paru sedap, ayam goreng berempah tu ok ok je. Sambal sotong pn ok ok je. Total makanan kitorang ni without air RM24.70. A bit overpriced utk rasa ok ok tu. Overall 3/5.
English Review: The rice is delicious. You can taste the richness, but the sambal is just average. It seems a bit undercooked. The lungs are tasty, and the fried spiced chicken is okay. The squid sambal is also just okay. The total cost of our food, without drinks, is RM24.70. It's a bit overpriced for an okay taste. Overall, 3 out of 5

Review: For all Food Hunter or Food Lovers. Here is the perfect place to taste "Taste of Malaysia's Nasi Lemak". A bit expensive but worth the money you spent.
English Review: For all Food Hunter or Food Lovers. Here is the perfect place to taste "Taste of Malaysia's Nasi Lemak". A bit expensive but worth the money you spent.

Review: Iâ€™d have to say nasi lemak angah is still my top nasi lemak. This is my first time in this infamous place but I have it a four because of how organised and how clean this place is, you can also park your car in front for a modest fee of rm5 â€¦
English Review: I had have to say nasi lemak angah is still my top nasi lemak. This is my first time in this infamous place but I have it a four because of how organised and how clean this place is, you can also park your car in front for rm5 â€¦

Review: Reasonable price, big shop with lots of tables. Really busy place especially the Saturday night 9pm I went.The line moved very quick, the sambal was delicious and so was the chicken. The â€¦
English Review: Reasonable price, big shop with lots of tables. Really busy place especially the Saturday night 9pm I went.The line moved very quick, the sambal was delicious and so was the chicken. The â€¦

Review: 1st time dtg sini utk breakfast 9am hari weekday ok tak terlalu ramai org...lauk byk.saya order nasi lemak lauk kerang sambal , ayam msk merah...kerang nye pedas â€¦
English Review: First time coming here for breakfast at 9 am on a weekday, it's okay, not too crowded. There are many dishes. I ordered nasi lemak with cockle sambal and red-cooked chicken. The cockle sambal is spicy.

Review: Nasi lembut dimasak cantik, wangi & berasa lemak santan. Sambal kerang sedap cuma sedikit masin . Portion banyak. Kedai femes kan, harga pun agak kencang. Service laju, kedai bersih . Overall nice ðŸ‘ â€¦
English Review: The rice is cooked beautifully, fragrant, and has a rich coconut milk flavor. The cockle sambal is delicious but slightly salty. The portion is generous. The shop is famous, and the prices are a bit on the high side. The service is fast, and the shop is clean. Overall, it's nice! ??

Review: For RM29.40, I got 2 nasi lemak ayam, a tempe, ice Milo and coffee. This store gone viral and my wife thought that the food must be good. Well, I think it's over hyped. I went to it today. The rice tasted more like ordinary rice rather than â€¦
English Review: For RM29.40, I got 2 nasi lemak ayam, a tempe, ice Milo and coffee. This store gone viral and my wife thought that the food must be good. Well, I think it's over hyped. I went to it today. The rice tasted more like ordinary rice rather than nasi lemak â€¦

Review: Ni 1st time dpt makan kat sini selama ni x dpt g sbb setiap kali pergi xde parking.. alhamdulillah mlm td ada lah parking berdekatan.. so gagahkan jugalah.. berbaloi pergi..
English Review: This is the first time I got to eat here. Until now, I couldn't go because every time I went, there was no parking. Tonight there was nearby parking, so I dared to go. It was worth it."

Review: One of the better places for nasi lemak in the city. Access to it is made easier with the lrt, and you can also check out the Saloma tunnel after dinner, which overlooks the Twin Towers. Great for tourists.
English Review: One of the better places for nasi lemak in the city. Access to it is made easier with the lrt, and you can also check out the Saloma tunnel after dinner, which overlooks the Twin Towers. Great for tourists.

Review: Do you enjoy eating in a sauna? Because this is what it feels like. The whole place has absolutely horrendous airflow. It's clear that there was no consideration for ventilation when the structure was built. No roof ventilators, no air circulator, no air coolers, only small fans mounted on the ceiling.
English Review: Do you enjoy eating in a sauna? Because this is what it feels like. The whole place has absolutely horrendous airflow. It's clear that there was no consideration for ventilation when the structure was built. No roof ventilators, no air circulator, no air coolers, only small fans mounted on the ceiling.

Review: âœ…Nasi lemak sambal okay ada pedas manis balance.jus tembikai okay tpi still agak manis sedikit.ayam goreng berempah sedap â€¦
English Review: Nasi lemak with sambal is good; it has a balanced sweet and spicy taste. The watermelon juice is okay but still a bit sweet. The spiced fried chicken is tasty.

Review: Dekat sini saya ambil nasi lemak tambah ayam rendang complete sambal, kacang, and ikan bilis semua RM11. 90, memang sedap.
English Review: I ordered nasi lemak here with additional chicken rendang, complete with sambal, peanuts, and anchovies, all for RM11.90. It's really delicious

Review: Sauces are good. Sambal was spicy and flavorful. There is a Coway water dispenser if you don't fancy any drinks. Tables are cleared very quickly and systematically. Place has very good ventilation and seating places. The fried chicken can be better. Rendang chicken is memang sedap!!! Fruit juices seem reasonably priced.
English Review: Sauces are good. Sambal was spicy and flavorful. There is a Coway water dispenser if you don't fancy any drinks. Tables are cleared very quickly and systematically. Place has very good ventilation and seating places. The fried chicken can be better. Rendang chicken very delicious!!! Fruit juices seem reasonably priced.

Review: Very good place to get Malaysian Nasi Lemak.. Plenty of dishes available to choose with the Nasi Lemak.. QR code is now accepted.. â€¦
English Review: Very good place to get Malaysian Nasi Lemak.. Plenty of dishes available to choose with the Nasi Lemak.. QR code is now accepted.. â€¦

Review: Semua ok. Layanan pun baik. Bagus nya ada pilihan, kalau x nak bayau rm 1 utk duduk air cond, boleh duduk luar. Apa2 pun yg penting bersih ðŸ‘ðŸ» teratur âœ¨ï¸ â€¦
English Review: It's all ok.The service is good.It's good to have a choice, if dont want pay for RM 1 to sit in the air cond, you can sit outside.The important is the place is clean.

Review: The third time coming back to show my friends from Vietnam their nasi lemakThey have ayam goreng, ayam rendang, beef rendang, seafoodâ€¦ all tastes so so good.And the fresh juice shop is just as good as they have been.Affordable price and authentic tasteI hope more foreigners know about Kampung Baru and can try the real Malaysian food here
English Review: The third time I came back to introduce my friends from Vietnam to nasi lemak. They have ayam goreng, ayam rendang, beef rendang, seafood... all taste so good. The fresh juice shop is just as excellent as it has always been. Affordable prices and authentic taste. I hope more foreigners get to know about Kampung Baru and can try the real Malaysian food here.

Review: Nasi Lemak Wanjo is a renowned restaurant in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia that specializes in the dish known as nasi lemak, a popular Malaysian dish that is considered a national favorite. â€¦
English Review: Nasi Lemak Wanjo is a renowned restaurant in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia that specializes in the dish known as nasi lemak, a popular Malaysian dish that is considered a national favorite. â€¦

Review: Was recommended by a Malaysian friend who told me about this place when I mentioned Village Park nasi lemak (a popular haunt for Singaporeans). Food did not disappoint. The rice was less flavorful that Village Park but the other dishes were pretty flavorful. Sambal was sweet and rich - love it! A little on the pricier side though
English Review: Was recommended by a Malaysian friend who told me about this place when I mentioned Village Park nasi lemak (a popular haunt for Singaporeans). Food did not disappoint. The rice was less flavorful that Village Park but the other dishes were pretty flavorful. Sambal was sweet and rich - love it! A little on the pricier side though

Review: Absolutely superb nasi lemak. Pure and original taste, super decadent flavours. I ordered the chicken renang, and it was awesome!! great blend of spice and flavour! â€¦
English Review: Absolutely superb nasi lemak. Pure and original taste, super decadent flavours. I ordered the chicken rendang, and it was awesome!! great blend of spice and flavour! â€¦

Review: Very popular place, it seems.  I tried the Nasi Lemak Ayam Rendang.  The chicken is very tender and tasty. My American friend tried the Nasi Lemak Daging Rendang a d the beef is very tender and done well .... not chewy at all. All in all, a good place for food.
English Review: Very popular place, it seems.  I tried the Nasi Lemak Ayam Rendang.  The chicken is very tender and tasty. My American friend tried the Nasi Lemak Daging Rendang and the beef is very tender and done well .... not chewy at all. A good place for food.

Review: Have both aircon n non-aurcon sheltered dining area. Very clean. Double wow! for their nasi lemak. Dishes and side dishes have good balanced flavors. Must try food in KL. â€¦
English Review: Have both aircond and non-aircond sheltered dining area. Very clean. Double wow! for their nasi lemak. Dishes and side dishes have good balanced flavors. Must try food in KL. â€¦

Review: Beautiful food here had a great experience here with the family. The venue is clean and very organised.
English Review: Beautiful food here had a great experience here with the family. The venue is clean and very organised.

Review: Fast service. Good food. Nasi lemak sedap that you can find in KL. If got more choices that would be great.
English Review: Fast service. Good food. Nasi lemak is delicious you can find it in KL. If got more choices that would be great.

Review: nasi lemak sedap.. pagi2 xthu nk mkn apa leh terjah mkn sni.. kyg smpai ke ptg sbb portoin nasi dia bnyak
English Review: The nasi lemak is delicious. In the morning, when I don't know what to eat, I can come here. It's satisfying until the evening because the portion of rice is generous.

Review: Nasi Lemak Wanjo Kampung Baru adalah nasi lemak yang cukup digemari oleh orang-orang terutama di kawasan Kampung Baru dan sekitarnya. Nasi lemak ini dihidangkan dengan hidangan sampingan yang banyak. Dalam satu hidangan nasi lemak and boleh â€¦
English Review: Nasi Lemak Wanjo Kampung Baru is a highly popular nasi lemak, especially in the Kampung Baru area and its surroundings. This nasi lemak is served with a variety of side dishes

Review: Overall taste is good, common nasi lemak. No special dishes.Food Presentation - style nasi campur.Large eating space. Self service.
English Review: The overall taste is good, but it's a standard nasi lemak with no special dishes. The food presentation is in the style of nasi campur. There is ample dining space, and it's a self-service setup

Review: The food, too much happening in my plate. I couldn't really review the food. Location is at the centre of KL superb. The premise is spacious. There are air-conditioned section. The ambiance is a busy happening place to eat for breakfast and lunch.
English Review: The food had too much happening on my plate, making it difficult to review. The location in the center of KL is superb. The premises are spacious, with an air-conditioned section. The ambiance is bustling, making it a popular spot for breakfast and lunch.

Review: Not the best but surely not as bad as what the locals had be taunting endlessly. Love the variation of the side dishes. Some I would consider unique too. Will for sure come again and bring my international friends here.
English Review: Not the best but surely not as bad as what the locals had be taunting endlessly. Love the variation of the side dishes. Some I would consider unique too. Will for sure come again and bring my international friends here.

Review: Parking is hassle & need to be patience. Packed with ppl even at night. Their nasi lemak is good but only the rice portion is a bit small for adult. It could be more better if they can improve on that part. The place are clean and spacious! outside the shop got pakcik selling jagung bakar (corn). Must try his corn too! <3
English Review: Parking is hassle & need to be patience. Packed with people even at night. Their nasi lemak is good but only the rice portion is a bit small for adults. It would be better if they could improve on that part. The place is clean and spacious!

Review: Service cepat, agak panas, sambal dan nasi sedap. Ayam goreng dan rendang agak kering. Tambah nasi, tapi macam xde tambahan. Tambah nasi rm1.60..
English Review: Fast service, somewhat hot, tasty sambal and rice. The fried chicken and rendang are a bit dry. Added rice, but it seems like there's no extra. Added rice for RM1.60

Review: Big, large space. Room wt aircon pay RM1.00. Cooling inside since next to roadside. Nearly fullhse. Hot serve nasi lemak. Add-in gravy wt extea cast. Got chicken fried, curry, masak merah, sambal sotong, kerang, bagedil n paru. Hot & cool drink also have
English Review: Big, spacious area. Air-conditioned room requires an additional RM1.00. It's cool inside as it is next to the roadside. Almost full house. Nasi lemak is served hot. Additional gravy comes with an extra cost. There are options like fried chicken, curry, masak merah, sambal sotong, kerang, bagedil, and paru. Hot and cold drinks are also available.

Review: The nasi lemak is lemak! Sauce is plenty!! Def has to exercise more after the sumptuous meal. There's an aircon section that u can dine. Just pay some extra ringgit to enjoy the ac
English Review: The nasi lemak is rich and flavorful! The sauce is abundant!! Definitely need to exercise more after such a sumptuous meal. There's an air-conditioned section where you can dine. Just pay a little extra to enjoy the AC

Review: Awesome place for real authentic Nasi Lemak. If you are finicky about your plate please be alert because the serving ladies are super fast. Let them know what you want with a smile and they will help you out. I asked for no anchovies, a â€¦
English Review: Awesome place for real authentic Nasi Lemak. If you are finicky about your plate please be alert because the serving ladies are super fast. Let them know what you want with a smile and they will help you out. I asked for no anchovies â€¦

Review: The true definition of authentic nasi lemak! Highly recommended and amazing service too. It is located in a great place too, Kampung Bahru where there are amazing food options too and very cultural spot. A little on the pricey side but really worth it.
English Review: The true definition of authentic nasi lemak! Highly recommended and amazing service too. It is located in a great place too, Kampung Bahru where there are amazing food options too and very cultural spot. A little on the pricey side but really worth it.

Review: Fast & efficient service. The nasi lemak was quite good. The rice was fragrant and while the sambal could be thicker, it tasted fine. Overall, would repeat!
English Review: Fast & efficient service. The nasi lemak was quite good. The rice was fragrant and while the sambal could be thicker, it tasted fine. Overall, would repeat!

Review: Xpenah xpenuh bila dtg. Jika dh penah smp, tahniah! Tu bermakna anda telah berjaya struggle cari parking dan beratur pnjgðŸ˜‹. â€¦
English Review: Never not full when coming. If you've managed to arrive, congratulations! It means you've successfully struggled to find parking and endured long queues.

Review: Amazingly super clean restaurant environment. The Nasi Lemak not too bad. I wish the nasi lemak will have more lemak taste / feel. Sambal kerang is good.
English Review: Amazingly super clean restaurant environment. The Nasi Lemak not too bad. I wish the nasi lemak will have more lemak taste / feel. Sambal kerang is good.

Review: Delicious nasi lemak here, rendang chicken is yummy , ayam merah is good also . Can be crowded with queue but the line moves fast .
English Review: Amazingly super clean restaurant environment. The Nasi Lemak is not too bad. I wish the Nasi Lemak had more 'lemak' taste/feel. The cockle sambal is good

Review: Nasi lemak kerang. Nice nasi lemak. Even long que but the services still awesome. Very recommended. Only limited parking space. Please do try avacado juice blended.
English Review: Nasi lemak kerang. Nice nasi lemak. Even long que but the services still awesome. Very recommended. Only limited parking space. Please do try avacado juice blended.

Review: The place was okay but the food were underwhelming. As a tourist it did not appeal to me and did not showcase the cuisine of malaysia. we ate here because our guide told us we could find nasi lemak and mee goreng here but as stated above, the nasi lemak was underwhelming and there was no mee goreng in sight
English Review: The place was okay but the food were underwhelming. As a tourist it did not appeal to me and did not showcase the cuisine of malaysia. we ate here because our guide told us we could find nasi lemak and mee goreng here but as stated above, the nasi lemak was underwhelming and there was no mee goreng in sight

Review: The Nasi Lemak is descent and at a reasonable price bracket compared to other famous brands. The place can get too crowded especially during meal time but the good thing is that the service is quite fast.
English Review: The Nasi Lemak is descent and at a reasonable price bracket compared to other famous brands. The place can get too crowded especially during meal time but the good thing is that the service is quite fast.

Review: Been here multiple times, and I think Wanjo Nasi Lemak would taste good for the tourists kot. The price is also not local at all. It has been commercialised; the pedas, the santan, the manis. Siapa tak pernah dtg, maybe boleh dtg but dont â€¦
English Review: I've been here multiple times, and I think Wanjo Nasi Lemak would taste good for tourists, perhaps. The price is also not local at all. It has been commercialized; the spiciness, the coconut milk, the sweetness. For those who have never been, maybe you can come, but don't expect too much

Review: Okeylah untuk selera orang bandar. I'm not sure if they have changed the chef but taste slightly different.
English Review: Okay for urban taste. I'm not sure if they have changed the chef, but the taste is slightly different

Review: First time visiting Kuala Lumpur. Have eaten here for 3 days in a row. Delicious fresh food, affordable prices, friendly and helpful staff and the establishment is immaculately clean. Would definitely recommend!
English Review: First time visiting Kuala Lumpur. Have eaten here for 3 days in a row. Delicious fresh food, affordable prices, friendly and helpful staff and the establishment is immaculately clean. Would definitely recommend!

Review: Even tho the queue is long, it gets cleared fast. Staff is efficient and food is amazing! Nasi Lemak is flavorful, can really taste the coconut. Other side dishes are also amazing! Will definitely come again.
English Review: Even though the queue is long, it gets cleared fast. The staff is efficient and the food is amazing! Nasi Lemak is flavorful, can taste the coconut. Other side dishes are also amazing! Will come again.

Review: Average nasi lemak! I've been staying in Kuala Lumpur for the past 8 years, and this is my first time visiting here. I've heard countless recommendations from friends about Wanjo, and their reviews were overwhelmingly positive. However, â€¦
English Review: Average nasi lemak! I've been staying in Kuala Lumpur for the past 8 years, and this is my first time visiting here. I've heard countless recommendations from friends about Wanjo, and their reviews were overwhelmingly positive.

Review: The food was good, but the price too pricy. Even the rice we received was too little. Serious, the rice wasnt enough for 1 portion, and i had to add more rice and it charged rm1.60. It's fine, and the beef i received only 1 pieces and they cut? Not worth it with rm11 bro. Even the drinks too expensive.
English Review: The food was good, but the prices were too high. Even the rice portion was too small. Seriously, the rice wasn't enough for one serving, and I had to add more, which cost RM1.60. It's fine, but I only received one piece of beef, and they cut it? Not worth it for RM11, bro. Even the drinks were too expensive.

Review: Worth it! I bought it back from restaurant which is ramadan period and the taste is still good. I was so full but after I tasted it, I couldn't stop eating. I do recommend to come and try. Sambal is very delicious. I also buy it back to my country. The menu I like is chilly cram.
English Review: Worth it! I bought it back from restaurant which is ramadan period and the taste is still good. I was so full but after I tasted it, I couldn't stop eating. I do recommend to come and try. Sambal is very delicious. I also buy it back to my country. The menu I like is chilly cram.

Review: Their nasi lemak is delicious and very filling. I also tried their Teh Tarik, Milo, and, mango smoothie. Everything was incredible. The smoothie had the perfect amount of sweetness and was not watery. Their pricing is very good. There are â€¦

Review: best nasi lemak iâ€™ve ever had. the rice was so fragrant, must add the perkedel â¤ï¸

Review: Sambal was way too sweet might as well eat nasi lemak with sugar. I love the â€˜teh o ais limauâ€™ only . Kbye

Review: Oh man, where to even start!This here is hands down where you are going to find the best nasi lemak in the city! The people are extremely nice and the customer service is amazing!They have many different kinds of chicken and they also make incredible smoothies! I recommend trying the mango smoothie, as it gets served with many mango chunks inside! One of the best that I've ever had!

Review: The food doesnt really live up to all the hype and buzz created by the media. Tastes like the average nasi lemak from any roadside stall. The rice isnt particularly fragrant. English Review: I recently visited Restaurant Nasi Lemak WanJo and my experience was mixed. The service was decent and the restaurant was clean. The atmosphere was okay, nothing too special. The nasi lemak itself was okay, it was decent but nothing â€¦

Review: Gone here with family.Price wise is good for dinner.Food is good.Their chicken n begedil is big.Service is fast. No wait at all on saturday night
English Review: Gone here with family.Price wise is good for dinner.Food is good.Their chicken n begedil is big.Service is fast. No wait at all on saturday night

Review: Nasi lemak dimasak sempurna. Sedap dan berderai gitu.Tidak lembik atau nasi tidak kurang air. Sambal kurang pedas dan agak manis. Bagi saya sambal sedap walaupun sambal tidak pekat. Sambal sotong pun best rasanya. Cuma yang tak puas hati â€¦
English Review: The nasi lemak is cooked perfectly. It's delicious and fragrant. It's neither mushy nor lacking in moisture. The sambal is mildly spicy and somewhat sweet. For me, the sambal is tasty even though it's not very thick. The squid sambal also tastes great. The only unsatisfactory thing is hard to find parking

Review: Long queue before can reach the counter. However the service is fast. The rice is nice and creamy: Sambal is on sweeter side. Very focused menu serving only Nasi Lemak with fewer side dishes spread. â€¦
English Review: Long queue before can reach the counter. However the service is fast. The rice is nice and creamy: Sambal is on sweeter side. Very focused menu serving only Nasi Lemak with fewer side dishes spread. â€¦

Review: Kenapa ramai kata tak sedap ye. Cuma satu jela. Sambal dia agak manis. Jika makan pinggan kedua, mungkin rasa sedikit muak. Ayam masak merah sedap! Servis lajuuuuu. Jika nak duduk dalam bilik aircond kene bayar extra rm1/per person. Beratur pun sekejap je. Anyway, worth to try! Boleh datang lagi :)
English Review: Why do many say it's not tasty? Just one thing. The sambal is somewhat sweet. If you eat a second plate, you might feel a bit overwhelmed. The chicken masak merah is delicious! The service is very fast. If you want to sit in the air-conditioned room, you have to pay an extra RM1 per person. The queue is also short. Anyway, worth trying! Can come again :)

Review: amat bersih dan selesa nasi lemak wanjo, banyak perubahan kedai di lakukan dan amat-amat selesa
English Review: Very clean and comfortable, Wanjo Nasi Lemak has undergone many changes and is very, very comfortable

Review: Food is good, tasty. 13Rm for the big tomato chicken and beef rendang plate and 16Rm for the fried chicken and sotong. Drink is cheap just 2RM for TehO-Ice. A lot of table and clean place for eating. I think the price of food is OKWorth to wait for long queue. Tourist should give a shot
English Review: The food is good and tasty. It costs 13 RM for the large tomato chicken and beef rendang plate, and 16 RM for the fried chicken and squid. Drinks are cheap, just 2 RM for TehO-Ice. There are plenty of tables, and the place is clean for eating. I think the food prices are reasonable. It's worth waiting in the long queue. Tourists should give it a try.

Review: Very yummy food! Pretty good value for money, I ordered a lot as you can see from my photo and it was very reasonably priced. â€¦
English Review: Very yummy food! Pretty good value for money, I ordered a lot as you can see from my photo and it was very reasonably priced. â€¦

Review: Mmg skali jela aku mkn sini haha.Aku bkn jenis suka buang2 mkanan so aku habiskn jela hakikatnya rasa biasa sgt. Aku harapkn wow sbb rmai review sedap haha rupanya hurmmm. Tpi 1 yg bagus kedai sentiasa bersih ini bagus.
English Review: I just ate here once, haha. I'm not the type to waste food, so I just finished it even though it tastes quite ordinary. I was hoping for a 'wow' factor because many reviews said it's delicious, haha, but it turns out, hmm. But one good thing is that the shop is always clean, which is good.

Review: Nasi lemak sedap. Sambal dan lauk lain portion nasi dia sikit.. Jadi jangan luar mi rak extra nasi.. Sebab lauk nye banyak.. ðŸ˜‚Ade 2 tempat..If nk aircond rm1 sorang ya.. Tapi nicerr je la..Panas luar ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚Air coway.. Foc ðŸ¤ðŸ¤ðŸ¤Sirap ais sedappp ðŸ˜Š
English Review: The nasi lemak is delicious. The sambal and other side dishes have a small portion of rice, so don't forget to order extra rice. The reason is that there are many side dishes. There are two seating areas. If you want air conditioning, it's an additional RM1 per person, but it's quite nice. It's hot outside. Coway water is provided for free. The iced syrup is delicious.

Review: The taste of food is still great with new atmosphere, BUT, I am very disappointed with the service, I found the crew are not kind, no smile and no sense of service, when I came in quiet hour, the crew just ignored me even one of the crew are going and make me waiting to order
English Review: The taste of the food is still great in the new atmosphere. HOWEVER, I am very disappointed with the service. I found the crew to be unkind, without a smile and lacking a sense of service. When I came in during a quiet hour, the crew simply ignored me, and one of them even left, making me wait to place my order.

Review: Has quickly taken over the vacant spot left behind by erstwhile rival nasi lemak antarabangsa - wonder what has happened to them folks. Anybody knows? Nasi lemak here is nothing to shout about but the soft cuttlefish gives them the edge â€¦
English Review: Has quickly taken over the vacant spot left behind by erstwhile rival nasi lemak antarabangsa - wonder what has happened to them folks. Anybody knows? Nasi lemak here is nothing to shout about but the soft cuttlefish gives them the edge â€¦

Review: Loved, loved, loved Wanjo's Nasi Lemak! ðŸ˜‹ðŸ˜˜â¤ï¸Being Singaporean, it's hard to get used to the Malaysian Nasi Lemak, primarily because the sambal in Malaysia is generally more liquid and gravy-like, with slivers of onions swimming in it and less sweet, and that small deep-fried ikan kuning is nowhere to be seen.  The rice is often overcooked and clumpy.Then I found Wanjo ðŸ˜‹ðŸ˜‹ðŸ˜‹ðŸ˜˜ðŸ˜˜ðŸ˜˜ by accident whilst visiting Kampong Bharu.  Wanjo's sambal, although still more liquid and gravy-like, is just as sweet as Singapore's version that I grew up with, without those annoying lumpy onions.   The rice is aromatic, fragrant and cooked to perfection - each rice grain is separate and QQ to the bite.The price was exceptionally reasonable, I thought, given the exceptional standard of the Nasi Lemak and accomplishments offered at Wanjo's.We beat the crowd, got our Nasi Lemak with different accompaniments - I had beef lung, sotong and fried egg omelette, whilst my partner had deep-fried chicken, and found our seats at the non-air-conditioned area.  It was a great dining experience with a crowd of equally satisfied, happy (and noisy ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚) patrons.The service line was quick, and the staff was exceptionally friendly, who were extremely quick to respond and patient with this English-speaking inquisitive Singaporean and his Caucasian partner.Although there's still no small deep-fried ikan kuning, we left extremely satisfied, and happy with smiles and praise.  We'll gladly return to Wanjo again and again, just for the Nasi Lemak.  My partner absolutely loved Wanjo!ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
English Review: Absolutely adored Wanjo's Nasi Lemak! ?????? As a Singaporean, adapting to Malaysian Nasi Lemak was challenging due to the different sambal and absence of certain elements. However, stumbling upon Wanjo in Kampong Bharu was a game-changer. Their sambal, while still liquid, matched the sweetness I grew up with, minus the bothersome onions. The rice was impeccably cooked, each grain separate and delightful. Despite the absence of a small deep-fried ikan kuning, the exceptional Nasi Lemak and reasonable prices at Wanjo's left us immensely satisfied. Quick service, friendly staff, and a vibrant, happy crowd make it an experience worth repeating. Can't wait to return for more of Wanjo's Nasi Lemak delights! ??????

Review: Tempat wajib cuba sekali seumur hidup. Nasi lemak cukup rasa, sedap, sambal manis tapi tetap cukup rasa pedas dia tu, lauk mcm biasa ada ayam goreng, sambal kerang, sambal sotong, paru semua ada mintak je. Servis pun laju je korang masuk je â€¦
English Review: A must-try place once in a lifetime. The Nasi Lemak is flavorful and delicious, with a sweet sambal that still maintains a spicy kick. The dishes are typical, including fried chicken, cockles in sambal, sambal squid, and lungs, everything you could ask for. The service is quick

Review: It's delicious and you should go here.Very quick service - there will be a queue but it moves in no time.The plates easily make such a balanced meal at a fair price, and it's easy to order various fresh fruit juices at a stall just outside the front door.For only a small surcharge, you can sit indoors in an A/C space.Very easy to get to with the nearby KL Rapid link, or as well to walk in after having a Grab or taxi drop you nearby.
English Review: It's delicious, and you should go here. The service is very quickthere will be a queue, but it moves in no time. The plates easily provide a balanced meal at a fair price, and it's simple to order various fresh fruit juices at a stall just outside the front door. For only a small surcharge, you can sit indoors in an air-conditioned space. It's very easy to get to with the nearby KL Rapid Link, or you can easily walk in after getting dropped off by a Grab or taxi nearby.

Review: Very nice nasi lemak I must say. Probably even better if enjoying it thereâ€¦ I tapau home ðŸ  Ayam masak Merah was good, rendang beef, all are pretty good. â€¦
English Review: Very nice nasi lemak I must say. Probably even better if enjoying it thereâ€¦ I tapau home ðŸ  Ayam masak Merah was good, rendang beef, all are pretty good. â€¦

Review: Nasi lemak berlemak. Queue panjang. So kalau lapar beli la 2 pinggan terus. Portion tak berapa besar. Paru keras sket. Ayam, kerang semua ok. Sambal tak pedas sangat.
English Review: Creamy Nasi Lemak. Long queue. So, if you're hungry, just buy two plates at once. The portion is not very large. The lungs are a bit tough. Chicken, cockles, all okay. The sambal is not very spicy.

Review: I went to this place by LRT, need to walk for 10 mins from the station...Nasi lemak with rendang and fried egg was so delicious...
English Review: I went to this place by LRT, need to walk for 10 mins from the station...Nasi lemak with rendang and fried egg was so delicious...

Review: Nasi lemak okay la but kuantiti sikit tapi service sangat teruk..kami tengah makan satu keluarga with baby and mak I OKU, waiter datang suruh jauhkan meja..alasan bos marah sambung-sambung meja..rude sangat, orang tengah makan kot..takde common sense langsung..will not come again and not recommended to come
English Review: Nasi lemak is okay, but the quantity is small, and the service is very bad. We were eating as a family with a baby and my mother who is differently-abled, and the waiter came and asked us to move the table, saying the boss is angry about tables being connected. Very rude, especially when people are in the middle of their meal. No common sense at all. Will not come again and not recommended to come.

Review: The service was quite fast as theres alot of staff to assist you wth your food choiceâ˜ºï¸friendly staff and affordable price tooðŸ‘ðŸ˜Š â€¦

Review: Crowded by spacious. Newly renovated and clean. Dropped by to tapau. 2 packs of nasi lemak with sambal kerang, fried chicken and bergedil , total Rm21. Sambal kerang was good but their sambal has burnt smell which I Donâ€™t like. Rice was ok but no peanut.

The sambal kerang was good, but their sambal had a burnt smell, which I didn't like. The rice was okay but lacked peanuts.

Review: Wow! Fantastic food, incredible staff and clean spot. We were in KL for three days and ate here every single dayâ€”no joke! Definitely a place where locals eat. Both the rendang chicken and beef are excellent. Do not leave here without the potato ball and a mango smoothie.
English Review: Wow! Fantastic food, incredible staff and clean spot. We were in KL for three days and ate here every single dayâ€”no joke! Definitely a place where locals eat. Both the rendang chicken and beef are excellent. Do not leave here without the potato ball and a mango smoothie.

English Review: Excellent place, cheap food, only locals inside and very few tourists! 4 of us ate Nasi lemak and ice teh tarik for Â£14 altogether. 1 ringgit each to sit in an AC room. Overall amazing food, would return

English Review: I had the pleasure of dining at Nasi Lemak Wanjo Kg Baro, and it was undoubtedly an authentic experience. A local tour guide recommended it, and it didn't disappoint. The food was simple yet incredibly delicious, giving a genuine â€¦

Review: Long que on certain time but very fast moving. I would not say it's the best but there are others better one. Price is on high side vs tjose roadside style nasi lemak. RM10 for nasi lemak ayam berempah as at Sep 2022.  For same portion at roadside, probably RM7.
English Review: Long queue at certain times, but it moves very fast. I wouldn't say it's the best; there are better ones. The price is on the higher side compared to those roadside-style nasi lemak. As of September 2022, it's RM10 for nasi lemak ayam berempah. For a similar portion at a roadside stall, it's probably around RM7.

Review: A very decent famous Nasi Lemak. Very affordable and yummy. Ranging from RM4 to RM9 for pricing. A lot of other side dishes available from sotong, paru, kerang, bergedil and many more to spice up your Nasi lemak. Sedap!
English Review: A very decent famous Nasi Lemak. Very affordable and yummy. Ranging from RM4 to RM9 for pricing. A lot of other side dishes available from sotong, paru, kerang, bergedil and many more to spice up your Nasi lemak. Sedap!

Review: Lunch kat sini masa cuti sekolah tak ramai orang. Ada tempat berhawa dingin. Ada tempat bawah kipas. Boleh pilih nak duduk kat mana. Selesa dengan ada surau dan tandas.
English Review: Had lunch here during the school holidays, not many people. There's an air-conditioned area and a place under the fan. You can choose where to sit. Comfortable with a surau (prayer room) and restroom available.

Review: Banyak lauk dan kedai sangat selesa. Sesuai untuk makan bersama keluarga. Kawasan sahaja agak sesak time weekend so agak susah untuk cari parking. â€¦
English Review: There are many dishes, and the shop is very comfortable. Suitable for dining with family. The area is a bit crowded, especially during the weekend, so it's a bit difficult to find parking

Review: I thoroughly enjoyed this Nasi Lemak â€” you get to pick the sides you want. Enjoyed the chicken drumstick!! Including the sotong too! The Sambal was super on point, and the rice was fragrant and lemaky. Awesome!! Place was spacious, bright and clean!
English Review: I thoroughly enjoyed this Nasi Lemak  you get to pick the sides you want. I enjoyed the chicken drumstick, including the sotong too! The sambal was super on point, and the rice was fragrant and lemaky. Awesome!! The place was spacious, bright, and clean!

Review: Lama sudah tak datang melawat sini. Kedai makin besar dan banyak tempat duduk. Nasi lemak dan lauk2 ok. Tandas ok. Parking areÃ  sini mmgu susah sikit. Kena pandai cari parking. Will comeback again soon later. Harap lauk bole masak cepat utk lebih banyak pilihan masa tgh makan. Thanks!
English Review: It's been a while since I visited here. The shop has gotten bigger with more seating. Nasi lemak and the side dishes are good. The restroom is fine. Parking can be a bit challenging here. Need to be good at finding parking. Will come back again soon. Hoping the dishes can be cooked faster for more choices during mealtime. Thanks!

Review: I had to try the local experience so for ambiance I would put 4 but as usual I am a bit disappointed when it comes to Malaysian food. It is all "close but no cigar". The concept is nice, like a cantina, get in and cue. The dishes are â€¦
English Review: I had to try the local experience so for ambiance I would put 4 but as usual I am a bit disappointed when it comes to Malaysian food. It is all "close but no cigar". The concept is nice, like a cantina, get in and cue. The dishes are â€¦

Review: Will go back only for the rice, more goreng2 choices compared to others but drinks are too sweet even ordered for less sugar.
English Review: Will go back only for the rice; there are more fried options compared to others. However, the drinks are too sweet even though I ordered them with less sugar.

Review: His service was fast, only the food part....I was a little disappointed because his nasi lemak tasted salty. And I bought several types of side dishes and it happened that me, my husband and younger brother ate the same side dish which is â€¦
English Review: His service was fast, but when it came to the food... I was a little disappointed because his nasi lemak tasted salty. I bought several types of side dishes, and it turned out that my husband, younger brother, and I ate the same side dish

Review: The sambal is a bit too sweet for my taste. But it's very clean here. Not as pricey as I expected it to be. A good experience. I will come again. Service is fast and people are friendly
English Review: The sambal is a bit too sweet for my taste. But it's very clean here. Not as pricey as I expected it to be. A good experience. I will come again. Service is fast and people are friendly

Review: Food - coconut taste was light and rice was nicely cooked. Lots of dishes to choose. â€¦
English Review: Food - The coconut taste was subtle, and the rice was nicely cooked. Lots of dishes to choose from.

Review: Not as expected.. the sambal too sweet.. its more like indonesian style of sambal.. donâ€™t expext too much.. parking problem.. staff at the food counter not too friendly.. road side nasi lemak far better.. thats my experience.. ðŸ™ â€¦
English Review: Not as expected. The sambal is too sweet; it's more like Indonesian style. Don't expect too much. There's a parking problem, and the staff at the food counter are not too friendly. Roadside nasi lemak is far better. That's my experience.

Review: Nasi Lemak is above average, sambal is sweet, the rice not coconuty.. the sotong(squid) and kerang (cockles) are good... Kopi O panas is nice.. â€¦
English Review: Nasi Lemak is above average; the sambal is sweet, and the rice is not coconutty. The sotong (squid) and kerang (cockles) are good. Kopi O panas is nice.

Review: Very nice sambal!! But this nasi lemak feels like nasi lemak kantin !! There are so many lauk for nasi lemak ! I tried bergedil sedap sngt, u will shock with the size of bergedil hahah You guys should try! Good customer service!
English Review: Very nice sambal!! But this nasi lemak feels like cafeteria-style nasi lemak!! There are so many side dishes for nasi lemak! I tried the bergedil, very tasty, you will be shocked by the size of the bergedil hahah. You guys should try! Good customer service!

Review: Sambal too sweet some peoples may like it. Overall ok
English Review: Sambal too sweet some peoples may like it. Overall ok

Review: This is my second time to this restaurant in Kampung Baru. This time, they have renovated this large restaurant which is now (10 Jan 2022) very clean, bright and spacious. The main attraction is of course their fantastic Nasi Lemak. A â€¦
English Review: This is my second time to this restaurant in Kampung Baru. This time, they have renovated this large restaurant which is now (10 Jan 2022) very clean, bright and spacious. The main attraction is of course their fantastic Nasi Lemak. A â€¦

Review: Clean and spacious restaurant. Food wise nothing to shout about, just so-so.. other roadside nasi lemak much better taste than here, the nasi quite tasteless no aroma santan at all, maybe cost cutting not to use enough santan for the nasi, â€¦
English Review: Clean and spacious restaurant. The food is average, nothing particularly noteworthy. Other roadside nasi lemak options have a better taste; the rice lacks flavor and the coconut aroma, perhaps due to cost-cutting measures by not using enough coconut milk for the rice.

Review: Berbekalkan RM1 seorang, anda boleh menikmati nasi lemak dalam kedinginan pendingin hawa (air-conditioner). Tidak ada apa-apa yang ingin saya katakan pada nasi lemak yang ditawarkan disini melainkan ianya sedap. Sebagai pengunjung sejak â€¦
English Review: Armed with RM1 per person, you can enjoy fatty rice in the cold air-conditioner.There is nothing I want to say to the fat rice offered here unless it is delicious.As visitor since â € ¦

Review: Delicious and authentic Malay food in a buffet style. A fun experience for tourists, with super cheap and tasty food. The staff were very kind in explaining the dishes to us in English.
English Review: Delicious and authentic Malay food in a buffet style. A fun experience for tourists, with super cheap and tasty food. The staff were very kind in explaining the dishes to us in English.

Review: Do not expect this place to live up to the hype. Itâ€™s average food served in a cafeteria type atmosphere in rushed fashion down a assembly line procedure. The chicken is decent but I have had much better in KL. The sambal is a more sweet â€¦
English Review: Do not expect this place to live up to the hype. It's average food served in a cafeteria type atmosphere in rushed fashion down a assembly line procedure. The chicken is decent but I have had much better in KL. The sambal is a more sweet â€¦

Review: Nasi mcm rm1.50.. paru 5ketul kecik ko bg? Cashier xyah buat muka ketat eh. Senarai harga tepek kt cermin.. nama dekat resit nasi lemak telur rebus rm5.50. Tq
English Review: The rice is like RM1.50... you only give 5 small pieces of lungs? Cashier, don't make a stern face. Display the price list on the mirror. The receipt says 'Nasi Lemak Telur Rebus RM5.50.' Thank you

Review: My first time here to buy sahur and both lines for dine-in and takeaway were pretty long. Nasi lemak was very fragrant, but I couldnt figure out what makes it smell nice. Extra santan? Or the pandan leaves? Or simply because it was packed â€¦
English Review: My first time here to buy sahur and both lines for dine-in and takeaway were pretty long. Nasi lemak was very fragrant, but I couldnt figure out what makes it smell nice. Extra santan? Or the pandan leaves? Or simply because it was packed with banana leaves â€¦

Review: The sambal is sweet..prefer itnto be salty though.
English Review: The sambal is sweet..prefer it to be salty though.

Review: Biasa-biasa je makanan dia. Suasana yang baik, cuma parking je problem. Depan tu ada parking tapi kena bayar lah dalam 5 ringgit untuk 3 jam pertama. Tadi makan nasi lemak dengan ayam goreng + air milo ais. Harga 11 ringgit sahaja.
English Review: The food is just average. The ambiance is good, only the parking is a problem. There is parking in front, but you have to pay about 5 ringgit for the first 3 hours. Today, I had nasi lemak with fried chicken and iced Milo. The price was only 11 ringgit.

Review: Tasty nasi lemak with variety of lauk. Rice is soft but in normal portion. Rendang ayam taste great, similar like the one you ordered at Paparich. Parking is rm3 for 3 hours nearby this restaurant.
English Review: Tasty nasi lemak with variety of lauk. Rice is soft but in normal portion. Rendang ayam taste great, similar like the one you ordered at Paparich. Parking is rm3 for 3 hours nearby this restaurant.

Review: First time rasa sendiri. Aku ambil nasi lemak sambal kerang + begedil. Wife pulak nasi lemak paru.Nasi dia wangi & berlemak. Cukup syarat.Part yang paling aku suka ialah sambal dia. Kalau nak describe, it is spicy first with the hint of sweetness.Kedai pun luas, airy and most importantly sangat bersih time aku datang. Servis pun pantas.Untuk kata nasi lemak ni terbaik ke, overrated ke bagi aku tu subjektif. Tapi yang certain, rasa nasi lemak Wanjo ni solid, cukup syarat & atmosfera yang selesa.Yang kureng maybe dari segi portion, a bit small untuk aku. Lagi satu parking lah, tapi tu lebih kepada masalah kg baru bukan kedai ni.WIR - most definitely.
English Review: First time trying it myself. I had the Nasi Lemak with sambal shellfish and begedil. My wife also had Nasi Lemak. It was satisfying. What I liked the most was the sambal. To describe it, it's initially spicy with a hint of sweetness. The place is spacious, well-ventilated, and, most importantly, very clean when I visited. The service is fast. Without a doubt, the taste of the Nasi Lemak is robust, satisfying, and the atmosphere is comfortable. There's another parking issue, but it's more related to the place, not this shop. Will definitely return.

Review: Delicious nasi lemak. Nice ambience. Good price of RM13 including coffee. Will come back. Kampong Baru is indeed a place for local malaysian food.
English Review: Delicious nasi lemak. Nice ambience. Good price of RM13 including coffee. Will come back. Kampong Baru is indeed a place for local malaysian food.

Review: Orang Kelantan nak rasa masakan Kelantan boleh datang makan sini. Meja banyak, kedai luas. Orang sentiasa ramai. Cuma parking la susah sikit sebab kawasan kg baru
English Review: People from Kelantan who want to taste Kelantanese cuisine can come and eat here. There are plenty of tables, and the shop is spacious. It's always crowded. The only issue is that parking is a bit difficult because it's in Kg Baru

Review: The Nasi Lemak was very good. The rice was fluffy and the sambal has a nice sweet taste. It is not too spicy and the price is affordable. The only complaint is parking is quite difficult in this area, but there are paid parking around which â€¦
English Review: The Nasi Lemak was very good. The rice was fluffy and the sambal has a nice sweet taste. It is not too spicy and the price is affordable. The only complaint is parking is quite difficult in this area

Review: Nasi lemak lagend, memang sangat terasa creamy santan pada nasi, sambal walaupun nampak macam pedas tapi just nice x terasa sangat kepedasan, kids friendly for sambal, ayam goreng pun flavourful cukup rasa dari segi rempahnya, ayam masih â€¦
English Review: Legendary nasi lemak, indeed, very rich in creamy coconut milk flavor in the rice. The sambal, although it looks spicy, is just nice and doesn't feel overly hot. It's kids-friendly for the sambal, and the fried chicken is flavorful with sufficient seasoning in terms of spices.

Review: Tempat yang menarik utk nikmati nasi lemak. Just bagi selera aku ok ja tapi tetap boleh rasa dan nikmati cuma rasa kurang sebab ayam goreng maybe kat luar jadi tidak ranggup. Overall still ok la..just nak park tu pandai2 la cari tempat memang susah skit bab parking kereta ni
English Review: An interesting place to enjoy nasi lemak. It's just to my taste, but you can still taste and enjoy it. The only downside is that the fried chicken might be a bit tough, maybe because it's from an outside source. Overall, it's still okay. Just be clever in finding a parking spot; it's a bit challenging with this car parking situation.

Review: Best Nasi Lemak in KL. No doubt. Plenty of choices for lauk and freshly cooked. Large dining space, with air conditioning area as well. Parking may be a bit hard, but Kg Bharu always packed.
English Review: Best Nasi Lemak in KL. No doubt. Plenty of choices for dishes and freshly cooked. Large dining space, with air conditioning area as well. Parking may be a bit hard, but Kg Bharu always packed.

Review: Love the nasi lemak here! The price was affordable and the place was surprisingly clean. â€¦
English Review: Love the nasi lemak here! The price was affordable and the place was surprisingly clean. â€¦

Review: Memang sedap. Kalau datang lewat q panjang sikit tapi servis laju. Lauk pelbagai pastikan ambil begedil. Makan kat ruang ada aircond tambah RM1/person.
English Review: It's delicious.If it comes through Q is a little longer but the service is fast.Multiple side dishes make sure to take some time.Eating in the room has aircond adding RM1/person.

Review: If you want to enjoy authentic Malaysian local food, I recommend this place. And please try mango smoothie after the meal.
English Review: If you want to enjoy authentic Malaysian local food, I recommend this place. And please try mango smoothie after the meal.

Review: always queue, but very fast service. favorite menu "nasi lemak paru" and delicious sambal (sweet and spicy) must come here if you go to KL
English Review: Always a queue, but the service is very fast. My favorite menu is the "nasi lemak paru," and the sambal is delicious (sweet and spicy). You must come here if you go to KL.

Review: Their Nasi lemak is famous everywhere, especially among tourists. The taste is okay, you can try the squid and chicken, but the sambal is too sweet. Overall, it's quite a nice lunch.
English Review: Their Nasi lemak is famous everywhere, especially among tourists. The taste is okay, you can try the squid and chicken, but the sambal is too sweet. Overall, it's quite a nice lunch.

Review: Your lunch affair here can be quite a hot experience under the soaring sun despite the ample oscillating wall fans. â€¦
English Review: Your lunch affair here can be quite a hot experience under the soaring sun despite the ample oscillating wall fans. â€¦

Review: Been here 3 times already. The only downside going here is the difficulty in finding a parking spot, as it is in Kg Baru. But once you reach the restaurant, youâ€™ll forget about it. You will be greeted by a helpful staff letting you know â€¦
English Review: Been here 3 times already. The only downside going here is the difficulty in finding a parking spot, as it is in Kg Baru. But once you reach the restaurant, you'll forget about it. You will be greeted by a helpful staff letting you know â€¦

Review: Great Nasi Lemak taste with a nice place. Even thoigh the queue to get the food is long, it was quite fast since there were many workers and they know what they neeed to do.
English Review: Great Nasi Lemak taste with a nice place. Even though the queue to get the food is long, it was quite fast since there were many workers and they know what they need to do.

Review: The portion for the rice too small and after requested also it's not enough for big portion. For the Fried chicken hard and cold.we arrived at 10 pm.the staff friendly and fast service. Also request for extra sambal also can't get it
English Review: The portion of rice is too small, and even after requesting more, it's still not enough for a larger portion. The fried chicken was tough and cold. We arrived at 10 pm. The staff was friendly, and the service was fast. Unfortunately, we couldn't get extra sambal even after requesting it

Review: Paru agak liat ..sambal tak pedas .. ada tempat aircond ..caj RM1 sorang ..kanakÂ² tak kena caj .. .. ok lah nak rasoÂ² .. prefer ns lemak ct garden kg bharu lg..
English Review: The lungs are a bit cluttered .. no spicy .. there is a aircond place .. RM1 a person ..

Review: Nasi lemak berlemak. Queue panjang. So kalau lapar beli la 2 pinggan terus. Portion tak berapa besar. Paru keras sket. Ayam, kerang semua ok. Sambal tak pedas sangat.
English Review: Rich Nasi Lemak. Long queue. So if you're hungry, buy two plates at once. The portion is not very large. The lungs are a bit tough. Chicken, cockles, all okay. The sambal is not very spicy.

Review: Have been an occasional dinner here, but over time the taste somehow has deteriorated. The rendang Daging was  tough and pretty salty and the sambal was too sweet. Hope they can maintain their consistency since this has been a frequent spot for tourist trying out our national treasure.
English Review: Have been an occasional dinner here, but over time the taste somehow has deteriorated. The rendang Daging was  tough and pretty salty and the sambal was too sweet. Hope they can maintain their consistency since this has been a frequent spot for tourist trying out our national treasure.

Review: Reach location just before 12pm on a Monday. Queue was quite short, about 3-4 family ahead. Just a short wait as the staffs are quick to serve.About less than half of the tables available are taken.Had 3x plates of basic Nasi Lemak plus2x marinated fried chicken (ayam goreng rempah)1x paru goreng (beef lungs)1x rendang daging (beef rendang)1x limpa (beef spleen)1x can of green tea1x mineral water1x teh tarikTotal cost RM43, which is really value for money.Generally the food is great, but the ones that really hit me are the rice itself, sambal, beef rendang, fried chicken and teh tarik. Recommended. ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘Kid-friendliness: Free entry for kids below 10 years old to dine in the air-condition dining area. RM1 per entry for adult.
English Review: Reach location just before 12pm on a Monday. Queue was quite short, about 3-4 family ahead. Just a short wait as the staffs are quick to serve.About less than half of the tables available are taken.Had 3x plates of basic Nasi Lemak plus2x marinated fried chicken (ayam goreng rempah)1x paru goreng (beef lungs)1x rendang daging (beef rendang)1x limpa (beef spleen)1x can of green tea1x mineral water1x teh tarikTotal cost RM43, which is really value for money.Generally the food is great, but the ones that really hit me are the rice itself, sambal, beef rendang, fried chicken and teh tarik. Recommended. ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘Kid-friendliness: Free entry for kids below 10 years old to dine in the air-condition dining area. RM1 per entry for adult.

Review: The taste of their famous nasi lemak was decent, quite normal. I felt that the coconut rice taste was light. The ingredient size was generous - look at the size of the begedil! The ikan bilis does not include any fried peanut. The stall looks clean and is quite cooling to eat even in the afternoon. Price seems reasonable.
English Review: The taste of their famous nasi lemak was decent, quite normal. I felt that the coconut rice taste was light. The ingredient size was generous - look at the size of the begedil! The ikan bilis does not include any fried peanut. The stall looks clean and is quite cooling to eat even in the afternoon. Price seems reasonable.

Review: Classic nasi lemak, variety of lauk to choose. Taste is great sambal is sweet, sour and spicy.  There is almost everytime a line but the service there is fast but can expect about 10-20 min waiting time. Place is getting bigger and you can splurge of ac dining area for add on.
English Review: Classic nasi lemak with a variety of dishes to choose from. The taste is great, and the sambal is sweet, sour, and spicy. There is almost always a line, but the service is fast, although you can expect a 10-20 minute waiting time. The place is expanding, and you can opt for the air-conditioned dining area as an add-on.

Review: Nice place to bring your family to taste malaysian delight..nasi lemak with assorted variants of side dishes
English Review: Nice place to bring your family to taste malaysian delight..nasi lemak with assorted variants of side dishes

Review: Sedap. Beratur panjang pun cepat. Meja makan pun banyak. Nak air sedap, ada jus segar. Air kosong ambil sendiri dengan Coway.
English Review: Delicious.Long queue is fast.The dining table is plentiful.For delicious water, there is fresh juice.Empty water takes it with coway.

Review: I have been here twice with my love as he love the nasi lemak here so much. First time I was here for dinner right after MCO, and the restaurant was under renovation. The second time here was a day before Deepavali. The restaurant already â€¦
English Review: I have been here twice with my love as he love the nasi lemak here so much. First time I was here for dinner right after MCO, and the restaurant was under renovation. The second time here was a day before Deepavali. The restaurant already â€¦

Review: My favourite night time nasi lemak place! Must try, and then repeat!
English Review: My favourite night time nasi lemak place! Must try, and then repeat!

Review: Nasi lemak with ayam goreng rm11. For foreigners they feel cheap.  But for local I think itâ€™s  expensive. The hype for this nasi lemak were crazy. This is one of the reason I went. But the nasi lemak not that hype as I saw in social medias â€¦
English Review: Nasi lemak with ayam goreng rm11. For foreigners they feel cheap.  But for local I think it's  expensive. The hype for this nasi lemak were crazy. This is one of the reason I went. But the nasi lemak not that hype as I saw in social medias â€¦

Review: The best nasi lemak according to my experience ðŸ‘ðŸ¾ðŸ‘ðŸ¾ðŸ‘ðŸ¾ Nice staffs, quick service and clean place â€¦
English Review: The best nasi lemak according to my experience. Nice staffs, quick service and clean place â€¦

Review: Located on the busy street in Kg Baru, this is the best nasi lemak in Kg Baru, if not in KL. Comfortable place for all day and late night dining
English Review: Located on the busy street in Kg Baru, this is the best nasi lemak in Kg Baru, if not in KL. Comfortable place for all day and late night dining

Review: Used to be Nasi Lemak Antarabangsa but they chose to rebrand. The portion of rice is good but the staff doesn't listen well to your request. I asked for less sambal but they ended up adding one more scoop of sambal. The price is too â€¦
English Review: Used to be Nasi Lemak Antarabangsa but they chose to rebrand. The portion of rice is good but the staff doesn't listen well to your request. I asked for less sambal but they ended up adding one more scoop of sambal. The price is too expensive â€¦

Review: efficient service and quite spacious, banyak pilihan lauk dan air. ada space air conditioned and staff service is great. however, the taste of nasi lemak and lauk is average to below average
English Review: Efficient service and quite spacious, with many choices of side dishes and drinks. There is an air-conditioned space, and the staff service is great. However, the taste of nasi lemak and the side dishes is average to below average.

Review: So so nasi lemak utk tourist ya. Org selangor dan kl sila cari nasi lemak lain. Makan di bilik hwa dingin bayar per head RM1.  Dua pinggan nasi lemak around RM32 lauk dua jenis. Nasi ya amat la sikit sgt. Sekali dtg je kot.
English Review: Average nasi lemak for tourists. People from Selangor and KL, please look for another nasi lemak. Eating in the air-conditioned room costs RM1 per head. Two plates of nasi lemak with two types of side dishes cost around RM32. The rice portion is quite small. Maybe it's just a one-time visit.

Review: The sambal.... is for mat salleh? The sweet type and not your typical spicy type. The fried chicken was nice, freshly fried. To be fair, all the side dishes were hot and fresh since they have non-stop customers (I queued for about 40 mins). â€¦
English Review: The sambal.... is for mat salleh? The sweet type and not your typical spicy type. The fried chicken was nice, freshly fried. To be fair, all the side dishes were hot and fresh since they have non-stop customers (I queued for about 40 mins). â€¦

Review: Brand new place, neat and comfortable. Delicious and appetizing food. A little pricey, but worth it. Original nasi lemak taste.
English Review: Brand new place, neat and comfortable. Delicious and appetizing food. A little pricey, but worth it. Original nasi lemak taste.

Review: Drove up to KL and dropped by Wanjo for dinner. No ragrets. Amazing place with amazing dishes. Place was spacious, big, and clean with many tables to offer. Long queue but it's a moving queue, didn't wait too long to be served. Sambal was â€¦
English Review: Drove up to KL and dropped by Wanjo for dinner. No ragrets. Amazing place with amazing dishes. Place was spacious, big, and clean with many tables to offer. Long queue but it's a moving queue, didn't wait too long to be served. Sambal was â€¦

Review: Didn't get a picture (was too preoccupied in the morn) but found out that this is a relatively famous Nasi Lemak store in KL. The sauce is spicy-sweet and each plate comes with anchovies, fragrant coconut rice, cucumbers, the sambal and an â€¦
English Review: Didn't get a picture (was too preoccupied in the morn) but found out that this is a relatively famous Nasi Lemak store in KL. The sauce is spicy-sweet and each plate comes with anchovies, fragrant coconut rice, cucumbers, the sambal and an â€¦

Review: I'm told their sembal makes this the best Nasu Lemak in KL and it was delicious!
English Review: I'm told their symbol makes this the best Nasi Lemak in KL and it was delicious!

Review: Take away nasi lemak telur mata and paru 3 around rm30+. Kalau dine in maybe lagi better but sy take away, sambal terlampau sedikit dan nasi terlalu masin ( selera orang bezaÂ² tp nasi mcm ni tak sesuai utk org sakit) . So so je even org puji melambung
English Review: Took away nasi lemak with fried eggs and lungs, around RM30+. If dining in, it might be better, but for take away, the sambal is too little, and the rice is too salty (tastes vary, but this type of rice may not be suitable for someone unwell). It's just okay, even though some people praise it highly.

Review: Beratur punya panjang matt tapi berbaloi. Parking kereta jangan sembang la sesak so better naik lrt stop dekat kampung bharu then jalan kaki around 3 minutes walking distance. Sistem dorang sangat lah efficient which bayar dulu baru makan. â€¦
English Review: The queue is very long but worth it. Don't talk about car parking; it's crowded. It's better to take the LRT, stop near Kampung Bharu, and then walk around 3 minutes; the distance is short. Their system is very efficient; you pay first before eating.

Review: Rasanya ramai dah tau Nasi Lemak Wanjo ni memang sedap. Nasi Lemak ni memang terpaling kebabom sekali ðŸ˜‚ Satu keluarga saya suka. Kalau orang tanya dan mintak recommendation nasi lemak, saya memang suggest Nasi Lemak Wanjo. Saya happy tengok â€¦
English Review: Many already know that Nasi Lemak Wanjo is indeed delicious. This Nasi Lemak is explosively flavorful. My whole family loves it. If someone asks for a recommendation for Nasi Lemak, I always suggest Nasi Lemak Wanjo. I'm happy to see

Review: Tempat yg best kalu nk rasa nasi lemak kg baru.. cuma kena beratur panjang sblm ambl makan..tempat ini terletak di kg baru kuala lumpur.. tempat yang amat selesa untuk menjamu selera besama keluarga dan juga kawan kawan.. kawasan sekitar kg â€¦
English Review: A great place to experience Nasi Lemak in Kampung Baru. Just be prepared to queue for a long time before getting your meal. This place is located in Kampung Baru, Kuala Lumpur. It's a very comfortable place to enjoy with family and friends.

Reviewer: RESHABA RUBINI A/P VEERAPAN DIAN ADMW 30 ADMW0030
Review: One of the Best nasi lemak around here. The sambal more to sweeter side,which I LOVED so much. Sambal kerang dia ya ampun sngt2. Fried chicken was so soft and flavourful. Highly recommended ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ â€¦
