Review: Reasonable price/serving and the best nasi lemak everyone must try. Some staff cannot speak English which can be hard if you need something but they are really friendly.
English Review: Reasonable price/serving and the best nasi lemak everyone must try. Some staff cannot speak English which can be hard if you need something but they are really friendly.

Review: fourteen dollars for nasi lemak with chicken thigh + sotong. was quite yummy but no peanuts served and the sambal is on the sweeter side. free water and cups! not too difficult to get to from the train. fairly clean but could be better. great service and overall a good experience
English Review: fourteen dollars for nasi lemak with chicken thigh + sotong. was quite yummy but no peanuts served and the sambal is on the sweeter side. free water and cups! not too difficult to get to from the train. fairly clean but could be better. great service and overall a good experience

Review: Still can't get over how good this food was. Amazing nasi lemak went and had two portions trying different sides. â€¦
English Review: Still can't get over how good this food was. Amazing nasi lemak went and had two portions trying different sides. â€¦

Review: Clean, well organised, long queue but fast, separate dine in and take away. Ada Surau and clean toilets. â€¦
English Review: Clean, well organised, long queue but fast, separate dine in and take away. Ada Surau and clean toilets. â€¦

Review: They have too many workers. 3 sat at the front of the store just to welcome the customers (which is excessive IMO). The service was absolutely awful. I asked for a chicken part by pointing because I was not quite sure what it's called. â€¦
English Review: They have too many workers. 3 sat at the front of the store just to welcome the customers (which is excessive IMO). The service was absolutely awful.

Review: Authentic nasi lemak! The fried chicken and sambal are great. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Worth visiting and having a meal here. Open space with bright lighting. The only problem is finding car parking space around.
English Review: Authentic nasi lemak! The fried chicken and sambal are great. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Worth visiting and having a meal here. Open space with bright lighting. The only problem is finding car parking space around.

Review: Nasi Lemak paling padu setakat ni, nasi dan sambal sangat sedap! Ruang makan juga luas dan selesa. Tempat makan sungguh bersih dan sesuai untuk makan dengan kawan-kawan. Harga ok berpatutan dengan portion yang disediakan. Would highly recommend!
English Review: The most solid fat rice so far, the rice and sambal are so delicious!The dining room is also spacious and comfortable.The dining area is very clean and perfect for eating with friends.The price is affordable with the portion provided.Would highly recommend!

Review: Nasi lemak okay. Ayam sedikit kecik. Berbaloi tak eh RM10 sepinggan? Ntah la. Tapi air jus yang kat luar tu sedappp.
English Review: Nasi lemak is okay. The chicken is a bit small. Is it worth RM10 per plate? I don't know. But the fruit juice outside is delicious.

Review: Ok lah. My 2nd time here sbb husband suka mkn sini. Tapi kali ni dtg sambal manis sikit.. overall NL 5/10..
English Review: Okay lah. My second time here because my husband likes to eat here. But this time, the sambal is a bit sweet. Overall, Nasi Lemak is rated 5/10.

Review: Heard a lot about this NL joint so decided to belanja my staff. We bought about 10 packets and the majority feedback was good. I had the ayam rendang and itâ€™s superb. The rice is aromatic and the rendang delcious. Overall will try again, especially the rendang beef and fried chicken.
English Review: Heard a lot about this Nasi Lemak joint, so decided to treat my staff. We bought about 10 packets, and the majority feedback was good. I had the ayam rendang, and it's superb. The rice is aromatic, and the rendang is delicious. Overall, will try again, especially the rendang beef and fried chicken.

Review: It's a very awesome Nasi lemak. Definitely worth coming and trying it for ureself. Parking might be difficult to get over here. Shop itself is clean and well lit. I love the plain Nasi lemak. It has nice fluffy rice with strong santan â€¦
English Review: It's a very awesome Nasi lemak. Definitely worth coming and trying it for yourself. Parking might be difficult to get over here. Shop itself is clean and well-lit. I love the plain Nasi lemak. It has nice fluffy rice with strong santan â€¦

Review: Let's just cut to the chase - the nasi lemak here is very average. The rice is not fragrant and not lemak. The sambal is runny and lacking depth of taste - reminds me of the other famous nasi lemak that has gone downhill, Tanglin. The ikan â€¦
English Review: Let's cut to the chase - the nasi lemak here is very average. The rice lacks fragrance and richness. The sambal is runny and lacks depth of taste, reminding me of the other famous nasi lemak that has gone downhill, Tanglin.

Review: LOVE LOVE LOVE the nasi lemak here!I had the kerang, sotong & paru. Paru was a little dry and would definitely not order it again. The sotong was really good and was not overcooked and did not have the fishy smell. Kerang was okok, nothing to shout about. Sambal was not too overpowering and spicy tooWill definitely be coming back here for the nasi lemak and sotong! :)
English Review: LOVE LOVE LOVE the nasi lemak here! I had the kerang, sotong & paru. The paru was a little dry, and I would definitely not order it again. The sotong was really good, not overcooked, and did not have a fishy smell. The kerang was okay, nothing to shout about. The sambal was not too overpowering and spicy too. Will definitely be coming back here for the nasi lemak and sotong!

Review: Tasty nasi lemak with a variety of dishes to choose. This beautiful plate with two drinks only costs 40rm
English Review: Tasty nasi lemak with a variety of dishes to choose. This beautiful plate with two drinks only costs 40rm

Review: Tried for nasi lemak. It come with basic nasi lemak with sambal, egg and anchovies. Theb you can add-on other dishes such ayam rendang, n etc2. â€¦
English Review: Tried for nasi lemak. It come with basic nasi lemak with sambal, egg and anchovies. Theb you can add-on other dishes such ayam rendang, n etc2. â€¦

Review: Satu nama yang cukup gah dan sinonim dengan Kg Baru. Pantas, sedap, ketagih sesuai dengan Nasi Lemak Wanjo Kg Baru. Tak lengkap datang KL tak lepak pekena Nasi Lemak kat sini.
English Review: A name that is quite prominent and synonymous with Kg Baru. Fast, delicious, and addictive, fitting for Nasi Lemak Wanjo Kg Baru. It's incomplete to visit KL without stopping by here for a taste of Nasi Lemak

Review: Nasi lemak Wanjo rasa xde special mana. Sambal manis, pedas tu tadakk. Mintak telur mata yg kuning cair xdapat. Apo nak dikato...memang rating kedai biasa je lah.
English Review: Nasi Lemak Wanjo doesn't have any special taste. The sambal is not sweet, and it lacks spiciness. Asked for runny yellow fried egg, but didn't get it. What to say... the shop is just rated as average.

Review: Overprice and overhype nasi lemak tbh. Nasi lemak with ayam goreng berempah and a bit of kuah totalling to RM 11.00.....its not even taste that good. Their service were fast and their juice stand is good. Their juice is recommended.
English Review: Overprice and overhype nasi lemak tbh. Nasi lemak with ayam goreng berempah and a bit of kuah totalling to RM 11.00.....its not even taste that good. Their service were fast and their juice stand is good. Their juice is recommended.

Review: One of the best Nasi lemak in KL, variety of sides. From fried paru, Sambal sotong, Sambal kerang, pegedil, fried chicken to fried eggs. Just delicious. The Nasi lemak (rice) cooked with just the right santan and saltiness. Goes really well â€¦
English Review: One of the best Nasi lemak in KL, variety of sides. From fried paru, Sambal sotong, Sambal kerang, pegedil, fried chicken to fried eggs. Just delicious. The Nasi lemak (rice) cooked with just the right santan and saltiness. Goes really well â€¦

Review: Tempat agak selesa cuma tak banyak meja, makanan agak mahal sikit, nasi lemak telur rebus sebiji caj RM5 , nasi lemak ayam masak merah RM10.. boleh lah kan nak merasa
English Review: The place is quite comfortable, but there aren't many tables. The food is a bit expensive; a nasi lemak with boiled egg is charged at RM5, and nasi lemak with chicken in red curry is RM10. It's alright if you want to give it a try.

Review: Visited for the first time as a native KL guy. Overated in my opinion. Price was OK, RM11 for nasi lemak with ayam goreng berempah, but taste wise, really just average. Would go for Village Park in any given day. â€¦
English Review: Visited for the first time as a native KL guy. Overated in my opinion. Price was OK, RM11 for nasi lemak with ayam goreng berempah, but taste wise, really just average. Would go for Village Park in any given day. â€¦

Review: Makanan just ok, sudah beberapa kali datang sini, sepinggan hidangan nasi seperti berkurangan dari first time datang. Staf yang sombong dan tergesa2 melayan pelanggan, sangat marah bila minta hidangan seperti kita mahu, kami mampu bayar bukan berkira soal duit tapi airmuka dan perangai staf yang sangat jelik.
English Review: The food is just okay; I've been here several times, and the portion of the rice dish seems to have reduced since the first visit. The staff is arrogant and hurried in serving customers, getting very angry when we request the dish the way we want. We can afford it, it's not about money but the attitude and behavior of the staff that are very unpleasant.

Review: The nasi lemak was decent, I personally found the sambal to be way too sweet and prefer a savoury one. The bergedil was yummy. No peanuts served. RM10 for my vegetarian plate. I much prefer Village Park overall taste for RM12.5, its a better value there. Parking can be quite difficult here.
English Review: The nasi lemak was decent, I personally found the sambal to be way too sweet and prefer a savoury one. The bergedil was yummy. No peanuts served. RM10 for my vegetarian plate. I much prefer Village Park overall taste for RM12.5, its a better value there. Parking can be quite difficult here.

Review: Alhamdulillah, finally reach here for the first time. Nice food and nice services from  staffs. May repeat after this visit.ðŸ¤ðŸ» â€¦

Review: nasi lemak taste so-so, i'm not fan of their sambal. the consistency is thick and not spicy. portion is huge and its pricey. the service is fast and have a lot of table.

Review: A out-of-the-way, road-side, tented shop hidden in a small side street. Bright and clean, but the food isn't worth traveling down for. The nasi lemak rice is fragrant, but nothing outstanding. The sambal is sweet and nice. The beef rending â€¦

Review: This isn't just hype. This is a lovely nasi lemak place. The rice is lovely, the condiment options are aplenty too. Spacious and clean. Teh ais is not the sickly sweet type so it is lovely.
English Review: This isn't just hype. This is a lovely nasi lemak place. The rice is lovely, the condiment options are aplenty too. Spacious and clean. Teh ais is not the sickly sweet type so it is lovely.

English Review: Excellent place for the traditional Malaysian Nasi lemak. The variety of dishes to go with the standard coconut rice is amazing.. Place gets super crowded but you can opt for sitting in the air cond room (at RM 1.00 per pax). Super value meal.

Review: This was my first try of this establishment. I had the nasi lemak with fried egg and one bergedil added on. The rice was well cooked and the coconut milk was quite generously integrated. However the amount of rice which they dished out onto â€¦

Review: This is our first time eating here. The nasi lemak is awesome. The sambal is tasty. The ayam bakar and ayam gulai are good. But the ayam gulai is a bit sweet. Paru paru is a bit hard to chew. The price is relatively cheap. Will be back again

Review: Food was really good. The staff were helpful explaining choices
English Review: Food was really good. The staff were helpful explaining choices

Review: The best nasi lemak in town, the place is big, clean, spacious.. ready from breakfast till night.. already eat it two Times in 4 days..
English Review: The best nasi lemak in town, the place is big, clean, spacious.. ready from breakfast till night.. already eat it two Times in 4 days..

Review: Nasi Lemak here is almost Perfect! Lacking alot in the chickens, always feeling dry and hard. Not enjoyable to eat the chicken, but the rest are nice and tasty! Drinks are also ok!

Review: Affordable Nasi lemak. Got it for supper takeaway and the queue was moving very fast. â€¦

Review: The best nasi lemak. It's worth the price with various selections of condiments.  Recommended.  The parking will be a little problem. It's advisable for you to go early for the weekend.
English Review: The best nasi lemak. It's worth the price with various selections of condiments.  Recommended.  The parking will be a little problem. It's advisable for you to go early for the weekend.

Review: I was skeptical of this place. Wondering why is it popular.. When I took the first taste of the nasi lemak.. Then I knew why, the rice itself is delicious n soft. Review: I ordered a take away for Rendang and after reaching my hotel 15 mins later, the food was terrible. The Rendang had no taste of it and the meat was extremely hard. I had to throw the food which was extremely unpleasant. I do not recommend this place

Review: I honestly donâ€™t know whatâ€™s the big fuss over this place. The nasi lemak was average. The rice was disappointing, very light on the coconut. The sambal does not have a tinge of spiciness at all. It is well priced and service is straight â€¦

Review: Nasi lemak yang banyak pilihan lauk. First time try. Not bad.
English Review: Fat rice is a lot of side dishes.First time try.Not bad.

Review: Went there on a morning of a public holiday. Queue was long but moved fast. Crowd control was organised & staff were friendly, efficient & tables and floors were clean. â€¦

Review: The nasi lemak not fragrant enough. Sambal is soso & thick in flavour. Regular to me.
English Review: The nasi lemak not fragrant enough. Sambal is average & thick in flavour. Regular to me.

Review: I liked the nasi lemak here, the rice is yummy the sambal isnt sambal bawang but its still flavourful there were lots of lauk choices to choose from. The space is spacious, the staffs are friendly. It isnt an easy place to find parking (kg â€¦

Review: Dapat telur goreng tanpa telur kuning. Hampeh betul tak setanding dgn harga dia. Paru dia kering,sambal biasa je taksedap mana,nasi tak rasa santannye. Air kedondong & kiwi sedap.tak berbaloi utk pergi dgn parking susah.
English Review: Got fried egg without the egg yolk. Really disappointing, not worth the price. The lungs were dry, the sambal was mediocre, and the rice didn't taste of coconut milk. The kedondong and kiwi juice were good. Not worth going, especially with difficult parking.

Review: Quite a nice place. Aircon is comfy, and there's a parking lot right opposite. Not cheap, but not that bad either. I really loved the rice here because it is really well cooked with ample lemak. It's so good I would say best don't put too â€¦
English Review: Quite a nice place. The air conditioning is comfortable, and there's a parking lot right opposite. Not cheap, but not that bad either. I really loved the rice here because it is well-cooked with ample lemak. It's so good; I would say it's best not to set too much expectation

Review: Nasi lemak: sedap & lauk-lauk yang panas. Banyak pilihan; ada sambal kerang, paru goreng, rendang ayam, kari daging, daging kicap, ayam goreng rempah, sambal sotong dll. â€¦
English Review: Nasi lemak: delicious with hot side dishes. Many options available, including cockle sambal, fried lungs, chicken rendang, beef curry, soy sauce beef, spiced fried chicken, sambal squid, and more

Review: Sambal sedap. Banyak pilihan lauk. Harga mahal sikit tapi berbaloi.
English Review: Delicious sambal. Many choices of side dishes. The price is a bit high, but it's worth it.

Review: I had nasi lemak daging rendang with burgedil. Total price was rm14.70. There were only three chunck of daging, which i couldnt chew. When i ask the cashier how much was the daging rendang, she said rm5.50. The daging was still hard as metal, which end up in the bin. In general, wanjo nasi lemak is overrated.
English Review: I had nasi lemak daging rendang with burgedil. Total price was rm14.70. There were only three chunck of daging, which i couldnt chew. When i ask the cashier how much was the daging rendang, she said rm5.50. The daging was still hard as metal, which end up in the bin. In general, wanjo nasi lemak is overrated.

Review: Utk yg suka pedas, sambal nasi lemak kat sini bukan utk anda. Lebih kepada manis (certain orang suka). Tapi bagusla tempat dah upgrade, dulu(5 tahun lepas) agak panas sekarang kipas dah banyak.
English Review: For those who like it spicy, the sambal in Nasi Lemak here is not for you. It leans more towards sweet (which some people like). But it's good that the place has been upgraded; in the past (5 years ago), it was quite hot, but now there are many fans.

Review: Youtube and Tiktok brings me here. Giving credit of their food portions and also dining space. Unfortunately, the taste turn me down. Itâ€™s too sweet to me. The â€˜sambal nasi lemakâ€™ which is the main menu here is too sweet. I would love it if add a bit spicy and spices. Overall iâ€™m not satisfied.
English Review: Youtube and Tiktok brings me here. Giving credit of their food portions and also dining space. Unfortunately, the taste turn me down. It's too sweet to me. The sambal nasi lemak which is the main menu here is too sweet. I would love it if add a bit spicy and spices. Overall i'm not satisfied.

Review: Decent nasi lemak, dishes are all tasty but sambal is a bit sweet for my liking, overall it's good. The place is very very hot like inside an oven, maybe they need more fans and reduces the number of lamps.
English Review: Decent nasi lemak, dishes are all tasty but sambal is a bit sweet for my liking, overall it's good. The place is very very hot like inside an oven, maybe they need more fans and reduces the number of lamps.

Review: Kedai yang terletak di kg baru kuala lumpur ini berada di kawasan yang padat namun terdapat banyak parking berbayar yang di sediakan. Rm5 untuk 3 jam. â€¦
English Review: The shop located in Kg Baru Kuala Lumpur is in a dense area but there are many paid parking provided.RM5 for 3 hours.â € ¦

Review: Warung Nasi Lemak yg sangan delicious di kawasan kuliner kampung baru
English Review: A very delicious Nasi Lemak stall in the culinary area of Kampung Baru.

Review: They have been in business for a few decades, and the food quality is consistent. They are well mannered despite their growth & expansion. Some business owners are proud & arrogant after receiving some "attention", and securing tiny â€¦
English Review: They have been in business for a few decades, and the food quality is consistent. They are well mannered despite their growth & expansion. Some business owners are proud & arrogant after receiving some "attention", and securing tiny â€¦

Review: I knew Wanjo through a friend of mine who always brought his foreign friends to this place if they wanted to have nasi lemak. While it's not my favourite in town, I would also do the same if I have friends coming over, or even if I wanted a â€¦
English Review: I knew Wanjo through a friend of mine who always brought his foreign friends to this place if they wanted to have nasi lemak. While it's not my favourite in town, I would also do the same if I have friends coming over â€¦

Review: Kedai yg bersih. Kena dtg naik lrt baru selesa sebab tak payah nak serabut pasal parking. Servis yg pantas. Nasi lemak dan sambal sedap. Ayam goreng dihidang panas2. Cuma tempe agak liat. Harga mahal nak dibandingkan dengan portion yang dapat.
English Review: A clean shop. It's comfortable to come by LRT because you don't have to worry about parking. Fast service. Nasi lemak and sambal are delicious. The fried chicken is served hot. Only the tempe is a bit tough. The price is high compared to the portion you get.

Review: The nasi lemak good. Sambal not so spices and alot of varieties add on food. Juices at affordable price and pau all same price whether you take kaya or chicken curry
English Review: The nasi lemak is good. The sambal is not very spicy, and there are a lot of varieties of add-on food. Juices are at an affordable price, and the pau is all the same price whether you take kaya or chicken curry.

Review: BANYAK LAUK PILIHAN . NASI SEDAP. CUMA SAMBAL TIDAK KENA SELERA SAYA. SBB MCM KE ARAH CAIR2 , JUGA KURANG2 PEDAS.ðŸ˜… BOLEH CUBA AMBIL PENGALAMAN. â€¦
English Review: MANY CHOICES OF SIDE DISHES. DELICIOUS RICE. ONLY THE SAMBAL DOESN'T SUIT MY TASTE. BECAUSE IT'S KIND OF LIQUIDY AND ALSO LESS SPICY

Review: Sedap.. sambal sedikit manis, tapi sedap, tak terlalu pedas.. banyak lauk..
English Review: Delicious.. the sambal is slightly sweet, but tasty, not too spicy.. plenty of side dishes.

Review: Kedai dah siap renovate cantik, bersih. Alhamdulilah time pergi tak ramai orang & senang cari parking. sedap la juga nasi lemak nya, ikan bilis dia crunchy, ayam pun beso penampo aku dia bagi. Total rm13 untuk nasi lemak + tempe +ayam goreng & teh ais
English Review: The shop has been nicely renovated, clean. Thankfully, there weren't many people when I went, and it was easy to find parking. The nasi lemak is delicious; the anchovies are crunchy, and the chicken they gave was substantial. The total was RM13 for nasi lemak + tempe + fried chicken & iced tea.

Review: Honestly, its too mediocre. Failed to find anything special about nasi lemak here as what had been viral about. The ayam goreng berempah is OK. Nasi too peroi (altho the lemakness taste quite OK). The sambal is (too darn) sweet and cair, which is a huge turn off.
English Review: Honestly, it's too mediocre. Failed to find anything special about nasi lemak here as what had been viral. The ayam goreng berempah is OK. The rice is too peroi (although the lemakness taste is quite OK). The sambal is (too darn) sweet and runny, which is a huge turn-off.

Review: Very nice Nasi Lemak! I am really surprised on how really good it is to eat here. The service is also really fast and efficient. The place are very clean too! Bravo! â€¦
English Review: Very nice Nasi Lemak! I am really surprised on how really good it is to eat here. The service is also really fast and efficient. The place are very clean too! Bravo! â€¦

Review: Nasi helok. Lauk helok. Senang kate cukup rase, cukup sifat. Nasi terase lemaknye. Sambal tak pedas sgt tak manis sgt. Elok je kejadiannye. Lauk plak berbagai2. Ade sambal sotong, rendang ayam, kerang sambal, paru, ayam goreng tu ade lah â€¦
English Review: The rice is good. The side dishes are good. Simply put, it has a satisfactory taste and quality. The rice has a noticeable richness. The sambal is not too spicy, not too sweet. It's just right. The variety of side dishes includes sambal squid, chicken rendang, cockles in sambal, lungs, and fried chicken.

Review: Very affordable price. The place is very clean and provide free filtered water, you will see a few Coway water filter around. Love the ikan bilis and sambal a lot, that i bought a tub of each home. They really have sufficient manpower to â€¦
English Review: Very affordable price. The place is very clean and provide free filtered water, you will see a few Coway water filter around. Love the ikan bilis and sambal a lot, that i bought a tub of each home. They really have sufficient manpower to â€¦

Review: Sambal Nasi Lemak is deliciousThere are a variety of side dishes, I ordered the chicken rendang nasi lemak which is the best, the service is ok even though there are a lot of people, the service is fast, because the way you want to eat there and the package is separated.
English Review: Sambal Nasi Lemak is deliciousThere are a variety of side dishes, I ordered the chicken rendang nasi lemak which is the best, the service is ok even though there are a lot of people, the service is fast, because the way you want to eat there and the package is separated.

Review: Taste the same from my last visit a few years ago which is great. The rice is lightly infused so you won't get that overwhelmingly "lemak" taste. Sambal is on the mild side so everyone can enjoy.
English Review: Taste the same from my last visit a few years ago which is great. The rice is lightly infused so you won't get that overwhelmingly "lemak" taste. Sambal is on the mild side so everyone can enjoy.

Review: come here bcoz of >6000 google reviews, taste so-so only, egg not fresh can see from the shape, parking cheapest RM3 same road, 8am already many people. Ayam rendamg too salty, RM10 nssi lemak + ayam rendang ok, just taste not as good as expected.
English Review: Came here because of >6000 Google reviews, taste is average only. The egg doesn't seem fresh, evident from its shape. Parking is the cheapest at RM3 on the same road. At 8 am, there were already many people. The ayam rendang is too salty. RM10 for nasi lemak + ayam rendang is okay, but the taste is not as good as expected.

Review: My husband and I loved this place! We were looking for a restaurant that specialized in no frills Nasi Lemak and we are so glad we decided on this place! Ordering was efficient because it was cafeteria style, and all of the sides were â€¦
English Review: My husband and I loved this place! We were looking for a restaurant that specialized in no frills Nasi Lemak and we are so glad we decided on this place! Ordering was efficient because it was cafeteria style,

Review: nasi lemak biasa sangat sangat. serupa nasi lemak kantin sekolah makcik tak pandai masak punya version. â€¦
English Review: The nasi lemak is very ordinary. It's like the school canteen version that Auntie, who isn't good at cooking, would make. ...

Review: been here many times. the place looks a lot cleaner and more spacious compared to many years ago. good to experience the food here although not the best nasi lemak for me personally. very sweet style of sambal. some nasi lemak sambal more â€¦
English Review: been here many times. the place looks a lot cleaner and more spacious compared to many years ago. good to experience the food here although not the best nasi lemak for me personally. very sweet style of sambal. some nasi lemak sambal more â€¦

Review: Big eating area.  Aircon area costs RM1 per person. Basic set starts at RM 5, with egg and ikan bilis
English Review: Big eating area.  Aircond area costs RM1 per person. Basic set starts at RM 5, with egg and ikan bilis

Review: At first agak sceptical jugak dgn kedaiÂ² viral ni. Tapi bila dah rasa sendiri, betul sedap dan harga berbaloi. Cuma akak yg jaga kaunter tu senyum lah sikit, gaduh dgn suami ke ape? Hahaha
English Review: At first, I was somewhat skeptical of these viral shops. But after trying it myself, it's really delicious, and the price is worth it. Just the lady at the counter, she could smile a bit, is she having a quarrel with her husband or what? Hahaha

Review: Went on a Sunday afternoon for lunch. Had no queue and service was fast and the staffs were friendly. Prices are affordable and very worth it for the food and portion you're paying. Variety of dishes to choose from for your nasi lemak. Nasi is creamy and light.
English Review: Went on a Sunday afternoon for lunch. Had no queue and service was fast and the staffs were friendly. Prices are affordable and very worth it for the food and portion you're paying. Variety of dishes to choose from for your nasi lemak. Nasi is creamy and light.

Review: 1st time dine here. purposely nasi lemak with lots lauk to choose. delicious and spacious area. parking is limited for road side.
English Review: 1st time dine here. purposely nasi lemak with lots dishes to choose. delicious and spacious area. parking is limited for road side.

Review: Their Nasi Lemak is truly splendid! The hype is real. If you guys want to try it, just ride the LRT and stop at Kampung Baru train stop. Just 3 minute walk to the restaurant. Donâ€™t go by car. Traffic is horrible.
English Review: Their Nasi Lemak is truly splendid! The hype is real. If you guys want to try it, just ride the LRT and stop at Kampung Baru train stop. Just 3 minute walk to the restaurant. Don't go by car. Traffic is horrible.

Review: Went there early around 6.30. no queue parked by the side of the road had ample parking spaces. Food was good but nothing extraordinary. Ayam rendang tasted quite good and portion was good.
English Review: Went there early around 6.30. no queue parked by the side of the road had ample parking spaces. Food was good but nothing extraordinary. Ayam rendang tasted quite good and portion was good.

Review: Not that great nasi lemak. Despite the options of lauk or dishes, the taste is like they are laden with MSG that makes you mouth dry and thirsty the whole day.
English Review: Not that great nasi lemak. Despite the options of lauk or dishes, the taste feels like they are laden with MSG, making your mouth dry and thirsty the whole day.

Review: Makanan dia biasa je la. Tapi harga dia mahal jugak.
English Review: The food is normal.But the price is expensive.

Review: Delicious food! I came here Sunday morning around 9am and waited 20 mins.. I went back again Monday morning and there was no wait.. really good Nasi Lemak
English Review: Delicious food! I came here Sunday morning around 9am and waited 20 mins.. I went back again Monday morning and there was no wait.. really good Nasi Lemak

Review: Memang rasa Nasi lemak real zaman kanak2 dulu 70an,80an dan 90an..bila makan teringat beli nasi dkt kampung2 dulu..lauk daging rendang dia sedap. â€¦
English Review: Indeed, it tastes like the real Nasi Lemak from the days of childhood in the '70s, '80s, and '90s. When eating, it brings back memories of buying rice in the villages back then. The beef rendang side dish is delicious. ...

Review: This place as a wide array of side dishes to choose from. Price is also reasonable with plenty of seating area. There was a line when I arrived but everything is very fast. I ordered 3 side dishes, ayam rendang, kerang and paru with Teh O â€¦
English Review: This place as a wide array of side dishes to choose from. Price is also reasonable with plenty of seating area. There was a line when I arrived but everything is very fast. I ordered 3 side dishes, ayam rendang, kerang and paru with Teh O â€¦

Review: Nice... byk pilihan lauk pauk... cuma loc di kpg baru... jln masuk sgt sesak.. jarangÂ² nk dpt waktu tak sesak.. parkingÂ² dlm Private area.. 3 jam rm5
English Review: Nice... a lot of choices for side dishes... just the location in Kampung Baru... the entrance is very congested.. rarely get a time when it's not congested.. parking is available in private areas.. 3 hours for RM5.

Review: Nasi dia kurang lemak mnkin sbb santan skrng dh naik harga kn, tapi blh la daripada x ada ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ â€¦
English Review: The rice is less creamy, perhaps because coconut milk has become more expensive now, but it's okay, better than having none.

Review: Kedai dah cantik. Bersih. Pekerja pun ramai. Kaunter dibahagi dua untuk dine in dan take away. Beratur pun tak lama. Meja pun banyak, tak perlu risau tak cukup tempat duduk. Nasi lemak biasa harga RM4 sepinggan. Ade telur rebus sebijik. Rasa masih sedap macam dulu. Cuma kalau bulan puasa, makan time malam nasi agak sejuk sedikit.
English Review: The shop is now beautiful and clean. There are many workers, and the counter is divided into two for dine-in and take-away. Even if there's a queue, it doesn't take long. There are plenty of tables, so you don't have to worry about not having enough seating. The regular nasi lemak is priced at RM4 per serving and comes with a boiled egg. The taste is still delicious, just like before. However, during the fasting month, when eating at night, the rice may be slightly cold.

Review: Customer friendly restaurant. Pukul 10 malam still meriah. Masuk kedai you can see 2 different lanes â€” dine in & takeaway. They have a lot of variety lauk. Just choose lauk apa and terus bayar. The lauks & nasi lemak sedap. Air you need to â€¦
English Review: Customer-friendly restaurant. It's lively even at 10 p.m. When you enter the restaurant, you can see two different lanes  one for dine-in and the other for takeaway. They offer a wide variety of side dishes. Just choose your desired side dishes and proceed to pay. The side dishes and nasi lemak are delicious. As for drinks, you need to...

Review: Large portion. Very tasty. Very popular. Thr place a bit hot and humid during midday but it's not a problem as the food and service is good.
English Review: Large portion. Very tasty. Very popular. The place a bit hot and humid during midday but it's not a problem as the food and service is good.

Review: This place good for tourist . Because they can know about nasi lemak at Malaysia . Sambal  also was good!! I really love it , btw they no branch , only at kg Baru!!! Donâ€™t worry about parking , because there a lot of parking but rm5 per â€¦
English Review: This place good for tourist . Because they can know about nasi lemak at Malaysia . Sambal  also was good!! I really love it , btw they no branch , only at kg Baru!!! Don't worry about parking , because there a lot of parking but rm5 per 3 hours â€¦

Review: One of the best Nasi Lemak at Kuala Lumpur! Highly recommend especially the ayam goreng. Definitely will come back again
English Review: One of the best Nasi Lemak at Kuala Lumpur! Highly recommend especially the ayam goreng. Definitely will come back again

Review: Staff dia duk ramai2 dlm kaunter amek nasi tu  tah apa dia borak2 pandang aku mcm aku ni ada hutang dgn dia! Makanan mahal nak mampus! Food was so so plk.Tgh duduk dkt table dia suruh pindah tempat duduk tempat lain yg tuk duduk 4 org je tak boleh duduk dkt meja 6org? Kau rasa!!aku dh duduk dh makan kot ! Mahal2 tp service out
English Review: The staff were crowded behind the counter, chatting amongst themselves, and they looked at me as if I owed them something! The food is ridiculously expensive! The food quality was mediocre. While sitting at a table, they asked us to move to another table meant for four people instead of six. Can you believe it? I was already seated and eating! The prices are high, but the service is out...

Review: Food was wonderful. The rendang beef retains it flavor even without the gravy showing it been slow cooked for a while. Generous quantity of the â€œsotongâ€, cockles and â€œsambalâ€. Place was very clean and very well organized. For air condition area you pay a nominal $1 ringgit. Worth it with the heat outdoor. Recommended ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ â€¦
English Review: Food was wonderful. The rendang beef retains it flavor even without the gravy showing it been slow cooked for a while. Generous quantity of the sotong, cockles and sambal. Place was very clean and very well organized. For air condition area you pay a nominal $1 ringgit. Worth it with the heat outdoor. Recommended

Review: [Halal] The rice was nice with coconut fragrance smell. Sambal was okay but the fried chicken was over fried for me.  Its something I won't cry for more to add. Cost: Myr14 inclusive the kerang and egg
English Review: [Halal] The rice was nice with coconut fragrance smell. Sambal was okay but the fried chicken was over fried for me.  Its something I won't cry for more to add. Cost: Myr14 inclusive the kerang and egg

Review: Very famous with their delicious nasi lemak, crispy chicken and other lauk. The taste was sweet and spicy, both mix with well. Other than that, mango and avocado shake also delicious and vitagen are free for kids. Besides, the staff are â€¦
English Review: Very famous with their delicious nasi lemak, crispy chicken and other dish. The taste was sweet and spicy, both mix with well. Other than that, mango and avocado shake also delicious and vitagen are free for kids. Besides, the staff are â€¦

Review: Kedai bersih dan selesa, cuma panas sikit di tengah hari. Maybe next time kena pasang aircond :)
English Review: The shop is clean and comfortable, just a little hot in the afternoon.Maybe next time you have to install aircond :)

Review: Lots of place to sit. Food is good. Parking might be little bit hard to get.
English Review: Lots of place to sit. Food is good. Parking might be little bit hard to get.

Review: Best mango shake and nasi lemak we have eaten in Kuala Lumpur. The flavor of the coconut rice for the national dish of the Malaysians was subtle but still tasty and fit perfectly with the other ingredients. Can only recommend to stop by here to indulge in both
English Review: Best mango shake and nasi lemak we have eaten in Kuala Lumpur. The flavor of the coconut rice for the national dish of the Malaysians was subtle but still tasty and fit perfectly with the other ingredients. Can only recommend to stop by here to indulge in both

Review: It's a wonderful experience the nasi lemak is aromatic just that the sambal for me is not to spicy.. for those who love not to spicy it's a best place for u to lepak.  But overall the food are satisfied. P/S Good Luck with the car park if u can find one
English Review: It's a delightful experience; the nasi lemak is fragrant, but the sambal, in my opinion, is not too spicy. For those who prefer less spiciness, it's an ideal place to hang out. Overall, the food is satisfying. P/S Good luck with finding a parking space if you can.

Review: One of the famous Nasi lemak you can get in KL. Some of Malaysian dont like as the sambal not to spicy, but good for someone who doesnt like spicy sambal
English Review: One of the famous Nasi lemak you can get in KL. Some of Malaysian dont like as the sambal not to spicy, but good for someone who doesnt like spicy sambal

Review: The best nasi lemak place in Kuala Lumpur! The coconut rice was very tasteful, the best I had so far. The chicken was very good, the sambal was delicious, and the egg/sardines/peanuts were included. Hygiene was good, it was cheap and local, can really recommend this place!
English Review: The best nasi lemak place in Kuala Lumpur! The coconut rice was very tasteful, the best I had so far. The chicken was very good, the sambal was delicious, and the egg/sardines/peanuts were included. Hygiene was good, it was cheap and local, can really recommend this place!

Review: Pertama kali pergi makan 23 Mei 2022. Ok lah rasanya... takda lah special mana pun nasi lemak dia. Biasa je rasa macam nasi lemak tepi jalan tu. Untuk datang balik ok lah untuk jalan2, singgah makan situ.
English Review: First time went to eat on May 23, 2022. It's okay, the taste... nothing special about its nasi lemak. It's just an ordinary taste like the nasi lemak by the roadside. For a return visit, it's okay for a stroll and a quick bite there.

Review: Makanan biasa. Tak nampak apa yg special nya. Harga mahal, tak munasabah dengan apa yg diambil, tahuÂ² kena bayar harga sekian. Staff cashier lelaki tak mesra pelanggan....
English Review: Ordinary food. Didn't see anything special about it. The price is high, not reasonable for what is taken, suddenly have to pay a certain amount. The male cashier staff is not customer-friendly.

Review: Overrated. Ayam berempah dah keras dan kering. Boleh jadi ayam goreng dah lama. Saya datang untuk berbuka. Attitude staff juga perlu diperbaiki. Customer depan saya tanya takda telur goreng dekat staff perempuan yang jaga kaunter makan. â€¦
English Review: Overrated. The spiced chicken was tough and dry, possibly indicating that the fried chicken had been prepared for a long time. I came for iftar. The attitude of the staff also needs improvement.

Review: I heard about these place , and went first time , very organised , very clean and bright place , only serve nasi lemak from morning till night,  variety dished to choose from,  big space to sit catering many people at one time,  only â€¦
English Review: I heard about these place , and went first time , very organised , very clean and bright place , only serve nasi lemak from morning till night,  variety dished to choose from,  big space to sit catering many people at one time,  only â€¦

Review: Ada beberapa benda aku boleh puji restoran ni. 1st, staff dia friendly. Aku tak sure sorang lelaki ni sape, tp dia duk berdiri depan kedai layan customer. Cara cakap dia elok je. â€¦
English Review: There are a few things I can praise about this restaurant. First, the staff is friendly. I'm not sure who this guy is, but he stands in front of the shop serving customers. His way of speaking is good. ...

Review: One of the best nasi lemak in the city.Everything very tasty and fresh.Always big queue in entance.Really recommend
English Review: One of the best nasi lemak in the city.Everything was very tasty and fresh.Always a big queue at the entrance.Recommend

Review: Nasi lemak wanjo ni memang sedap. Nasi die gebu dan terlerai. Servis cepat tak perlu tunggu lama walaupun dine in. Kalau datang kena cuba sambal kerang mmg sedapppp. Kerang nya gemukÂ².
English Review: Nasi Lemak Wanjo is indeed delicious. The rice is fluffy and well-cooked. The service is fast, and you don't have to wait long even when dining in. If you come, you must try the cockles sambal; it's really delicious. The cockles are plump and tasty.

Review: Fast, clean, yummy! Superb crew! Even though some were moody but a bunch of them were pleasant! I enjoy their nasi lemak and all their dishes!
English Review: Fast, clean, yummy! Superb crew! Even though some were moody but a bunch of them were pleasant! I enjoy their nasi lemak and all their dishes!

Review: Fuh nasi lemak wanjo ni tkyh komen apa apa sbb mmg sedap, and lain org lain selera. Bagi aku sendiri mmg sedap tak kisah nak makan situ or bawak balik. Kat bawah ni ada smoothie avocado hmm cuma tekak aku takleh terima benda ni sbb rasa dia lain macam. Haa kalau smoothie epal mmg function ðŸ’¯ â€¦
English Review: Wow, as for Nasi Lemak Wanjo, there's no need for any comments because it is truly delicious, and everyone has different tastes. For myself, it's really tasty, whether eating there or taking it away. Below, there's an avocado smoothie, but my palate can't accept it because its taste is different. Oh, if it's an apple smoothie, it's definitely effective!

Review: Sweet sambal that maybe some people doesn't like it. But their rendang is superb, queue quite long but fast
English Review: Sweet sambal that maybe some people doesn't like it. But their rendang is superb, queue quite long but fast

Review: This place was amazing for the price you pay. The portion size was good and the service was very fast even for the long queue outside the restaurant.
English Review: This place was amazing for the price you pay. The portion size was good and the service was very fast even for the long queue outside the restaurant.

Review: Came to test the over hyped nasi lemak. Can see decent number of people. Fast service. A lot of fans in the premise. RM1 charge to sit on an air conditioned room. Sadly for me..the food is not hot and thats a deal breaker. The sambal was a â€¦
English Review: Came to test the over hyped nasi lemak. Can see decent number of people. Fast service. A lot of fans in the premise. RM1 charge to sit on an air conditioned room. Sadly for me..the food is not hot and thats a deal breaker. The sambal was a â€¦

Review: Ini lauk i and my husband ambik lauk ayam goreng, tempe dan sambal kerang. Dua pinggan ni bersamaan rm31. Sambal sangat sedap. Hope next time, akan datang lagi.
English Review: These are the dishes my husband and I chose: fried chicken, tempe, and cockle sambal. These two plates cost RM31. The sambal is very delicious. I hope to come again next time.

Review: This place is elegant with an awesome vibe. I went for breakfast and the food was amazing. The service was speedy and friendly. Their SAMBAL KERANG are absolutely incredible! This lone visit has made this one of my favorite spots within KL.
English Review: This place is elegant with an awesome vibe. I went for breakfast and the food was amazing. The service was speedy and friendly. Their SAMBAL KERANG are absolutely incredible! This lone visit has made this one of my favorite spots within KL.

Review: First time here, cos coming for Saloma Bridge and drop by here for dinner. The steamed nasi lemak served with delicious sambal and crispy Ikan bilis. Overall, the Nasi Lemak just normal not so special or super delicious. Clean and spaces ambient.
English Review: First time here, because coming for Saloma Bridge and drop by here for dinner. The steamed nasi lemak served with delicious sambal and crispy Ikan bilis. Overall, the Nasi Lemak just normal not so special or super delicious. Clean and spaces ambient.

Review: Nasi tambah, sambal lebih, penting! Hahaha. Mmg sedapp. Tapi beratur panjang. Kat luar ada ice blended sedap. Parking susah.
English Review: Refill the rice, extra sambal, crucial! Hahaha. It's really delicious. But the queue is long. Outside, there's tasty ice blended. Parking is difficult.

Review: Datang untuk sahur. Sampai kedai dalam kul 3 lebih. Queue boleh tahan lah. Tapi service laju especially bahagian dine-in. â€¦
English Review: Came for sahur. Arrived at the shop around 3 plus. The queue was manageable. But the service was fast, especially for the dine-in section.

Review: A pretty good place to have nasi lemak. They have variety of lauk that you can choose like ayam goreng, telur mata, sotong, kerang, ayam masak merah, many more. The sambal is tasty enough. Not too spicy for me. And they're very generous â€¦
English Review: A pretty good place to have nasi lemak. They have variety of dishes that you can choose like ayam goreng, telur mata, sotong, kerang, ayam masak merah, many more. The sambal is tasty enough. Not too spicy for me. And they're very generous â€¦

Review: This  is one of The Best Nasi Lemak in KL . They set a standard price for thier food. I really love nasi lemak with rendang daging it's soo good but sometime i notice thier sambal becoming too sweet to eat during night. I think night shift guy not doing good job.
English Review: This  is one of The Best Nasi Lemak in KL . They set a standard price for thier food. I really love nasi lemak with rendang daging it's soo good but sometime i notice thier sambal becoming too sweet to eat during night. I think night shift guy not doing good job.

Review: Utter disappointment, more hype than the real thing, i don't mind the fairly high price, but the quality is below par for a place with such reputation. Will not recommend if you're looking for signature nasi lemak spot as there are many more place that are better.
English Review: Utter disappointment, more hype than the real thing, i don't mind the fairly high price, but the quality is below par for a place with such reputation. Will not recommend if you're looking for signature nasi lemak spot as there are many more place that are better.

Review: Nasi, ayam dia sedap. Bagi saya sambal dia agak kurang sikit sebab manis. Mungkin sebab supaya semua boleh makan. Tempat memang best. Bersih dan teratur
English Review: The rice, the chicken is delicious.For me, he was a bit less than sweet.Maybe the reason is so that everyone can eat.The place is the best.Clean and orderly

Review: Tahap kebersihan kedai mmg A la cuma parking susah sikit kat sini dan harga pun boleh tahan juga bagi sepinggan nasi lemak biasa RM5
English Review: The cleanliness level of the shop is top-notch. Just a bit challenging to find parking here, and the price is also reasonable, with a regular plate of nasi lemak costing RM5.

Review: Perfect ..ikan bilis dengan telur mata dia je pun dah sedap..sotong kembang dengan paru goreng superb...harga tak terlalu mahal..servis laju..joki ambik lauk ramai tak macam kat kedai nasi kandar..kedai bapak besar...kedai bersih..toilet bersih...surau pun ada..masalah parking je lah....
English Review: Perfect... the anchovies with sunny-side-up egg alone are delicious. The bloated squid with fried lungs is superb. The price is not too expensive, and the service is fast. There are many food attendants, unlike at nasi kandar shops. The shop is quite spacious and clean, with clean toilets, and there's even a prayer room. The only problem is parking.

Review: Super tasty and so well priced. Traditional Malaysian food and delicious
English Review: Super tasty and so well priced. Traditional Malaysian food and delicious

Review: Rice too little u need to add. Bergedil was good. And mango juice excellent. A bit pricey around rm12 to 15 per person
English Review: The portion of rice is insufficient; you might want to consider adding more. The bergedil was good, and the mango juice was excellent. The pricing is a bit high, around RM12 to RM15 per person.

Review: Ok drop by for quick brunch...more than 2 years since the last stop here. As usual parking is the main nightmare. Place has been renovated larger space...better flow n ample seatings. Food still good especially the ayam berempah. The only "complaint" its a bit more pricey now.
English Review: Okay, dropped by for a quick brunch... It's been more than 2 years since my last visit. As usual, parking is the main challenge. The place has been renovated, providing a larger space with better flow and ample seating. The food is still good, especially the ayam berempah. The only "complaint" is that it's a bit more pricey now.

Review: We arrived here on Friday night and it was packed. We are very lucky to get a parking spot in front of the place, it was RM5 for three hours. The traffic at the time was packed with cars so walking is not an unavoidable option. â€¦
English Review: We arrived here on Friday night and it was packed. We are very lucky to get a parking spot in front of the place, it was RM5 for three hours. The traffic at the time was packed with cars so walking is not an unavoidable option. â€¦

Review: Tempat lapang, selesa dan bersih. Ada dua lane, satu untuk dine in dan satu lagi untuk bungkus. Beratur juga x lama. Rasa masih sedap walaupun separuh lauk agak oily. Paru goreng recommended. Surau juga disediakan.
English Review: A spacious, comfortable, and clean place. There are two lanes, one for dine-in and another for takeout. The queue is not too long. The taste is still delicious, although some of the dishes are a bit oily. The fried lung (paru goreng) is recommended. A surau is also provided.

Review: Dah upgrade. Toilet ðŸš½ sngt bersih. Surau pon ada. Nasi lemak sedap pelbagai lauk. I like lauk limpa. Cuma parking situ limited. Parking berbayar ada kt depan kedai. Overall good dining experience. Nak tapau pastikan sambal lauk asing2 â€¦
English Review: Already upgraded. The toilet is very clean, and there's a surau. The nasi lemak is delicious with various side dishes. I like the side dish of liver (lauk limpa). However, parking is limited. Paid parking is available in front of the shop. Overall, it's a good dining experience. If you're taking away, make sure to separate the sambal for each side dish.

Review: I think the food okay boleh la especially the sambal kerang because they used fresh clam instead of frozen one. Must use grab to go here because its to difficult to find parking space during peak hour especially on lunch and dinner time, come early and park in front of the restaurant.
English Review: I think the food okay boleh la especially the sambal kerang because they used fresh clam instead of frozen one. Must use grab to go here because its to difficult to find parking space during peak hour especially on lunch and dinner time, come early and park in front of the restaurant.

Review: It's worth the trip if you're in KL. The food is amazing and mega cheap. There is delicious smoothies right outside and plenty of dessert places nearby too!
English Review: It's worth the trip if you're in KL. The food is amazing and mega cheap. There is delicious smoothies right outside and plenty of dessert places nearby too!

Review: Good flavors. Fried chicken is quite dry. Rendang beef is quite tough and not falling apart.
English Review: Good flavors. Fried chicken is quite dry. Rendang beef is quite tough and not falling apart.

Review: Decent food and flavours. Beef was tough but the taste was good. Overall nice place for lunch.  Clean toilets too
English Review: Decent food and flavours. Beef was tough but the taste was good. Overall nice place for lunch.  Clean toilets too

Review: Idk, but for those of you who said this nasi lemak is the best,  i guess you guys havenâ€™t tasted the real best nasi lemak. â€¦
English Review: I dont know, but for those of you who said this nasi lemak is the best,  i guess you guys haven't tasted the real best nasi lemak. â€¦

Review: robust, tasty, efficient, fast, civilized, clean, spaciousthe food is good, the price is reasonable here with the taste, you get checked for vaccinations, there are two counters for dine in and take out
English Review: Robust, tasty, efficient, fast, civilized, and clean. The food is good, and the prices are reasonable given the taste. There is a vaccination check, and there are two counters for both dine-in and take-out services.

Review: Ramai gile. Harga jangan cakap. Pandai2 tunjuk nak lauk apa. Mau garu kepala nk membayarnye. Sambal rase biasa je. Welp
English Review: There are a lot of people. Don't mention the prices. You need to point out which dishes you want. It can be a bit confusing to pay. The sambal tastes ordinary. Well.

Review: One of the best. Variety of side dishes to pair with nasi lemak. Cockles Sambal is my favourite
English Review: One of the best. Variety of side dishes to pair with nasi lemak. Cockles Sambal is my favourite

Review: The taste of nasi lemak is overrated. Sambal kerang and sambal sotong are obviously from canned food you can get from the market. The mango smoothie is good though.
English Review: The taste of nasi lemak is overrated. Sambal kerang and sambal sotong are obviously from canned food you can get from the market. The mango smoothie is good though.

Review: Nasi lemak + ayam + sotong + kerang = satisfied. Went there during buka puasa time as it is not so crowded and not so jam. The place is clean and brightly lit.
English Review: Nasi lemak + ayam + sotong + kerang = satisfied. Went there during buka puasa time as it is not so crowded and not so jam. The place is clean and brightly lit.

Review: Great to be back n to see the refurbished Wanjo! The nasi lemak was good but I must say the Village Park NL is nicer n more lemak. But the sambal was good n I like the sambal kerang.  Too bad they didnt serve kacang goreng n the ikan bilis a tad salty. Good process flow n clean toilets! Highly recommended!
English Review: Great to be back and see the refurbished Wanjo! The nasi lemak was good, but I must say the Village Park NL is nicer and more lemak. However, the sambal was good, and I like the sambal kerang. Too bad they didn't serve kacang goreng, and the ikan bilis was a tad salty. Good process flow and clean toilets! Highly recommended!

Review: Good clean restaurant. Food looks great but I was too full already to try many. I just ordered nasi lemak with chicken and it was good. Friendly people working inside too.
English Review: Good clean restaurant. Food looks great but I was too full already to try many. I just ordered nasi lemak with chicken and it was good. Friendly people working inside too.

Review: Nasi lemak kurang santan. Untuk paru goreng boleh cuba rebus dulu sebelum goreng. Terlalu keras nk makan. Sambal just nice tak pedas
English Review: The nasi lemak lacks coconut milk. For the fried lung, you can try boiling it before frying as it is too tough to eat. The sambal is just right, not too spicy.

Review: Overrated. Nasi lemak and side dishes were cold. Rice does not have the coconut flavor, sambal is just ordinary The temperature of the food wasn't up to food safety levels. I had better and fresh cooked nasi lemak.
English Review: Overrated. Nasi lemak and side dishes were cold. Rice does not have the coconut flavor, sambal is just ordinary The temperature of the food wasn't up to food safety levels. I had better and fresh cooked nasi lemak.

Review: Nasi sedikit, mintak extra pun tetap sikit.. cas mahal x berbaloi pergi makan disini.. staf isi nasi tidak senyum.. tidak di galakkan kesini. First and last dtg sini.
English Review: The rice is minimal, even when asking for extra, it remains scarce. The charges are high and not worth it to dine here. The staff filling the rice didn't smile. Not encouraged to come here. First and last visit.

Review: Tempat mkn yg tak ada aircond terlalu panas, terasa bahang atap zink, sehingga ada pekerja disitu mengeluh panas. Nk mkn tak selesa, blh hilang mood mkn. Kalau nk mkn selesa ada disediakan tempat yg ada aircond, tp kena byr rm1 sekepala.
English Review: A dining place without air conditioning can feel excessively hot, especially with the heat from the zinc roof. Some workers in the area have even complained about the heat. Eating in such conditions can be uncomfortable and may dampen the dining experience. If seeking a cooler environment, there is an air-conditioned space available, but visitors need to pay an additional RM1 per person.

Review: Satisfy with the food. Best nasi lemak. Eat it since 1998. The taste is still same as before. Very comfort and smell good prayer room. Nice clean toilet. Deserved 5 stars.
English Review: Satisfy with the food. Best nasi lemak. Eat it since 1998. The taste is still same as before. Very comfort and smell good prayer room. Nice clean toilet. Deserved 5 stars.

English Review: Best Nasi Lemak i ever eat. Clean area, fast services and reasonable prices. You can go with your family.

Review: One of the best nasi lemak i have ever tried in my entire life and the sambal is good but not the best. I wonder why the owner hired too many staff. Please consider keeping a small amount of quality staff instead of bunch of kids playing around. None of the staff are friendly.

Review: Overpriced. RM5.50 for nasi lemak biasa. Moreover no peanuts in the nasi lemak. Staffs at the counter not friendly. Sambal not spicy enough and portion not generous. Surcharge RM1 for the aircond room.

Review: Last datang before pandemik..masa tu kedai tak renovate lagi..sekarang..damn lawo..selesa pulak tu..ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘kali ni makan alhmdulillah puas hati..suka sbb byk pilihan lauk n lengkap aksesori diaðŸ˜…susah skrg nk jumpa nasi lemak yg cukup â€¦

Review: Konsep layan diri. Tiada service ke meja. Ada dua baris untuk beratur. Satu UTK dine in dan satu bungkus. Eloknya dua Line boleh UTK dine in dan bungkus sbb Line UTK dine in que. Review: The nasi lemak was alright but I have to say I have tasted better nasi lemak before. The sambal wasn't spicy enough to my liking but this is my personal opinion since I do love spicy food. The rice was fragrant and taste good. The chicken was a bit hard and dry for me. Lastly the kerang was cooked well and taste alright.

Review: The rice is fragrant with coconut. Their sauce is slightly on the sweeter side than spicy. Basic comes with rice, cucumber, sauce, fried anchofish, option of boiled or fried egg. â€¦

Review: Pergi hari biase tak ramai memang tak yah beratur. Nasi sedap bnyak jugak, sambal manis sikit pedas sikit yg penting sedap gila. Ambil lauk sotong dan ayam rempah dan air teh ice. Harga rm16 sangat berpatutan. Tempat makan bersih. Parking je susah skit siapa naik kereta. Motosikal tak ada msalah. 5/5 rate.

I would rate it 5/5.

Review: I like this place. It's serves delicious nasi lemak and you can choose different chicken, eggs and other toppings. Take your filled plate to cashier and pay for food and drinks there. Review: itâ€™s very famous place of nasi lemak so I decide to try it.I choose squid (sotong) which cost 7.5RM. ice lemon is just 1.5RM. itâ€™s cheap and very delicious. the coconut rice is hot and smelt good.Iâ€™m very keen of Malayian food but itâ€™s good with me.itâ€™s very easy to find this place, itâ€™s take 2 minutes walking from Kampung Baru LTR station.by the way the space is quite hot here.
English Review: It's a very famous place for nasi lemak, so I decided to try it. I chose the squid (sotong), which costs 7.5RM, and the ice lemon is just 1.5RM. It's cheap and very delicious. The coconut rice is hot and smells good. I'm very fond of Malaysian food, and it suits my taste. It's very easy to find this place; it takes 2 minutes walking from Kampung Baru LRT station. However, the space is quite hot here.

Review: The steamed nasi lemak served with delicious sambal and other tasty add ons like ayam goreng berempah, sambal sotong etc are absolutely pleasant treat for my hungry stomach today
English Review: The steamed nasi lemak served with delicious sambal and other tasty add ons like ayam goreng berempah, sambal sotong etc are absolutely pleasant treat for my hungry stomach today

Review: had Nasi Lemak with wide variety of non-veg dishes
English Review: had Nasi Lemak with wide variety of non-veg dishes

Review: Nasi lemak dan lauk sedap.. sambal tumisnya tidak terlalu pedas sesuai untuk kanak-kanak. Recommend!

Review: First time here. The nasi lemak somehow reminds me of my sekolah rendahâ€™s nasi lemak. The taste was exactly the same, hence Iâ€™m giving them 3 stars for this. However, the nasi lemak was damn overpriced ! First and last visit I would say. Other than the exact taste like my primary school, nothing special bout this place.

However, the nasi lemak was damn overpriced! First and last visit, I would say. Other than the exact taste from my primary school days, there's nothing special about this place

Review: The absolute best nasi lemak in Kampung Baru. It's a highlight of said place and I would always visit it whenever I'm there. The prices are reasonable and everything about the nasi lemak are just pure delicious. Definitely my favourite nasi lemak place in all of Kuala Lumpur
English Review: The absolute best nasi lemak in Kampung Baru. It's a highlight of said place and I would always visit it whenever I'm there. The prices are reasonable and everything about the nasi lemak are just pure delicious. Definitely my favourite nasi lemak place in all of Kuala Lumpur

Review: Neat. Clean. Good service. A little rice. The side dish is delicious and worth it. Sambal yums!Atmosphere is best for lunch and dinner.
English Review: Neat. Clean. Good service. A little rice. The side dish is delicious and worth it. Sambal yums!Atmosphere is best for lunch and dinner.

Review: Not sure what the hype is about! Everything was served lukewarm and the meat (I had rendang and fried chicken) was very dry and tough. Sambal was also far too sweet. Overall only the coconut rice was good. Do not recommend, there are other better Nasi lemak restaurants

Review: Clean premise and spacious. I rated service at 2 stars because there is no table service. Had to queue and you choose what you want in your Nasi Lemak.If you choose meat or Chicken the price Is RM 10. If you choose hard boiled egg it will â€¦
English Review: Clean premise and spacious. I rated service at 2 stars because there is no table service. Had to queue and you choose what you want in your Nasi Lemak.If you choose meat or Chicken the price Is RM 10.  â€¦

Review: Came all the way here as it kept being recommended as one of the best nasi lemak in town. Dont quite meet the expectations. The sambal was so so, a little too sweet to my liking. The rest of the dishes are average at best.
English Review: Came all the way here as it kept being recommended as one of the best nasi lemak in town. Dont quite meet the expectations. The sambal was normal, a little too sweet to my liking. The rest of the dishes are average at best.

Review: Delicious nasii lemak with a lot of choices lauk. Spaces eating place and very clean. Definitely will come again
English Review: Delicious nasi lemak with a lot of choices dishes. Spaces eating place and very clean. Definitely will come again

Review: This  is one of The Best Nasi Lemak in KL . They set a standard price for thier food. I really love nasi lemak with rendang daging it's soo good but sometime i notice thier sambal becoming too sweet to eat during night. I think night shift guy not doing good job.
English Review: This  is one of The Best Nasi Lemak in KL . They set a standard price for their food. I really love nasi lemak with rendang daging it's soo good but sometime i notice their sambal becoming too sweet to eat during night. I think night shift guy not doing good job.

English Review: Quick & easy nasi lemak joint. It costs RM8+ for a plate that include nasi lemak, sambal, cucumbers, and chicken. Then you can add on proteins like eggs or more chicken or cockles for additional price. â€¦

Review: Nasi lemak mantap.. Service laju..persekitaran bersih n selesa..Walau ramai customer tapi tempat duduk tetap ade..
English Review: Delicious nasi lemak. Fast service. Clean and comfortable environment. Even though there are many customers, there are still available seats.

Review: Sambal manis xkena dgn selera, ayam keras & kering mat maybe ak xde luck terkena yg overcooked punya ayam.
English Review: The sweet sambal doesn't match the taste, the chicken is tough and dry, maybe I was unlucky to get chicken that was overcooked.

Review: Best place to have breakfast in KL. Huge sitting area, various choices of dish, reasonable price. Definitely will visit again âœ¨
English Review: Best place to have breakfast in KL. Huge sitting area, various choices of dish, reasonable price. Definitely will visit again âœ¨

English Review: Morning 8:45 am so many people eat nasi lemak here so I come and try. We 4 person eating and 2 teh Tarik only Rm34.50 the price is very high and sambal not spicy for me.

Review: Cedok nasik kalut2 tu xpa lah sbb org ramai , tp bila mntak sambal asing buat muka pulak. Mcm kita ada kita mntak nasik free.
English Review: Scooping rice in a hurry is fine because there's a crowd, but when asking for extra sambal, they make a face. It's like we're asking for free rice.

Review: For me, the portion is small. But it is okay if you take side dishes. The rice not very lemak and taste good. Sambal not very spicy which is okay.

Review: The sambal was bagusðŸ‘ðŸ‘Œ, but they don't give kacang, which is my actually my favorite. But overall great experience ðŸ˜‰ â€¦
English Review: The sambal was excellent????, but they don't give peanuts, which are actually my favorite. But overall, a great experience????.

English Review: First time after refurbishment... looks spacious and exclusive. Many new/fancy drinks... the rice is indeed delicious, but as for the dishes, hmm.... homemade is better.

Review: Food was superb. Layanan terbaik.Even kakak there was very kind and alert me that the begedil contain beef when she know im hindu. Very good. Also the sambal was awesome.
English Review: The food was superb. Best service. Even the sister (referring to a female staff member) there was very kind and alerted me that the begedil contained beef when she knew I'm Hindu. Very good. Also, the sambal was awesome.

Review: Dlu kite agak kerap jugak dtg mkn sni. Tp da lama x dtg, td sempat singgah tghri. X jam. Nasi - Aroma nasi lemak dia mmg wangi. 1 of the best nasilemak. Sambal - tekstur pekat, manis2 skit. Xde bwg xde ikanbilis dlm smbal. Nk kata sedap sgt â€¦
English Review: In the past, we used to come here quite often. But it's been a long time since I last came, managed to stop by today at noon. Not crowded. Rice - The aroma of the nasi lemak is truly fragrant. One of the best nasi lemak. Sambal - Thick texture, slightly sweet. No onions, no anchovies in the sambal. Can't say it's very tasty

Review: Bagi 5star sbb cara diorg uruskan bisnes tu tiptop..ada dine in dan take away..nampak panjang drp luar sbb ada satu line tuk dine in n take away..bila da masuk dalam byk lagi ruang kosong.. dari segi rasa sambal biasa2 je.rasa sambal tu â€¦
English Review: Giving 5 stars because the way they manage their business is excellent. They have both dine-in and take-away options. It looks long from the outside because there is a separate line for dine-in and take-away. Once inside, there is plenty of empty space. In terms of taste, the sambal is just average.

Review: Satisfied ðŸ‘. I took nasi lemak kerang plus paru with additional nasi. Nasi lemak ayam, nasi lemak rendang best too. The price for me is quite expensive because nasi lemak biasa is rm5 compared in my place is still rm3. But the taste is good and nice. â€¦

Review: Ramai yang viralkan kedai ni katanya sedap nasi lemaknya. Jadi bila dah cuba, harganya tersangat mahal. Nasinya tak ada rasa berlemak, sambalnya terlalu manis, ikan bilis sangat sikit. Mungkin selera orang lain berbeza. Bagi saya cukuplah â€¦
English Review: Many have been viralizing this shop, claiming that its nasi lemak is delicious. So when I tried it, the price was extremely high. The rice has no rich taste, the sambal is too sweet, and there are very few anchovies. Perhaps others have different tastes. For me, it's sufficient

Review: For typical MALAY Malaysian like me,Nasi Lemak Wanjo just okay not to hype,can find much better Nasi Lemak.Sambal too sweet and Lemak in Rice was not enough,rice portion quite small for the price.Ayam Goreng Berempah for me was Main Star. â€¦

Review: Not the best nasi lemak but still good option to dine in
English Review: Not the best nasi lemak but still good option to dine in

Review: Had a great nasi lemak breakfast here. Nice coconut flavour to the rice, and the beef rendang and chicken were very good.
English Review: Had a great nasi lemak breakfast here. Nice coconut flavour to the rice, and the beef rendang and chicken were very good.

Review: Honestly, Wanjo has upped their game, and is now one of the best nasi lemak in Kampung Bharu, KL. I did a side-by-side comparison with Nasi Lemak Antarabangsa, and my conclusion is that Nasi Lemak Wanjo beats them on many levels. â€¦

Review: Lauk sedap tapi harga mahal. Telor mata goreng 1 RM 1:30 & telor rebus sebiji 1:30.
English Review: The dishes are delicious, but the prices are high. Fried eggs cost RM 1.30 each, and boiled eggs are also RM 1.30 each.

Review: No comment needed. One of the best SAMBAL NASI LEMAK selain restoran Lontong Klang dan Family Kopitiam di Klang. Both kedai di Klang ni ada sediakan nasi lemak since 1970s.

Review: Nasi, ikan bilis,  sambal sedap ðŸ˜‹ sotong,  kerang okay,  ayam masak merah so so only.  Should order ayam rempah as many people order. Teh tarik good. â€¦
English Review: Rice, anchovies, and sambal are delicious. Squid and cockles are okay, and the chicken cooked in red sauce is just average. Should order the spiced chicken, as many people do. The teh tarik is good.

Review: Good nasi lemak. Rendang daging best. Do note that they're closed for at least an hour on Friday at 1 pm for praying. Can park at the opposite parking but RM5 for max 3hours.
English Review: Good nasi lemak. Rendang daging best. Do note that they're closed for at least an hour on Friday at 1 pm for praying. Can park at the opposite parking but RM5 for max 3hours.

Review: The location is very close to LRT station.The nasi lemak is very delicious, the ikan bilis is crispy and they gave you very generous of sambal.  There was a queue not very long but they served very fast so you don't have to wait very long.  The atmosphere was very good as along the alley you can find lots of foods.Vegetarian options: You can have the nasi lemak and egg only and have juice or smoothies.
English Review: The location is very close to LRT station.The nasi lemak is very delicious, the anchovies is crispy and they gave you a very generous of sambal.  There was a queue not very long but they served very fast so you don't have to wait very long.  The atmosphere was very good as along the alley you can find lots of foods.Vegetarian options: You can have the nasi lemak and egg only and have juice or smoothies.

Review: Hmmm honestly had tastier nasi lemak. The sambal is abit sweet instead of spicy. Anchovies & fried chicken salty i must say. Sambal kerang abit disappoitment (i cant taste it,literally). Chicken rendang not so flavourful. Probably this is our 1st and last time coming here. Btw they were friendly towards foreigner ðŸ˜ â€¦
