Sambal kerang a bit disappoitment (i cant taste it, literally). Chicken rendang is not so flavourful. Probably this is our 1st and last time coming here. Btw they were friendly towards foreigner ðŸ˜ â€¦

Review: Terbaikkk...great and popular nasi lemak...it also near to popular Saloma Bridge that near to KLCC
English Review: The best...great and popular nasi lemak...it is also near the popular Saloma Bridge, which is close to KLCC.

Review: Fragrant coconut rice, sweet but not too spicy sambal. The sotong (squid) and kerang (cockles) sambal was good. â€¦
English Review: Fragrant coconut rice, sweet but not too spicy sambal. The sotong (squid) and kerang (cockles) sambal was good. â€¦

Review: Great nasi lemak place! Delicious with various side dishes to choose from. Affordable priced and ample seating.
English Review: Great nasi lemak place! Delicious with various side dishes to choose from. Affordable priced and ample seating.

Review: Best nasi Lemak, ling queuing with people, not matter Chinese, Malay or Indian. Sometimes tourists from different places. Is good to visit if you not so hungry.
English Review: Best nasi Lemak, long queue with people, not matter Chinese, Malay or Indian. Sometimes tourists from different places. Is good to visit if you not so hungry.

Review: Makanan nya biasa2 sahaja utk saya. Tapi restoran bersih dan selesa. Servis juga cepat
English Review: The food is normal for me.But the restaurant is clean and comfortable.Service is also fast

Review: Nasi lemak was very good to me, flavors were good. Best one Iâ€™ve had yet. Tried the squid which was also good.
English Review: Nasi lemak was very good to me, flavors were good. Best one I've had yet. Tried the squid which was also good.

Review: Long que but the service is fast, rendang ayam agak masin sedikit perbanding ayam masak merah... mungkin hari ni tukang masaknya terlebih letak garam...
English Review: Long que but the service is fast, chickens are a bit salty compared to red cooked chicken ... maybe today the cook is over salt ...

Review: Ordered 2 nasi lemak with 4x different types of sambal chicken along with deep fried chicken. All tastes different with unique flavourful taste. Large indoor open space dining area; serving sizes very generous value for money. Overall the food is great and a must try! Preferably dine in when the rice is nice and steaming hot.
English Review: Ordered 2 nasi lemak with 4x different types of sambal chicken along with deep fried chicken. All tastes different with unique flavourful taste. Large indoor open space dining area; serving sizes very generous value for money. Overall the food is great and a must try! Preferably dine in when the rice is nice and steaming hot.

Review: Tak berapa sedap la sangat. Boleh le makan. Panas sikit & stuffy. Servis hambar, staff pun muka ketat. Makanan masin
English Review: Not very delicious. Can eat. A bit hot and stuffy. Dull service, and the staff have stern faces. The food is salty.

Review: Nasi sedap ada aroma wangi santan berlemak, sambal sedap tambah lak sambal kerang dan bergerdil...mantap padu
English Review: Delicious rice with the fragrant aroma of rich coconut milk, tasty sambal, especially with added cockles and potato fritters... absolutely excellent.

Review: Gud foods.. will come when ever feel hunger for gud n tasty nasi lemaks
English Review: Good foods.. will come whenever feel hungry for good and tasty nasi lemak

Review: Love their sweety hot sambal. Perfect with fluffy rice & crunchy anchovies. Their paru berempah shouldn't be missed. It's full of flavor & crunchy!
English Review: Love their sweety hot sambal. Perfect with fluffy rice & crunchy anchovies. Their paru berempah shouldn't be missed. It's full of flavor & crunchy!

Review: Perfect Nasi Lemak right here! Sambal was spicy and slightly sweet, perfect for Singaporeans who are used to sweeter sambal. Rice was nice and fluffy and they were generous with the sambal sotong. Amazing place, will definitely be back again.
English Review: Perfect Nasi Lemak right here! Sambal was spicy and slightly sweet, perfect for Singaporeans who are used to sweeter sambal. Rice was nice and fluffy and they were generous with the sambal sotong. Amazing place, will definitely be back again.

Review: The best of the best Nasi Lemak in KL! Nasi yang sangat berlemak dikukus ditambah dengan sambal manis gitu. Ayam rendang tidak mengecewakan!! Antara paling sedap di KL!
English Review: The best rice dish in KL! The rice is incredibly flavorful, steamed to perfection, and complemented with sweet chili sauce. The rendang chicken is not disappointing! One of the most delicious dishes in KL!

Review: services pantas, sambal dia sedap ngam tak berapa pedas tak berapa manis, lauk pelbagai, pekerja ramai awek, rate harga rm13 gituu
English Review: Services are fast, the sambal is delicious not too spicy, various fish, many workers, rates rm13 price

Review: This eatery is very popular among locals, rarely seeing the quiet atmosphere of the customerâ€™s presence especially at breakfast and dinner ðŸ˜½ As in most other â€˜nasi lemakâ€™ restaurant, Nasi Lemak Wanjo is served with anchovies, boiled eggs, â€¦
English Review: This eatery is very popular among locals, rarely experiencing a quiet atmosphere due to the constant presence of customers, especially during breakfast and dinner. ?? As in most other 'nasi lemak' restaurants, Nasi Lemak Wanjo is served with anchovies, boiled eggs, and more.

Review: Good place to have nasi lemak. A lot of people but fast service. Reasonable price ðŸ‘ðŸ» â€¦
English Review: Good place to have nasi lemak. A lot of people but fast service. Reasonable price

Review: i pergi wanjo banyak kali tapi harini baru terasa nak review. Makanan sedap dan harga pun berbaloi. Tapi sebabkan staff semua tak friendly and cashier perempuan pendek sangat kurang ajar jadinya this is will be my last time makan sana. â€¦
English Review: I have been to Wanjo many times, but today I finally feel like leaving a review. The food is delicious, and the prices are reasonable. However, because all the staff are not friendly, and the short female cashier is very rude, this will be my last time eating there.

Review: Nasi lemak dia biasa je takde apa yang special datang sebab viral je
English Review: Their nasi lemak is just ordinary; there's nothing special about it. I came because it's viral.

Review: Rendang is definitely a to-die-for.  The fruit juices too... Although there was a long queue, the services were quite fast.
English Review: Rendang is definitely to die for. The fruit juices too... Although there was a long queue, the service was quite fast.

Review: Taste was good.. price was reasonable.... Bit hot to sit in open area but aircond room also available for RM1 per head.
English Review: Taste was good.. price was reasonable.... Bit hot to sit in open area but aircond room also available for RM1 per head.

Review: Parking sucks, roads are narrow and there are too many people walking in the middle of the road, but Wanjo's nasi lemak makes up for it! It's definitely better than Nasi lemak antarabangsa.
English Review: Parking sucks, roads are narrow and there are too many people walking in the middle of the road, but Wanjo's nasi lemak makes up for it! It's definitely better than Nasi lemak antarabangsa.

Review: Makanannya dlm kadar sederhana . Tapi terlalu mahal . Dh mcm mkn dkt hotel . Tapi layanan terbaik , suasana pun tetbaik .
English Review: Nasi lemak sedap dan affordable ðŸ˜‹ nasi lemak telur mata RM4. Sambal a bit manis (sebab suka pedas) ðŸ˜‚ SOP terjaga. Persekitaran bersih â€¦

Review: It was crazy queueing on the weekend. But they served pretty fast. The price was cheap & delicious. The place also clean.
English Review: It was crazy queueing on the weekend. But they served pretty fast. The price was cheap & delicious. The place also clean.

Review: Quite affordable price for kampung baru area. Very good service like Ikea, separate lane for take away & dine in
English Review: Quite affordable price for kampung baru area. Very good service like Ikea, separate lane for take away & dine in

Review: Nasi lemak sedap dan affordable ðŸ˜‹ nasi lemak telur mata RM4. Sambal a bit manis (sebab suka pedas) ðŸ˜‚ SOP terjaga. Persekitaran bersih â€¦
English Review: Delicious and affordable nasi lemak ??. Nasi lemak with fried egg is RM4. The sambal is a bit sweet (because I like it spicy) ??. Hygiene is well-maintained. Clean environment

Review: Nasi lomak yang digabungkan dengan sambal  yang sodap. Ayam godang.
English Review: Nasi lemak combined with delicious sambal. Spicy fried chicken.

Review: Tempat yang selesa.. space luas dan nasi lemak yang sedap..
English Review: Comfortable place .. Spacious space and delicious nasi lemak ..

Review: Ok laa. Mahal sikit dari biasa. ada macam2 lauk boleh letak. dekat situ ada jual smoothie sekali. Lepas raya haji nasi lemak naik harga.
English Review: Ok.It's a bit expensive than usual. There are all kinds of side dishes.There is a smoothie nearby.

Review: First time try makan sini..nasik sedap berlemak..sambal pun ok..test amek lauk ayam goreng dengan sambal kerang..ayam mantap..tapi sambal kerang kureng sikit..sambal dia tu mcm terlebih masam sikit..
English Review: First time trying here... the rice is delicious and rich. The sambal is okay too. Tried the fried chicken with cockle sambal... the chicken is delicious, but the cockle sambal is a bit lacking. The sambal seems a bit too sour.

Review: For 16 MYR, I got one curry chicken and one spices deep fried chicken along with the standard nasi lemak plate. Lots of tables available. If you want the Aircon room, pay 1 MYR.
English Review: For 16 MYR, I got one curry chicken and one spices deep fried chicken along with the standard nasi lemak plate. Lots of tables available. If you want the Aircon room, pay 1 MYR.

Review: The best and legendary nasi lemak in KL. The taste is authentic Kampung Baru nasi lemak since the 70â€™s. It offers an extensive choice of dishes which includes fried chicken, beef and chicken rendang, paru berlada, etc etc. Too many to â€¦
English Review: The best and legendary nasi lemak in KL. The taste is authentic Kampung Baru nasi lemak since the 70s. It offers an extensive choice of dishes, including fried chicken, beef and chicken rendang, paru berlada, and many more. Too many to mention.

Review: Not the best nasi lemak but good enough. Plus point is that there are many lauk to choose from
English Review: Not the best nasi lemak but good enough. Plus point is that there are many dish to choose from

Review: Lauknya banyak, nasi nya rasa lemak. Kuah agak manis. Boleh kata tak pedas. Datang lunch tak sesuai duduk luar, panas dan berbahang. kena masuk dalam bilik ada aircond, tapi kena caj RM1.00 sekepala.
English Review: There are many side dishes, the rice is rich in flavor. The gravy is somewhat sweet. It can be said that it's not spicy. Coming for lunch is not suitable to sit outside, it's hot and sunny. Need to go inside the room with air conditioning, but there's a charge of RM1.00 per person.

Review: Overrated. Half the people in the review section needs to get their taste buds checked. The only good thing I paid for was the mango shake.
English Review: Overrated. Half the people in the review section needs to get their taste buds checked. The only good thing I paid for was the mango shake.

Review: Antara nasi lemak tervaik di Kampung Baru. Tempat makan yang selesa.
English Review: Among the best nasi lemak in Kampung Baru.Comfortable dining.

Review: This ever popular nasi lemak at kg Baru, K.Lumpur is more that half a century old  selling only nasi lemak. The main menu is fried chicken and bioled egg with fried ikan bilis. Also serve is Sotong, rendang daging , paruand fried eggs. â€¦

Review: Ramai orang, sahur awal agaknya. Disebabkan ramai, jadi kena beratur. Sesak tapi masih boleh jalan. Biar lambat asalkan selamat, better late than never. â€¦
English Review: Many people, probably having an early sahur. Due to the crowd, there is a need to queue. It's crowded, but still manageable. Better to be late as long as it's safe, better late than never.

Review: Inside quite hot but the nasi lemak quite delicious

Review: Finally tried this famous nasi lemak place. Love the rice, has that pulut texture and taste. I only add on paru which was also good. Wasn't rubbery. Sambal wise, I prefer mine spicy. Theirs is more of the sweet sambal. Nasi lemak price starts from RM4.
English Review: Finally tried this famous nasi lemak place. Love the rice, has that pulut texture and taste. I only add on paru which was also good. Wasn't rubbery. Sambal wise, I prefer mine spicy. Theirs is more of the sweet sambal. Nasi lemak price starts from RM4.

Review: Food tastes really good, and if you don't understand the dishes, they will help to have your food

Review: Lots of customers especially weekend. Fast service order at cashier. Good food n drinks. Love rendang ayam. Mango shake n chocolate avocado very nice. Lots of mango pieces. We went into air-conditioning area with charge RM1 per person below 10 years old. Outside parking RM5 for 3 hours.
English Review: Lots of customers especially weekend. Fast service order at cashier. Good food and  drinks. Love rendang ayam. Mango shake n chocolate avocado very nice. Lots of mango pieces. We went into air-conditioning area with charge RM1 per person. Outside parking RM5 for 3 hours.

Review: Musim PKP ni kalau tak silap last beratur pukul 9.30PM kalau nak dine in. Kena pergi awal sebab beratur que panjang. Tapi makanan semua sedap, berbaloi beratur!
English Review: During this PKP season, if I'm not mistaken, the last time to queue for dine-in is at 9.30 PM. You have to go early because the queue is long. But all the food is delicious, worth the wait!

Review: 7/2022 - Still one of the best nasi lemak in Klang Valley. Recently renovated with 3 lots. Clean, bright & airy. There is even an AC room however RM1 per pax charge. Tonight we enjoyed our nasi lemak with their paru, rendang daging, begedil â€¦

Review: One of my favourite Nasi Lemak place. Even when they started years ago before the renovation. The sambal is a bit sweet, but it's really subjective. Review: Pass by this high rating nasi lemak spot. The place is clean and staffs are friendly and helpful. Sambal is the soul of the nasi lemak. And they have good soul over here :p taste is good and most importantly the price is reasonable! Price â€¦

The food provider at the counter should remind the kitchen staff to cook more fried chicken if it's running out. Thank you.

Review: Makanan x sedap langsungðŸ¤® kedai elok je cantik kalau nak melepak â€¦

Review: 1st time makan. Ada pelbagai lauk pauk. Sambal tak pedas, sesuai utk budak dan yg tak makan pedas. Since I like hot and spicy foods, I give 4 starts, kalau pedas, gerenti dapat 5 starts form me. As usual, difficult to find the parking if u want to dine in.

Since I like hot and spicy foods, I give it 4 stars. If it were spicy, I would definitely give it 5 stars. As usual, it's difficult to find parking if you want to dine in.

Review: Not bad laa.. Parking kg baru hmmm mcm tu jugak laaa..

Review: Great food! Best to let the staff recommend you a selection. Quick and easy to eat.
English Review: Great food! Best to let the staff recommend you a selection. Quick and easy to eat.

English Review: Good nasi lemak place. Period. Go at night especially when it's raining. Less people hahah

Yes you have to pay $1 per head but the heat outdoor with zinc roof is hot. Despite having lots of fans, it just circulating the heat.

Review: food okayla sedap just sambal a bit manis for me. siapa yg yk makan pedas akan enjoyla . servis cepat harga pun affordable . okaylah .

Review: Sambal dia manis2 sikit. Harga dia lebih sikit dari kedai nasi lemak biasa tapi still affordable. Parking dekat situ leceh sikit.

Review: sorry to say. bkn nk mengecam. tpi mmg layak 1 star ja aku bg, ngn pekerja cedok lauk pun rude ngn aku, minta lauk lain boh lauk lain. pastu aku minta tukar tarik muka kata xleh. aku g ber empat. mak aku ambik rendang ayam. balik mual2 â€¦
English Review: Sorry to say, not to criticize, but I can only give it 1 star. Even the workers who scoop the dishes were rude to me. When I asked for a different dish, they just put the same dish without changing. Then, when I asked for a replacement, they made a face and said it couldn't be done. I went with three others. My mom took the chicken rendang. Came back feeling nauseous.

Review: Delicious and wide range of side orders to choose from. The price depends of the side order u take, a lil pricy but if u crave for a gd nasi lemak, worth it lah. Oh parking is a prob. Kinda limited around this area
English Review: Delicious and wide range of side orders to choose from. The price depends of the side order you take, a little pricy but if you crave a good nasi lemak, worth it. Oh, parking is a probleem. Kinda limited around this area

Review: Bersih, cekap tp sambal xrasa sangat n harga agak premium
English Review: Clean, efficient but sambal not tasty. very premium price

Review: One male worker was very stingy with the Nasi Lemak portion. What do you get when you do this? Charge more if you want, to a certain level people can accept it if the food is tasty, but to do business like this is simply not acceptable. Kudos to the female staff who are much more considerate...

Charge more if you want, to a certain level people can accept it if the food is tasty, but to do business like this is simply not acceptable. Kudos to the female staff who are much more considerate...

Review: Lots of people but ample seats. Efficient system so the queue is long but quick. Great choices of side dish for the nasi lemak, love the paru and sotong. Sambal was a tad sweet to my liking as i  would enjoyed it more if its hotter. Well to each their own.

Review: One of the best nasi lemak in KL. Consistency is maintained. It tastes the same since i became a regular 5 years ago. My fav are ayam berempah & brgedil. A bit pricey compre to other places but quality is there..
English Review: One of the best nasi lemak in KL. Consistency is maintained. It tastes the same since i became a regular 5 years ago. My fav are ayam berempah & brgedil. A bit pricey compre to other places but quality is there..

English Review: Everything tastes basic and overpriced. You can find cheaper and tastier options outside. Also, the staff is very rude. You know what's a 5/5 here? Their bergedel.

Review: Nasi lemak ok,sambal tak pedas sangat sesuai dengan semua.

English Review: A must try when you are in Kuala Lumpur. Service was fast and efficient. Cleanliness is a little bit below par, otherwise satisfactory. Portion is very humble. Really worth the amount paid for.

Review: The rice is nice, sambal was mild not spicy....overall was OK but I wouldn't say it's the best nasi lemak in town though.... â€¦
English Review: The rice is nice, sambal was mild not spicy....overall was OK but I wouldn't say it's the best nasi lemak in town though.... â€¦

Review: My fav nasi lemak joint since 1980s... seen through so many changes to the "warong", but the great nasi lemak taste remains the same especially the key ingredient.... Sambal! and of course the nasi lemak kukus, crispy anchovies.. and many many lauks

Review: Bulan 8 hari tu makanan rasa sedap je. Tp kali ni dtg mcm dh kureng rsnya. Tnya husband ngan anak pn sama. Terkulat kulat ku nak habiskan nasi lemak tu. Makan sambil minum air teh o ais nya nk bg blh telan. Huhuhu
English Review: In August that time, the food tasted good. But this time, it came and the taste seems to have diminished. Asked my husband and child, and they felt the same. It was a struggle for me to finish that nasi lemak. Eating while drinking iced tea to make it swallowable. Huhuhu.

Review: Nasi, sambal semuaa sedapp!!! Siapa yg percaya review kata tak sedap tuuu mmg rugi
English Review: The rice, sambal, everything is delicious!!! Those who believe the reviews saying it's not tasty are really missing out.

Review: Chilli on the sweeter side whereas i prefer my sambal more savoury with a kick. Fried chicken also quite a let down with minimal rempahs to flood the nasi lemak. Enjoyed the rendang and ayam Masak merah. The variety available and fast moving queue is a plus!
English Review: Chilli on the sweeter side whereas i prefer my sambal more savoury with a kick. Fried chicken also quite a let down with minimal rempah to flood the nasi lemak. Enjoyed the rendang and ayam masak merah. The variety available and fast moving queue is a plus!

Review: One of the best nasi lemak in town, reasonable price and good to visit this neighborhood in center city
English Review: One of the best nasi lemak in town, reasonable price and good to visit this neighborhood in center city

Review: Everyone in KL knows the Nasi Lemak here is perfection. Fluffy rice, wide choice of curries and you can even get a fried egg on top. Old hands in KL know this us where you go.
English Review: Everyone in KL knows the Nasi Lemak here is perfection. Fluffy rice, wide choice of curries and you can even get a fried egg on top. Old hands in KL know this us where you go.

Review: I ate this last year(2022) and honestly it not delicious as shown in social media. Rice taste bland without santan and sambal taste like water. And also, the staff there not friendly and rude. Sorry for comment honestly but I hope they will change for better.
English Review: I ate this last year(2022) and honestly it not delicious as shown in social media. Rice tastes bland without santan and sambal tastes like water. And also, the staff there not friendly and rude. Sorry for comment honestly but I hope they will change for better.

English Review: Nice cozy place to eat good nasi lemak. Lots of variety of dishes to choose from, sambal is nice

English Review: The taste of nasi lemak very authentic and recommended for those who want to try the original nasi lemak, The rice is very aromatic, and sambal (sauce) super tasty and sweet. Marvelous!!

Review: MMG sedap..tapi harga dia Pon boleh tahan

Review: The place is very neat and clean. Very comfortable. Service laju. Makanan bagi aku tak berapa sedap. Aku pun taktau la, masin. Tak habis aku makan adeh.
English Review: The place is very neat and clean. Very comfortable seating and service. As for the food, it's not as delicious as I expected. I couldn't finish eating, to be honest.

Review: Always long Q for breakfast, other 'makan' time ok. The food satisfactory ðŸ˜‹ â€¦
English Review: Always a long queue for breakfast, but other meal times are fine. The food is satisfactory. ??

Review: Nasi and sambal taste good, but sambal kerang taste bit burnt and too overcooked, sambal sotong was so so.
English Review: Nasi and Sambal Taste Good, but Sambal Taste a Bit Burnt and Too Overcooked Sambal Taste, Sambal sauce Was average

Review: The portions arenâ€™t too big which is a good thing. Sambal is spicy. Sotong is ok. Tanglin is better.
English Review: The portions aren't too big which is a good thing. Sambal is spicy. Sotong is ok. Tanglin is better.

Review: Tried this last night. Didnâ€™t have to queue for long. The service was smooth. The rice was fragrant and tasted fine. The chicken was quite overcooked and the sambal was sweet for me.
English Review: Tried this last night. Didn't have to queue for long. The service was smooth. The rice was fragrant and tasted fine. The chicken was quite overcooked and the sambal was sweet for me.

Review: RM4 for nasi lemak & telur. RM4 for ayam. Expensive and taste is so-so only.
English Review: RM4 for nasi lemak & egg. RM4 for chicken. Expensive and taste is average only.

Review: One of the top choices to go searching and eating nasi lemak in KL. Mouth-watering food that you can choose from chicken to squids as side with the nasi lemak in Kampung Baru. Operation hours are very long, 06:30 AM until 01:00 AM! ur trolling that u say u cant go here cuz of lack of time bruuuu. Sangat Sedap.
English Review: One of the top choices to go searching and eating nasi lemak in KL. Mouth-watering food that you can choose from chicken to squids as side with the nasi lemak in Kampung Baru. Operation hours are very long, 06:30 AM until 01:00 AM!

Review: Best Nasi Lemak in town but might be a tad expensive for locals
English Review: Best Nasi Lemak in town but might be expensive for locals

Review: Nasi lemak was delicious. Huge portions..
English Review: Nasi lemak was delicious. Huge portions..

Review: Genuinely do not understand the hype over this. Rice had close to zero notes of santan, beef rendang was tough and chewy, and sambal was meh. Sprinkling of ikan bilis and kacang. Only good thing was service was efficient and polite.
English Review: Genuinely do not understand the hype over this. Rice had close to zero notes of santan, beef rendang was tough and chewy, and the sambal was disappointing. The only good thing is the service was efficient and polite.

Review: Clean & airy, no AC but lots of ceiling fans. A simple ambience, like kampung style kedai makan/food court/cafeteria. It's quite warm on a very hot & humid weather due to zinc roof. A variety of lauk pauk to add to the nasi lemak biasa. â€¦
English Review: Clean and airy, no air conditioning but lots of ceiling fans. A simple ambiance, like a kampung-style kedai makan/food court/cafeteria. It can be quite warm on a very hot and humid day due to the zinc roof. A variety of lauk pauk to add to the nasi lemak biasa.

Review: One of the more authentic local dining experience with very  friendly locals helping with identifying dish ingredients. â€¦
English Review: One of the more authentic local dining experience with very friendly locals helping with identifying dish ingredients. â€¦

Review: My favorite nasi lemak spot of all time. But they're very stingy with their portion, everything is measured down to every piece of rice. â€¦
English Review: My favorite nasi lemak spot of all time. But they're very stingy with their portion, everything is measured down to every piece of rice. â€¦

Review: Perghhh mana nak dapat harga nasi lemak+telur mata+burgerdil+ayam goreng=RM13 murah dan sangat berpatutan sesiapa yang datang ke kampung baru boleh cuba untuk ke kedai ini makanlah nasi lemak sehingga anda puas.
English Review: Wow, where else can you find nasi lemak + telur mata + bergedil + ayam goreng for RM13, cheap and very reasonable. Anyone coming to Kampung Baru should try this shop for nasi lemak until you are satisfied.

Review: They serve Malay traditional food.
English Review: They serve good malay traditional food.

Review: MY HEART TO NASI LEMAK AYAM BEREMPAH. Abit pricey but must try one !
English Review: My heart belongs to nasi lemak ayam berempah. A bit pricey but a must-try!

Review: Lagi sedap! Love the fluffiness of the jasmine rice, although the sambal is way too sweet for my taste. Satay Paru sedap pun! Jom come here!
English Review: Even more delicious! Love the fluffiness of the jasmine rice, although the sambal is way too sweet for my taste. The Satay Paru is delicious too! Let's come here!

Review: The nasi lemak taste for me is nothing special..I can taste cili boh in the 'sambal'..sevice is ok..but we been scoled by one of staff name Sham..that we cannot bring outside food..but actually we bought cendol durian across the street of â€¦
English Review: The nasi lemak taste, for me, is nothing special. I can taste cili boh in the 'sambal.' Service is okay, but we were scolded by one of the staff named Sham that we cannot bring outside food. But actually, we bought cendol durian across the street.

Review: We had sotong sambal, sambal kerang and fried chicken. The nasi lemak was aromatic and tasty.  The chicken was served hot and crispy. Sambal Sotong and kerang were also delicious and not so spicy. Most of the time the queue was long but the staffs were efficient, so serving time was considered quick.
English Review: We had sotong sambal, sambal kerang and fried chicken. The nasi lemak was aromatic and tasty.  The chicken was served hot and crispy. Sambal Sotong and kerang were also delicious and not so spicy. Most of the time the queue was long but the staff were efficient, so serving time was considered quick.

Review: Not my taste. Sambal nasi lemak terlampau manis. Nasi lemak x berlemak.
English Review: Not to my taste. The nasi lemak sauce is sweet, and the rice is not milky.

Review: Simply satisfying Nasi Lemak. A bit pricey but worth the value
English Review: Simply satisfying Nasi Lemak. A bit pricey but worth the value

Review: Sedap, harga dah terpampang so tau berapa utk each lauk ambik. Portion puas hati, tak kedekut. Service cepat.
English Review: Delicious, the prices are clearly displayed, so you know the cost for each dish you choose. Satisfying portions, not stingy. Fast service.

Review: Good nasi lemak. Spacious and clean. Long Q. Car parking may have problem.
English Review: Good nasi lemak. Spacious and clean. Long Q. Car parking may have problem.

Review: The nasi lemak is really delicious and has its own unique flavour. It was worth every inch of struggle to find a parking spot and wait in a long queue. Some tips are to go there early in the morning or find private parking for peace of mind.
English Review: The nasi lemak is really delicious and has its own unique flavour. It was worth every inch of struggle to find a parking spot and wait in a long queue. Some tips are to go there early in the morning or find private parking for peace of mind.

Review: Nasi lemak sedap.. lauk pun boleh tahan sedap.. sambal sedap cuma agak kemasaman sikit... orang ramai yakmat... beratur panjang... restoren cantik lengkap dengan surau semua.. cuma kebersihan tandas boleh dipertingkatkan... overall ok sangat...
English Review: Delicious nasi lemak, the side dishes are also quite tasty. The sambal is good, just slightly on the sour side. It's popular, and there's a long queue. The restaurant is nicely set up with a prayer room. The cleanliness of the restroom could be improved, but overall, it's very good.

Review: Actually nak try sebab ramai yg suggest. Okay la...not bad. Sambal tak pedas sgt. Ambik lauk sotong. Mmg banyak dia letak. Tak mahal sgt. Boleh repeat.
English Review: Actually, I wanted to try because many people suggested it. Okay, not bad. The sambal is not too spicy. I chose the squid side dish, and they gave a generous portion. The price is reasonable. I might come back again.

Review: First tima makan...boleyy la...surau pon ada
English Review: First time eating here..Not bad..Prayer room also available

Review: The best nasi lemak in town. This is my to go place for my once a month nasi lemak fix. The place is buzzing and have a good happy vibe. Service is super fast and crew is amazing.
English Review: The best nasi lemak in town. This is my go-to place for my monthly nasi lemak fix. The place is buzzing with a good, happy vibe. The service is super fast, and the crew is amazing.

Review: Maaf lah review jujur..orang negeri lain saja nak try kot memang sedap sebab tengok beratur panjang sangat..memang tak sedap rasa tak berbaloi dengan harga,makan sekali cukup lah buat raso raso..kedai bersih staf friendly..cuma makanan tu lah kurang memuaskan.
English Review: Sorry for the honest review. Maybe people from other states want to try it, and it may be good as the queue is long. However, the taste is not good, not worth the price. Eating it once is enough. The shop is clean, staff is friendly, but the food is not satisfying.

Review: The place is bright and spacious. White-tiled walls gives the impression of hygiene and spaciousness. The main serving island combines the food and beverage service. There are dedicated lanes for dining in and take away. â€¦
English Review: The place is bright and spacious. White-tiled walls gives the impression of hygiene and spaciousness. The main serving island combines the food and beverage service. There are dedicated lanes for dining in and take away. â€¦

Review: Secara keseluruhannya saya suka nasi lemak Wanjo..
English Review: Overall I like Nasi Lemak Wanjo ..

Review: One of the local tourist spot, and for locals to try aside from Nasi Lemak Antarabangsa and Pak Hassan. Wide selection of side dishes to eat with your nasi lemak, and good sambal (not too sweet), and large dining section with fans and â€¦
English Review: One of the local tourist spot, and for locals to try aside from Nasi Lemak Antarabangsa and Pak Hassan. Wide selection of side dishes to eat with your nasi lemak, and good sambal (not too sweet), and large dining section with fans and â€¦

Review: Nasi lemak rase standard shj x de lah special mane... X sedap sgt x jugak x sedap.. Biase2... Harga pon standard air buah ok sedap x manis sgt
English Review: The taste of the nasi lemak is standard, nothing special. It's not exceptionally delicious, just average. The price is also standard, and the fruit juice is good, not too sweet.

Review: Food was prepped immediately and tasted wonderful, service was quite good too. Place was cleaned nicely but I do think the atmosphere can be improved as the outdoor area was very hot.
English Review: Food was prepped immediately and tasted wonderful, service was quite good too. Place was cleaned nicely but I do think the atmosphere can be improved as the outdoor area was very hot.

Review: Ayam goreng sedapâ¤nasi lemak best tapi sambal masin sket..hehe..kedai bersih..best mkn kat sini..
English Review: Delicious fried chicken. The best nasi lemak but salty sambal..hehe..it's clean..best eating here

Review: I love the spread of various dishes that u can add on in your Nasi Lemak. My most favourite refreshing & healthy juice is Kedongdong with Asam boi (Ambarella + salted dried plum). Itâ€™s a MUST to drink & a MUST to go ðŸ˜ƒ â€¦
English Review: I love the spread of various dishes that you can add to your Nasi Lemak. My favourite refreshing and healthy juice is Kedongdong with Asam boi (Ambarella + salted dried plum). It's a MUST to drink & a MUST to go.

Review: Wouldve given five stars if the sambal wasnt on the sweeter side. Everything else was superb
English Review: Would've given five stars of the sambal wasn't on the sweeter side. Everything else was superb

Review: Location easy but parking difficult. Big place but very humid. Got aircon room but must pay RM1 per person. Service good. Normal taste and normal spread. Very pricey for too little rice.
English Review: Location easy to find but parking difficult. Big place but very humid. Got aircond room but must pay RM1 per person. Service good. Normal taste and normal spread. Very pricey for too little rice.

Review: This place stands out from the other Nasi Lemak eateries near Kg Baru. Nice fragrant rice with sweet sambal.
English Review: This place stands out from the other Nasi Lemak eateries near Kg Baru. Nice fragrant rice with sweet sambal.

Review: More hype than taste.. You can get better Nasi Lemak elsewhere.. Not saying it was bad, but for the hype, the taste tends to differ..
English Review: More hype than taste.. You can get better Nasi Lemak elsewhere.. Not saying it was bad, but for the hype, the taste tends to differ..

Review: Tempat ok..besar..tp sambal nasi lemak manis sgt..kalau tambah pedas sket mgkin ok..ni manis semata..mgkin kena buat 2pilihan kot pedas n tak pedas..
English Review: The place is good, spacious, but the nasi lemak sambal is too sweet. If they add a bit of spiciness, it might be okay. Right now, it's just sweet. Perhaps they should offer two options: spicy and non-spicy.

Review: The foods were delicious..cuma panas sikit makan kat dalam
English Review: The foods were delicious..it's just a little hot eating inside

Review: I am surprised by the long queue, but it didn't take long to order and get a seat. Great nasi lemak with a variety of dishes to add.
English Review: I am surprised by the long queue, but it didn't take long to order and get a seat. Great nasi lemak with a variety of dishes to add.

Review: Clean and nice environment. Service wise was ok,food as many know one of the best in Kg.Baru. The only issue is parking space,but you are in the middle of KL where there are a lot of different types of public transportation you can use. So go and enjoy their food.
English Review: Clean and nice environment. Service wise was ok,food as many know one of the best in Kg.Baru. The only issue is parking space,but you are in the middle of KL where there are a lot of different types of public transportation you can use. So go and enjoy their food.

Review: Not worth the hype. Taste acceptable. Portion acceptable. Price affordable. Not the best but can try for experience.
English Review: Not worth the hype. Taste acceptable. Portion acceptable. Price affordable. Not the best but can try for experience.

Review: Kalau beli nasi lemak tu, make sure ambil nasi lebih, confirm tak cukup kalau jenis yg makan bnyak tu. Harga standard kl, tapi kedai selesa n bersih.
English Review: If you buy that nasi lemak, make sure to take more rice, and confirm that it's not enough to eat it.KL standard prices, but the shop is comfortable.

Review: Everyone has his/her own taste buds. This nasi lemak is not to my liking. The potion (rice) is too small. The rice is just a regular nasi lemak, nothing special. The sambal is too sweet, may be to cater to wider customer base. My younger â€¦
English Review: Everyone has his/her own taste buds. This nasi lemak is not to my liking. The portion (rice) is too small. The rice is just a regular nasi lemak, nothing special. The sambal is too sweet, may be to cater to wider customer base. My younger â€¦

Review: fast service.. delicious nasi lemak with variety of food.. ayam goreng.. rendang.. paru and etc
English Review: fast service .. delicious nasi lemak with variety of food .. fried chicken .. rendang .. lung and etc.

Review: Be aware that this place is closed between noon and 3 pm. Food is worth it.
English Review: Be aware that this place is closed between noon and 3 pm. Food is worth it.

Review: Lot of option for Nasi Lemak. Not so bad 4/5
English Review: Lot of option for Nasi Lemak. Not so bad 4/5

Review: Good service, laju. Clean. Reasonable price. Variety of lauk nasi lemak. Dapat free Vitagen for my daughter, tq ðŸ˜™ â€¦
English Review: Good service,fast. Clean. Reasonable price. Variety of side dish of nasi lemak. Got free vitagen drink for my daughter, tq

Review: Food was mediocre, sambal is just sweet, most other dishes are sweet as well. If thatâ€™s what you prefer then great place for you. Price is reasonable.
English Review: Food was mediocre, sambal is just sweet, most other dishes are sweet as well. If that's what you prefer then great place for you. Price is reasonable.

Review: Very delicious nasi lemak with reasonable price, located near kampung baru LRT stesen
English Review: Very delicious nasi lemak with reasonable price, located near Kampung Baru LRT station

Review: Kedai pagi2 dah ramai beratur tapi sgt efficient tak tunggu lama pun. Kedai bersih dan kemas. tapiiii bagi saya nasi lemak nya average je. sambal xpedas lansung, nasi die sedap tp x la paling sedap (tp mcm beras berkualiti la), lauk banyak pilihan, harga lauk agak pricey tp okay je. plus point ada air cowayy free
English Review: The shop is crowded early in the morning, but it's very efficient, and you don't have to wait long. The place is clean and neat. However, in my opinion, the nasi lemak is just average. The sambal is not spicy at all, the rice is good but not the best (though it seems to be of good quality), there are many options for side dishes, and the prices are a bit high but still okay. A plus point is that they provide free Coway water.

Review: Nasik Lemak dgn pelbagai pilihan lauk. Minuman juga pelbagai. Tempat duduk banyak. Servis pantas.
English Review: Nasi Lemak with various side dish options. A variety of drinks are also available. Plenty of seating. Fast service.

Review: Firat ever visit to Nasi Lemak Wanjo. Was pleasantly surprised at how clean and spacious the place was, it was bright and nice. â€¦
English Review: First ever visit to Nasi Lemak Wanjo. Was pleasantly surprised at how clean and spacious the place was, it was bright and nice. â€¦

Review: Sedap... Have varieties of lauk to choose and sambal is not too spicy. As most people are well aware parking spaces are limited around the area with average charge of RM5 for 3 hours.
English Review: Delicious... Offers a variety of side dishes to choose from, and the sambal is not too spicy. As many people are aware, parking spaces are limited in the area, with an average charge of RM5 for 3 hours.

Review: super long queues in the morning, however the service is quite fast. if you stayed nearby, an option would be to opt for takeaway (separate queue & usually shorter). plus you wont have to find parking which is the ultimate challenge there. â€¦
English Review: super long queues in the morning, however the service is quite fast. if you stayed nearby, an option would be to opt for takeaway (separate queue & usually shorter). plus you wont have to find parking which is the ultimate challenge there. â€¦

Review: Kedai sangat bersih, wangi, makan an sedap.
English Review: The shop is very clean, fragrant, eating delicious.

Review: Best place for nasi lemak lovers. Self service at the counter, the turn over was overwhelmed everytime I visit. Cleaniness was superb.  Parking was disaster. Overall ðŸ‘ðŸ¾ðŸ‘ðŸ¾ðŸ‘ðŸ¾ â€¦
English Review: Best place for nasi lemak lovers. Self service at the counter, the turn over was overwhelmed everytime I visit. Cleaniness was superb.  Parking was a disaster.

Review: the taste still the same, and i still like it.. it's just the customer too crowded on the order counter.. hope there will be improvement on order counter without queing too long, for example.. taking order and pay 1st, then printout the calling number.. when the food ready, just callback the number so that can reduce queing lines..
English Review: the taste still the same, and i still like it.. it's just the customer too crowded on the order counter.. hope there will be improvement on order counter without queing too long, for example.. taking order and pay first, then printout the calling number.. when the food ready, just callback the number so that can reduce queing lines..

Review: Best nasi lemak! Cheap price, tasty, clean and friendly
English Review: Best nasi lemak! Cheap price, tasty, clean and friendly

Review: Nice worth the hype,nasi lemak got that aromatic santan taste.
English Review: Nice worth the hype,nasi lemak got that aromatic santan taste.

Review: My family was disappointed with the sotong it was old not fresh, had a fishy taste. The Rendang was hard to chew. â€¦
English Review: My family was disappointed with the sotong.it was frozen not fresh, and had a fishy taste. The Rendang was hard to chew.

Review: Average nasi lemak at best. Probably tailored for tourist taste buds. Look for other places if you're a Malaysian.
English Review: Average nasi lemak at best. Probably tailored for tourist taste buds. Look for other places if you're a Malaysian.

Review: Been wanting to get their famous nasi lemak for years..finally got it..everything is spot on ..from the sambal to all the side dishes..especially sambal sotong..
English Review: Been wanting to get their famous nasi lemak for years..finally got it..everything is spot on ..from the sambal to all the side dishes..especially sambal sotong..

Review: Alhamdulillah. Very delicious Nasi lemak you can taste the pure & real Santan in it. They have varieties authentic traditional Malay lauk like Rendang, ayam masak merah, kerang, paru berlado, sambal sotong & some others to go with it. Really delicious & worth every cent spent on it ðŸ˜ðŸ˜‹ â€¦

They have varieties authentic traditional Malay lauk like Rendang, ayam masak merah, kerang, paru berlado, sambal sotong & some others to go with it. Review: Had nasi lemak with ayam berempah and fried egg. Ayam berempah is average and fried egg...you can't possibly fail that...but the sambal tasted like something came in a bottle sold in supermarket. I wouldn't call it sambal tumis. Overpriced too. Won't come again and won't recommend.
English Review: Had Nasi Lemak with Ayam Berempah and fried egg. The Ayam Berempah is average, and the fried egg... you can't possibly fail that. However, the sambal tasted like something that came in a bottle sold in a supermarket. I wouldn't call it Sambal Tumis. Overpriced too. Won't come again and won't recommend.

Review: apa yg sedap pun x tau la..staff muka minx penyepak.tau la ko penat.tp klu muka cmtu baik x yh jd pelayan or tukang cedok nasi.. dh ckp nasi tambah ..tp nasi x tambah ..bila kira nasi tambah plak..mls nk memekak.. muka semua garing.. nasi â€¦
English Review: I don't know what's delicious here. The staff's face looks like they're asking for a kick. I understand you're tired, but if your face looks like that, it's better not to be a waiter or rice scooper. Already said to add rice, but the rice isn't added. When counting the rice, they add it lazily. Don't feel like arguing. Everyone's expression is dull.

Review: The taste of the rice at this nasi lemak house really miss the lemak. The sambal is not pedas and it is too sweet. The price is a bit pricey. It's okay la to try.
English Review: The taste of the rice at this nasi lemak house really miss the lemak. The sambal is not spicy and it is too sweet. The price is a bit pricey. It's okay to try.

Review: Looking thru all the reviews I do have high expectations for Nasi Lemak Wanjo but kinda disappointed as the sambal turned out very sweet as all sambal will be the base of most of it dishes like cockles, sotong all will be sugary sweet...but the rendang chicken and beef is good...
English Review: Looking thru all the reviews I do have high expectations for Nasi Lemak Wanjo but kinda disappointed as the sambal turned out very sweet as all sambal will be the base of most of it dishes like cockles, sotong all will be sugary sweet...but the rendang chicken and beef is good...

Review: Wanjo memang bagus.. tempat luas, bersih. Hari ini I nak bfast sini, ada customer, dia ambik semua kerusi dari another table.. Crew Wanjo datang bawa kerusi spare gantikan kerusiÂ² tu. Wahh I sangat kagum ðŸ˜..tak pernah lagi restoranÂ² lagi buat macam ni.. Sangat customer centric!! Syabas â€¦
English Review: Wanjo is really good. The place is spacious and clean. Today, I wanted to have breakfast here, and there was a customer who took all the chairs from another table. The Wanjo crew came with spare chairs to replace those chairs. Wow, I am very impressed! I have never seen other restaurants do this. Very customer-centric!! Well done!

Review: Decent location, tasty nasi lemak, great price. Totally recommended
English Review: Decent location, tasty nasi lemak, great price. Totally recommended

Review: 1st time mari nasi lemak wanjo.. berdekatan dgn LRT kg baru hnya 300meter jer ke kedai nasi lemak wanjo..kedai bersih, ada byk meja.. sambil menaip rasa kecir air liur..

Review: Clean and service was fast even with the crowd. Nasi lemak was nothing special but its open till late.
English Review: Clean and service was fast even with the crowd. Nasi lemak was nothing special but its open till late.

Review: Drink all good,sambal sweet,sotong doesn't taste superb,flat taste,atmosphere OK.....quite clean but heaty
English Review: Drink all good,sambal sweet,sotong doesn't taste superb,flat taste,atmosphere OK.....quite clean but heaty

Review: The food was all pretty cold. The rice was decent, sambal too, but again cold. The chicken in particular was extremely dry and not good at all. The space is pretty nice and open though, and the drinks are good.
English Review: The food was all pretty cold. The rice was decent, sambal too, but again cold. The chicken in particular was extremely dry and not good at all. The space is pretty nice and open though, and the drinks are good.

Review: First time dtg for take away okay..2nd time dtg dine in..beratur bukan kejap tau.panjang sgt que.tp kita bole sabar sbb nak makan kan.tp you! (Staff perempuan yg agk tua'tgk dr muka) tak bole ke ada adab?wheres ur manner? Tahu penat tapi â€¦
English Review: First time coming for take away was fine. The second time, I came for dine-in. The queue was not short, it was very long. But we can be patient because we want to eat. But you! (Referring to the older female staff, judging from her face) Can't you have some manners? Where is your courtesy? I understand you're tired

Review: Local hangout for Nasi Lemak. Great tasting food.  Approx 10 RM per dish + tax
English Review: Local hangout for Nasi Lemak. Great tasting food.  Approximation 10 RM per dish + tax

Review: Fast and good. I propose Wanjo to have a super fragrance rice option  in green for uber-eating-experience (limited qty daily). Special price...
English Review: Fast and good. I propose Wanjo to have a super fragrance rice option  in green for uber-eating-experience (limited quantity daily). Special price...

Review: Price wise a bit high maybe bcoz in the middle of kl. Taste okay. Not really great, sambal quite sweet but not spicy. Good for foreigners.

Review: Lauk tidak banyak pilihan tetapi sedap.

Review: Sedap dan harga berpatutan

The good thing about this place is that this place is very clean and spacious, and the service is really quick. I would eat at this place again if I was already in the area.

Review: I have been craving for an authentic Nasi Lemak ever since I arrived in KL and this place definitely did not disappoint. Premium price point but that's only because I took more options. Word of caution though - the place is a roadside stall, so don't expect restaurant standard hygiene. It's all about good food.

Premium price point but that's only because I took more options. Word of caution though - the place is a roadside stall, so don't expect restaurant standard hygiene. It's all about good food.

She could have spoken nicely because we were just hungry. If not for that, we would have left a long time ago. She handled it indifferently.
