Nasi Lemak(A fragrant coconut rice served with hard-boiled/fried egg, cucumbers, anchovies and peanuts) is served with delicious protein accomplishments here(kept in trey for self-serve).

Review: Great food especially Nasi Lemak Sotong !! A must meals to try everytime come here
English Review: Great food especially Nasi Lemak Sotong !! A must meals to try everytime come here

Review: Nasi lemak with lots of lauk pauk. Spacious room to dine in. Eventhough the queue is quite long, it didn't take long to get your food. The nasi lemak taste good.
English Review: Nasi lemak with a variety of side dishes. The dining space is spacious. Even though the queue is quite long, the wait for your food is not extensive. The nasi lemak tastes good.

Review: Over price and the sambal is too sweet ... Full of sugar
English Review: Over price and the sambal is too sweet ... Full of sugar

Review: Sambal utk hari ni manis sgt sampai x rasa aroma tumisan cili tu..cadangan sy maybe wanjo boleh buat a few taste of sambal from level sgt pedas,sederhana pedas dan kurang pedas..Apa yg best di sini adalah lauk pauk yg pelbagai mmg padan utk dimakan dgn nasi lemak
English Review: The sambal for today is overly sweet, to the extent that you can't taste the aroma of sauted chili. My suggestion is that perhaps Wanjo can offer a few variations of sambal, ranging from very spicy, moderately spicy, to less spicy. What's best here is the variety of side dishes that complement the nasi lemak.

Review: Pada pandangan sy, Nasi lemak terbaik lah setakat ni yg ada di KL. Semua best. Tempat mkn pun dah selesa, tempat ambil makanan n bayaran pun teratur. Service mmg pantas. Harga makanan sgt berpatutan.
English Review: In my opinion, the best nasi lemak in KL so far. Everything is excellent. The dining area is comfortable, the food pickup and payment areas are well-organized. The service is really fast. The food prices are very reasonable.

Review: Not bad la. Not the best but fast service
English Review: Not bad la. Not the best but fast service

Review: Prices are high and portion per pax are small. Very unfriendly atmosphere especially from the cashier. No smile, no greetings. Not a norm in Malay community though. Very business, no nonsense vibes. Dont like it.
English Review: Prices are high and portion per pax are small. Very unfriendly atmosphere especially from the cashier. No smile, no greetings. Not a norm in Malay community though. Very business, no nonsense vibes. Dont like it.

Review: Such a nice place , Very comfortable and fast service
English Review: Such a nice place , Very comfortable and fast service

Review: Sambal mcm dah kurang sikit. Tapi tempat dah renovate cantik, kemas. Meja dan kerusi pun banyak. Jus dan smoothe buat pun ada. Sedap pun sedap.
English Review: The sambal seems to be a bit less, but the place has been beautifully renovated, neat and tidy. There are plenty of tables and chairs. They also offer juices and smoothies. It's delicious.

Review: delicious nasi lemak,but its really hot during the days..not so convenient sitting inside..asked for take away are kinda good option..also the menu are a bit pricey but its reasonable for its taste
English Review: delicious nasi lemak,but its really hot during the days..not so convenient sitting inside..asked for take away are kinda good option..also the menu are a bit pricey but its reasonable for its taste

Review: Sedap dan byk pilihan...cuma orang luar pasti terkejut dengan harga di sini. …
English Review: Delicious and a lot of options ... Only outsiders must be surprised at the price here.

Review: Yg elok :Lauk sedap (acceptable) dan tempat duduk byk.Yg tak elok :nasi ciput,harga mahal,tempat duduk luar xde penebat pada siling, makan panas berpeluh2 rasa bahang ptg dan tengahari
English Review: The good: Tasty dishes (acceptable) and plenty of seating. The not-so-good: Small portion of rice, high prices, outdoor seating without shade on the ceiling, eating in the heat feels sweaty and hot in the afternoon and noon.

Review: Clean outlet. Adhered to all SOPs. Taste of food is superb and price is also reasonable. Portion of the fried chicken is big n quite crispy. The sambal cuttlefish n fried 'paru-paru lembu' were prepated to perfection. And.... the amount
English Review: Clean outlet. Adhered to all SOPs. Taste of the food is superb and the price is also reasonable. The portion of the fried chicken is big and quite crispy. The sambal cuttlefish and fried 'paru-paru lembu' were prepared to perfection.

Review: Their nasi lemak was great! Also their teh tarik. 15 ringgits for all, not bad.
English Review: Their nasi lemak was great! Also their teh tarik. 15 ringgits for all, not bad.

Review: The Nasi Lemak was tasty. Enjoyed it thoroughly, super fast service too. However, the rice portion was quite small, but one may ask for extra rice ( chargeable RM1). Paid RM 6.50 for basic Nasi Lemak set + kerang sambal. Worth it, recommended!
English Review: The Nasi Lemak was tasty. Enjoyed it thoroughly, super fast service too. However, the rice portion was quite small, but one may ask for extra rice ( chargeable RM1). Paid RM 6.50 for basic Nasi Lemak set + kerang sambal. Worth it, recommended!

Review: Sape yg ada darah tinggi better jgn makan laa nasi lemak ni! First try makan last masin ingat tekak yg salah lepastu harini try beli lagi, bagi family semua makan nasi lemak ni semua kata masin!
English Review: Those with high blood pressure better not eat this nasi lemak! First try was the last, thought it was just a fluke, but bought it again today, and everyone in the family said it's salty!

Review: Nasi lemak dengan macam2 lauk, harga takderla melampau Dan takyah beratur Lama..klu nk dok tempat aircond, sorang RM 1
English Review: Nasi lemak with various side dishes, the price is not too expensive, and there's no need to wait for a long time. If you want to sit in the air-conditioned area, it's an additional RM 1 per person.

Review: It is one the best nasi lemak in town which I find it consistent throughout years since my first experience many years back.
English Review: It is one the best nasi lemak in town which I find it consistent throughout years since my first experience many years back.

Review: Good nasi lemak with great fried chicken!!
English Review: Good nasi lemak with great fried chicken!!

Review: Recommended restaurant. Worthy to a try here
English Review: Recommended restaurant. Worthy to a try here

Review: Makanan sedap. Tapi tuh la. Bila beratur dekat tmpt boleh dine-in. Then nak order sekali utk bungkus, satu je pesanan utk tapau. Seorang pekerja lelaki org nya
English Review: The food is delicious. But here's the thing. When queuing at the place for dining in and then wanting to order for takeaway, they only allow one order for takeaway. It's a policy by one male staff.

Review: Food was good. For breakfast, its advisable to come early before 730am as u wont hv to queue for too long. You can get take out also for those at home even if you are dining in. Just ask at the counter when u are paying they can arrange it.
English Review: Food was good. For breakfast, its advisable to come early before 730am as you won't have to queue for too long. You can get takeout also for those at home even if you are dining in. Just ask at the counter when you are paying they can arrange it.

Review: The place is clean and has a lot of waiters. They have different stations for those who plan to tapau and those who wish to dine in. Service is fast. Of course, to any nasi lemak diehard fan the sambal is the key to nasi lemak's deliciousness. The sambal is a bit swert, if you prefer your sambal to be on the sweeter side, then this is your place. Reasonable price
English Review: The place is clean and has a lot of waiters. They have different stations for those who plan to takeaway and those who wish to dine in. Service is fast. Of course, to any nasi lemak fan, the sambal is the key to nasi lemak's deliciousness. The sambal is a bit sweet, if you prefer your sambal to be on the sweeter side, then this is your place. Reasonable price

Review: OVERRATED.lousy sambal.lousy waitress.i have tasted much better nasi lemaks.NEW place.much organized.Better lighting at night.THE LAST place to go for a NASI LEMAK.Parking: Impossible to get one
English Review: OVERRATED.lousy sambal.lousy waitress.i have tasted much better nasi lemaks.NEW place.much organized.Better lighting at night.THE LAST place to go for a NASI LEMAK.Parking: Impossible to get one

Review: Nasi lemak nya sedap! Delicious!
English Review: The nasi lemak is delicious!Delicious!

Review: Kuah dan ayam sedap.. nasi ok
English Review: The gravy and the chicken are delicious .. Rice is ok

Review: Very delicious ?? food available... Must visit and try.
English Review: Very delicious food... Must visit and try.

Review: Dlu2 mase kecik ingat lagi tiap kali dtg kl mesti mkn nlwkb nie time tu memang sedap giler tpi sekarang lain sgt rasenye jadi kurang sedap plak sambal rase asap api memang lain dri yg dlu punye entah la
English Review: Back when I was younger, I still remember that every time I came to KL, I would always eat at NLWKB. At that time, it was incredibly delicious. But now, it's very different, and the sambal tastes smoky, quite different from what it used to be, I don't know why.

Review: delicious!!! worth the price
English Review: delicious food!!! worth the price

Review: Neighbour to nasi lemak antarabangsa. Nasi lemak wanjo have its own unique twist and flavour profile when come in making their own nasi lemak. While there do try their sambal it's uniquely taste with fragrant Nasi in banana leaf
English Review: Neighbour to nasi lemak antarabangsa. Nasi lemak wanjo have its own unique twist and flavour profile when come in making their own nasi lemak. While there do try their sambal it's uniquely taste with fragrant rice in banana leaf

Review: The best Nasi Lemak in Malaysia..Makan sekali, pasti makan berkali-kali. Rasa sungguh sedap, tambah tak terhingga-hingga. Mimpi, rindu hingga air liur mengaliur
English Review: The best Nasi Lemak in Malaysia. Eat it once, and you'll surely eat it again and again. The taste is truly delicious, endlessly satisfying. It's so good that dreaming about it and missing it make your mouth water.

Review: Bukan selalu pekena Nasi Lemak Manis
English Review: Not always craving for Sweet Nasi Lemak.

Review: As usual kena beratur tapi cepat Dan servis memang terbaikkk...nice Nasi Lemak, lauk2 memang sedappp...Sambal kerang, rendang and paru goreng terbaikk...recommended and worth for family...orang bujang
English Review: As usual, you have to queue, but it's fast, and the service is truly the best. The Nasi Lemak is nice, and the side dishes are really delicious. The cockle sambal, rendang, and fried lung are excellent. Highly recommended and worth it for families and singles alike.

Review: biasa saja sambal manis tak ada ikan bilis
English Review: Just average, sweet sambal without anchovies.

Review: Nasi lemak wanjo has been around for a long time and their longevity in this business is due to the consistency of their nasi lemak.
English Review: Nasi lemak wanjo has been around for a long time and their longevity in this business is due to the consistency of their nasi lemak.

Review: Nasi Lemak is awesome eapecially when its hot
English Review: Nasi Lemak is awesome especially when it's hot

Review: Walaupun menu dia nasik lemak biasa harga rm 6.50 (kalau tambah lauk ayam harga lain) tapi sedap yakmat fuuuu rugi tak tambah
English Review: Even though the menu is just regular nasi lemak priced at RM 6.50 (if you add chicken, the price is different), it's incredibly delicious. It's a loss if you don't add extras.

Review: overrated price for nasi lemak - could be because its one of the popular tourist attraction.
English Review: overrated price for nasi lemak - could be because its one of the popular tourist attraction.

Review: Iconic Malaysian dish you can't missed. Perfect taste of sambal and choices of sides including the tasteful rendang.
English Review: Iconic Malaysian dish you can't missed. Perfect taste of sambal and choices of sides including the tasteful rendang.

Review: The nasi lemak is very good despite the price is cheap. Rm4 u can get nasi lemak ayam and the chicken is your standard chicken size. The table arrangement is far to each other hence its safe during this pandemic. Park at the valet given , rm5 for 3 hours.
English Review: The nasi lemak is very good despite the price being cheap. For RM4, you can get nasi lemak with chicken, and the chicken is a standard size. The tables are arranged far apart, making it safe during this pandemic. Valet parking is available, costing RM5 for 3 hours.

Review: Makanan ok cumanya kalau boleh gunakan QR code untuk bayaran lebih baik. Setakat ni hanya boleh gunakan kad bank atau transfer online sahaja.
English Review: The food is okay, but it would be better if QR codes could be used for payments. So far, only bank cards or online transfers are accepted.

Review: Parking agak susah...bagi yang bermotor...mudah...servis cepat..
English Review: Parking is rather difficult ... for motorized people ... easy ... fast service ..

Review: Nasi sikit dan mahal. Rm4 nasi biasa. Lauk ok, dan ice blended lagi ok.
English Review: Small portion of rice and expensive. RM4 for regular rice. The side dishes are okay, and the ice blended is even better.

Review: Nasi lemak yang sedap dengan harga berpatutan. Would probably come again soon
English Review: Nasi lemak is good at affordable prices.Would probably come again Soon

Review: An authentic test with international flavour suitable for those who can take too spicy food. The queue is long, but with fast service and SOP is strictly observed. Good for family too
English Review: An authentic taste with international flavour suitable for those who can take too spicy food. The queue is long, but with fast service and SOP is strictly observed. Good for family too

Review: The best nasi lemak with sweet sambal.
English Review: The best nasi lemak with sweet sambal.

Review: Sedapp banyak pilihan lauk pauk , staff friendly
English Review: Delicious, with a lot of choices for side dishes. Friendly staff.

Review: Tak pernah menyesal datang sejak umur 12 tahun. Wanjo ni antara peniaga nasi lemak yang dah lama berkampung kat kg baru. And apa yang kita boleh puji, selain dari nasi lemak dia yang signature, adalah effort and hospitality services daripada pihak kedai. Setiap tahun mesti ada improvement dari segi sistem pemilihan dish, beratur and bayar. Juga renovation kedai dia juga akan bertambah baik dari masa ke semasa. Inilah yang dipanggil terbaik.
English Review: Never regretted coming since I was 12 years old. Wanjo is among the nasi lemak vendors that have been long-established in Kg Baru. What we can praise, besides their signature nasi lemak, is the effort and hospitality services from the shop. Every year, there is always improvement in terms of the dish selection system, queuing, and payment. Also, the renovation of the shop continues to get better over time. This is what we call the best.

Review: If you're looking for for a delicious & affordable Nasi Lemak in Kampung Baru, KL, look no further... Clean, quick & friendly staff. Their Milo Ice is a must have!
English Review: If you're looking for for a delicious and affordable Nasi Lemak in Kampung Baru, KL, look no further... Clean, quick & friendly staff. Their Milo Ice is a must have!

Review: Among the best nasi lemak in town. Love the varieties of dish to choose from. With fragrance rice, steam to perfection. If you are in Kampung Baru, a visit to this place is a must for all Nasi Lemak lovers
English Review: Among the best nasi lemak in town. Love the varieties of dish to choose from. With fragrance rice, steam to perfection. If you are in Kampung Baru, a visit to this place is a must for all Nasi Lemak lovers

Review: Pilihan lauk yg banyak dan sedap
English Review: A lot of side dishes

Review: Good nasi lemak with a balanced taste of spicy and sweet. It is served hot and fresh. Portion was reasonable with different meat add ons. Staffs were very friendly. Service is very fast. Plenty of seats for everyone
English Review: Good nasi lemak with a balanced taste of spicy and sweet. It is served hot and fresh. Portion was reasonable with different meat add ons. Staffs were very friendly. Service is very fast. Plenty of seats for everyone

Review: Tgh renovate skang...tp nasi mmg sedap. Mahal sket jek la
English Review: Currently undergoing renovation, but the rice is indeed delicious. Just a bit more expensive.

Review: Biase2 je but the avocado blend is the best, campur skali dgn kiwi tu mmg tip top
English Review: Just average, but the avocado blend is the best, especially when mixed with kiwi, it's really top-notch.

Review: Sedap ?? .New setup, newlook.More systematic, huge, clean,friendly.Even the toilet also dah macam RnR ??
English Review: Delicious. New setup, new look. More systematic, huge, clean, and friendly. Even the toilet feels like a rest stop.

Review: I had my Nasi Lemak Sotong here.Overall okay dan sedap. Sambal dia manis & pedas campuran yang ngam!
English Review: I had my nasi lemak here.Overall is okay and delicious.Sambal is sweet & spicy mixed mix!

Review: Situ ada 2 line. Line dine in & line bungkus. If you nak bungkus, better cari lain. Lama nau nunggu bungkus. 1st I beratur dekat line dine in, lepastu I rasa nak bungkus lepak tempat lain. Orang yang beratur depan I dekat line dine in dah habis makan, barulah I dapat order for tapau.
English Review: There are two lines there. One for dine-in and the other for takeaway. If you want takeaway, it's better to find another place. The wait for takeaway is quite long. At first, I lined up in the dine-in line, but then I felt like taking away, so I went to another place. The people in front of me in the dine-in line had already finished eating before I could place my takeaway order.

Review: Best nasi lemak in town
English Review: Best nasi lemak In Town

Review: Nasi lemak was delicious but not the best I have tasted. Service was fast. There was someone who helped us find our seats, unlike other Malay restaurants which usually will keep you waiting unattended, but this one you will feel welcomed. Many workers to serve your drinks very fast. For the nasi lemak, you need to line up and pay before you eat.
English Review: Nasi lemak was delicious but not the best I have tasted. Service was fast. There was someone who helped us find our seats, unlike other Malay restaurants which usually will keep you waiting unattended, but this one you will feel welcomed. Many workers to serve your drinks very fast. For the nasi lemak, you need to line up and pay before you eat.

Review: Food is good but slightly salty for my taste
English Review: Food is good but slightly salty for my taste

Review: Place is quite nice, the food is tasty and more choice you can choose
English Review: Place is quite nice, the food is tasty and more choice you can choose

Review: If you look beyond the traffic jam, it's a great place for nasi lemak.. recommended
English Review: If you look beyond the traffic jam, it's a great place for nasi lemak.. recommended

Review: One of the best nasi lemak i had.. Love the sambal
English Review: One of the best nasi lemak i had.. Love the sambal

Review: Dia jenis yang masakan manis tapi sedap. Harga mahal dengan apasal takde kacang doh?
English Review: The sambal is kind of sweet but delicious.Price is expensive with no beans.

Review: Nasi lemak here is great?? First time coming just for take away, nor prefer to dine in cus the traffic is slow and the staff greet very well ! And also friendly staff love it ?? Will comes here again ????????
English Review: Nasi lemak here is great! This is my first time coming just for takeout; I prefer not to dine in because the traffic is slow, and the staff greeted me very well! Also, the staff is friendlyI love it! Will come here again for sure!

Review: Food is delicious. Overall good. But, there is a staff ,female tall,very rude. Throwing utensil, scolding other staff... not pleasant at all...
English Review: Food is delicious. Overall good. But, there is a staff ,female tall,very rude. Throwing utensil, scolding other staff... not pleasant at all...

Review: Very nice nasi lemak..good taste also...can go there again....yum2
English Review: Very nice nasi lemak..good taste also...can go there again.

Review: The place is just okay but the food is a little bit pricey compare to its competitors. The servers esp the one attending to your nasi lemak look uninterested in doing their job.
English Review: The place is just okay but the food is a little bit pricey compared to its competitors. The servers especially the one attending to your nasi lemak look uninterested in doing their job.

Review: Overpriced. Rasa kurang. Nasi lemak tanpa kacang.Tempat selesa dan bersih, kipas byk. Service cepat.
English Review: Overpriced. Feel less. Nasi lemak without beans. The place is comfortable and clean, the fan. Service is fast.

Review: Nasi lemak femes ni di kampung baru, beratur panjang kaw, kena sabar je la kalu Nak makan ni sebab weekend kan biasa la semua keluar hangout.
English Review: This famous nasi lemak in Kampung Baru always has a long queue. You just need to be patient if you want to eat here because, on weekends, everyone tends to go out and hang out.

Review: Spoilt for choices of the lauk pauk to accompany the nasi lemak. Of course paru is my favourite and the fried chicken is juicy enough ! My only complaints is the sambal is way to sweet for my taste. Overall good nasik lemak if you don’t mind the price ??
English Review: Spoilt for choices of the dishes to accompany the nasi lemak. Of course, lung is my favourite and the fried chicken is juicy enough! My only complaint is the sambal is way too sweet for my taste. Overall good nasi lemak if you don't mind the price ??

Review: tasty but pricey. restaurant is very clean and got a lot of ceilings fan. need to pay rm1 for air-conditioned room
English Review: tasty but pricey. restaurant is very clean and got a lot of ceilings fan. need to pay rm1 for air-conditioned room

Review: Servis laju. Makan sedap. Sotong lembut. Nak makan nasi lemak sedap tanpa ragu, boleh datang sini
English Review: Speed service.Eat well.Soft squid.To eat delicious nasi lemak without hesitation, you can come here

Review: Biasa jek nasi lemak nye...Xde pe yg special... Xde sedap mana pun
English Review: Just an average nasi lemak... Nothing special... Not particularly delicious.

Review: Mantap. Sedap. Keadaan dalaman simple, tapi yang penting bersih. Pekerja memang pantas clearkan pinggan bagi yg dah selesai makan. Air filter free pun disediakan kot-kot la perlu extra air kalau kepedasan. Hehehe..
English Review: Steady.Delicious.The internal condition is simple, but the important thing is clean.Workers are quick to clear the dishes for those who have finished eating.The free water filter is provided with extra water when it comes to fragrance.Hehehe ..

Review: The restaurant ambiance is like a typical Melayu Restaurant which is modest yet comfy. There are a lot of side dish you can choose along with its famous nasi lemak, from egg, chicken, to seafood. I don't really like its sambal, though.
English Review: The restaurant ambiance is like a typical Melayu Restaurant which is modest yet comfy. There are a lot of side dish you can choose along with its famous nasi lemak, from egg, chicken, to seafood. I don't really like its sambal, though.

Review: Seriously the best Nasi Lemak in town! Even though it's forever long queue, but don't worry, there are always seats available unless you're coming in a big group! Also, if you are coming to 'tapau' or take-away, you don't have to queue with all the customers who want to eat-in. There will another line just for that. Awesome!
English Review: Seriously the best Nasi Lemak in town! Even though it's forever long queue, but don't worry, there are always seats available unless you're coming in a big group! Also, if you are coming to 'tapau' or take-away, you don't have to queue with all the customers who want to eat-in. There will another line just for that. Awesome!

Review: This Nasi lemak are Good but sadly the take away queue were too long, I'm standing 45 minutes but still did not get my nasi lemak, the managment need to improve their services, so far i noticed only 2 workers attending take away customers..
English Review: This Nasi lemak are Good but sadly the take away queue were too long, I'm standing 45 minutes but still did not get my nasi lemak, the managment need to improve their services, so far i noticed only 2 workers attending take away customers..

Review: Nasi nya sedap dan lembut sambal pun sedap dengan berbagai pilihan lauk2 Saya suka sambal sotong dgn limpa sekarang dah ada fresh juice,ice cream teh tarik dia terbaik kedai pun dah bertambah selesa Tak sabar nak makan di kedai I likeeeeee ??
English Review: The rice is delicious and tender, and the sambal is tasty with various choices of side dishes. I like the sambal sotong and limpa. Now they have fresh juice, ice cream, and teh tarik, which are the best. The shop has become more comfortable. Can't wait to eat at the restaurant. I like it!

Review: One of my personal favourite nasi lemak shop. The soft and fragrant rice combined with the delicious beef rendang and sweet and spicy sambal, it's just superb. Delicious.
English Review: One of my personal favourite nasi lemak shop. The soft and fragrant rice combined with the delicious beef rendang and sweet and spicy sambal, it's just superb. Delicious.

Review: The nasi lemak tasted plain white rice and the sambal was just ok. Portion also too little for6 a basic RM4 per plate. It was not to my expectation as the place was too overated in social media...not recommended for nasi lemak lover. Normal roadside stall tasted better.
English Review: The nasi lemak tasted like plain white rice and the sambal was just ok. The portion is also too little for a basic RM4 per plate. It was not to my expectation as the place was too overrated in social media...not recommended for nasi lemak lover. Normal roadside stall tasted better.

Review: Food was fine, nothing great. Big portion. Clean and comfy. Pay 1rm and u get to sit at the air conditioned area
English Review: Food was fine, nothing great. Big portion. Clean and comfy. Pay 1rm and you get to sit in the air conditioned area

Review: Its not a satisfied visit. The nasi lemak don't taste like Malaysian.
English Review: Its not a satisfied visit. The nasi lemak don't taste like Malaysian.

Review: The first time I ate their nasi lemak wif ayam goreng was nice.. But second time the chicken doesn't taste the same and their sambal was too sweet.. The third time their ayam goreng was burnt and hard to chew.. And there was hair in my daughter's nasi lemak.. Seems like the quality is not same as first.. And taste differs each time.. disappointed..
English Review: The first time I had their nasi lemak with fried chicken, it was nice. However, the second time, the chicken didn't taste the same, and the sambal was too sweet. The third time, the fried chicken was burnt and hard to chew, and there was hair in my daughter's nasi lemak. It seems like the quality is not the same as the first time, and the taste varies each time. Disappointed.

Review: Tempat yang sesuai untuk sejumlah yang ramai kerana tempat yang besar, meja makan yang banyak dan 'turn over' yang cepat. Masa menunggu tidak lama. Nasi lemak ok cuma sambal 'kureng' berkenan sikit.
English Review: The perfect place for a large number of places, large dining tables and fast turnover. The waiting time is not long. Nasi lemak is ok, just sambal is not satisfied a little.

Review: 2 stars because their nasi lemak just taste ok. Nothing special. Not worth my time to find parking and have to queue for food. Their avocado smoothies is the worst i ever taste! They use unripe avocado. It taste extremely bitter. End up have to throw away , waste my RM7
English Review: 2 stars because their nasi lemak just taste ok. Nothing special. Not worth my time to find parking and have to queue for food. Their avocado smoothies is the worst i ever taste! They use unripe avocado. It taste extremely bitter. End up have to throw away , waste my RM7

Review: Good nasi lemak with necessary condiments (ground nuts, fried anchovies, cucumber, boiled egg).Sambal is little bit sweet but still tasty.Overall not the best nasi lemak but still enjoyable to eat
English Review: Good nasi lemak with necessary condiments (ground nuts, fried anchovies, cucumber, boiled egg).Sambal is little bit sweet but still tasty.Overall not the best nasi lemak but still enjoyable to eat

Review: We visited on a sunday morning. There was already a queue at 830am, though it was well managed by the staff. As for the food, we generally like the side dishes (rendang,ayam merah,begedil and paru) though it was disappointing that they weren't warm and was pretty much cold
English Review: We visited on a sunday morning. There was already a queue at 830am, though it was well managed by the staff. As for the food, we generally like the side dishes (rendang,ayam merah,begedil and paru) though it was disappointing that they weren't warm and was pretty much cold

Review: Biasa biasa. Tapi harga agak mahal compare dengan nasi lemak biasa kedai Mamak.
English Review: Normal. But the price is quite expensive compared with the regular nasi lemak of the Mamak shop.

Review: The rice was nice and fragrant..... But the sambal just average..... Bit pricey.... But understandable because it's steam rice and big ikan bilis.... Bergedil sedap giler... Must try
English Review: The rice was nice and fragrant..... But the sambal just average..... Bit pricey.... But understandable because it's steam rice and big ikan bilis.... Bergedil sedap giler... Must try

Review: Nasi lemak sedap cukup rasa, ayam goreng rangup. Tapi yang paling best memang sambal dia. Harga pun berpatutan
English Review: Nasi lemak is delicious enough, crunchy fried chicken. But the best thing is sambal. The price is reasonable

Review: The taste is too salty. It's too pricy.Parking: No parking lot
English Review: The taste is too salty. It's too pricy.Parking: No parking lot

Review: Nasi ok,tp sambal manis,
English Review: Rice ok, but sweet sambal,

Review: Nasi lemak sedap. Rasa lain dr biasa. Pilihan lauk pun byk.Recommanded.Tempat bersih, selesa & luas.Ada surau & bilik air yg bersih.Sesuai utk kunjungan family & grouping
English Review: Delicious nasi lemak. The taste is different from the usual. Many choices of side dishes. Recommended. The place is clean, comfortable, and spacious. There is a clean prayer room and restroom. Suitable for family visits and group gatherings.

Review: Cozy and clean. The nasi lemak was the best in KL. Even price to be compare with normal stall quite expensive. But its worth the pay. Recommended for first time who come to KL Kg Bharu. Must Try !!!
English Review: Cozy and clean. The nasi lemak is the best in KL. Even compared to normal stalls, the price is relatively high, but it's worth the payment. Recommended for first-timers visiting KL Kg Bharu. Must try!!!

Review: Menu nasi lemak yang cukup enak dengan pelbagai jenis lauk pauk sebagai pilihan untuk dinikmati ketika berkunjung ke sini.
English Review: The nasi lemak menu is delicious with different types of side dishes as an option to enjoy when visiting here.

Review: Love this place. The best Nasi Lemak.
English Review: Love this place. The best Nasi Lemak.

Review: Selesa but panas sbb xde aircond ?.Makanan ok. Biasa je.
English Review: Comfortable but hot because there's no air conditioning ?. The food is okay. Just average.

Review: The Best Nasi Lemak in Town
English Review: The Best Nasi Lemak in Town

Review: Please, if you do have big appetite (even for a small stomach) , do ask for additional rice (nasi tambah). I'm pretty sure you won't regret it. The rice smells good, the shop is pretty clean and neat.
English Review: Please, if you have a big appetite (even with a small stomach), ask for additional rice (nasi tambah). I'm pretty sure you won't regret it. The rice smells good, and the shop is pretty clean and neat.

Review: So so nasi lemak and lauk. Price also okay. But the beef rendang is too chewy. Ayam merah is pretty nice
English Review: Average nasi lemak and side dishes. The price is okay. But the beef rendang is too chewy. Ayam merah is pretty nice

Review: Not bad. Was told amazing stories about the restaurant but didn't meet my expectation. I believe the rate is just 3 star. Staff not so warm servicing you, 3 star food. Probably the variety of lauk why people rate so high..
English Review: Not bad. Was told amazing stories about the restaurant but didn't meet my expectation. I believe the rate is just 3 star. Staff not so warm servicing you, 3 star food. Probably the variety of side dish why people rate so high..

Review: Nasi lemak dia mmg sedap.. nasi serui2 x lembik.. makan mmg puas sbb bnyk pilihan lauk kat sini.. yg nk jaga diet jgn dtg.. nnt lari diet
English Review: Their nasi lemak is really delicious. The rice is fragrant and not mushy. Eating here is satisfying because there are many choices of side dishes. Those who want to watch their diet, don't come here, or else your diet will be ruined.

Review: Good place to have nasi lemak. Variety of addons/lauk. Fast service. Got free water dispenser too for the customer there ??
English Review: Good place to have nasi lemak. Variety of add-ons/side dishes. Fast service. There is also a free water dispenser for customers there. ??

Review: Harga dah melantun2 naik. Tp rasa masih sama. Dulu nak mkn hari2 ok je. Skrg nk mkn tunggu betul2 rasa nk mkn baru dtg. Kan best kalau ada special rate utk org Kg.Baru. ??
English Review: The prices have soared, but the taste remains the same. In the past, eating it every day was fine. Now, I wait until I really crave it to come. It would be nice if there were special rates for Kg. Baru residents. ??

Review: Best Nasi lemak in KL. Has overtaken Nasi lemak international that is next door. Should try their sotong and beef. You need to ask for more rice which they charge extra. Our office buys this in 80 packs for our staff meeting. They will deliver to your office even in the evening . Somehow it taste better in a packet which users banana leaf . Must be the blend of aroma with the banana leaf with the sambal . Must try if you are nearby
English Review: Best Nasi lemak in KL. Has overtaken Nasi lemak international that is next door. Should try their sotong and beef. You need to ask for more rice which they charge extra. Our office buys this in 80 packs for our staff meeting. They will deliver to your office even in the evening. Somehow it tastes better in a packet that uses banana leaf. Must be the blend of aroma with the banana leaf with the sambal. Must try if you are nearby

Review: Love the rice in the nasi lemak, probably the most fragrant I had. However, the rest of the stuff is probably average at best. Prices aren't that cheap, but then that's to be expected in the middle of KL. Keep your expectations reasonable on the store hygiene and you'll be alright here. Else, if you're willing to travel then Village Park is a better option.
English Review: Love the rice in the nasi lemak, probably the most fragrant I had. However, the rest of the stuff is probably average at best. Prices aren't that cheap, but then that's to be expected in the middle of KL. Keep your expectations reasonable on the store hygiene and you'll be alright here. Else, if you're willing to travel then Village Park is a better option.

Review: Packed but fast service.Affordable price, and tastes good.Heavy traffic on the way to here. For me, it is one off visit
English Review: Packed but fast service.Affordable price, and tastes good.Heavy traffic on the way to here. For me, it is one off visit

Review: In my opinion both this place and its neighbor Nasi Lemak International are over hyped. They are average at best. It’s ironic, the Lemak is missing from the Nasi Lemak. Both sambals are competent enough though. If I have to choose, the
English Review: In my opinion, both this place and its neighbor, Nasi Lemak International, are overhyped. They are average at best. It's ironicthe 'Lemak' is missing from the Nasi Lemak. Both sambals are competent enough though

Review: Nasi lemak dan pilihan lauk lain terlebih manis... Rasenye kalu g hri2 boleh kena diabetes ??.. Overall ok lahh!!
English Review: The nasi lemak and other side dish options are overly sweet. It feels like if you go every day, you might get diabetes. Overall, it's okay.

Review: Always heard about Wanjo from my nephews.Hence it was a must for me to also try out their Nasi Lemak.Dang ! My NLemak Ayam Goreng & Sambal Sotong was fabulously delicious.
English Review: Always heard about Wanjo from my nephews.Hence it was a must for me to also try out their Nasi Lemak. My Nasi Lemak Ayam Goreng & Sambal Sotong was fabulously delicious.

Review: Sweet nasi lemak. Spicy level is the tourist level. Sweet and not spicy at all. Chickens are on the hard side, not tender.
English Review: Sweet nasi lemak. Spicy level is the tourist level. Sweet and not spicy at all. Chickens are on the hard side, not tender.

Review: Nasi lemak is good. Nasi is sebutir sebutir because it is kukus-ed. Sambal is not the best I've had. Paru is not that good. Rendang is good. Service is good. Parking can be found easily at RM5. But I had high hope for this nasi lemak because of the rave reviews.
English Review: Nasi lemak is good. The rice is clumped together because it's steamed. The sambal is not the best I've had. The lung is not that good. The rendang is good. Service is good. Parking can be found easily at RM5. But I had high hopes for this nasi lemak because of the rave reviews.

Review: This place have been around a very long time in iconic Kampong Bahru. This is only the second time I am tasting the nasi lemak with the choosing of your own favourite lauk, be it with meat, cuttlefish, chicken, or limpa( don't know what's its called in English). My opinion the best nasi lemak in town. Will for sure go again when the cravings gets to me!.
English Review: This place has been around for a very long time in the iconic Kampong Bahru. This is only the second time I am tasting the nasi lemak with the option to choose your own favorite side dishes, be it with meat, cuttlefish, chicken, or lung (don't know what it's called in English). In my opinion, it's the best nasi lemak in town. I will for sure go again when the cravings hit me!

Review: Nasi tak banyak sgt kena tambah nasi hehehehe rendang ayam sedap tapi sejuk
English Review: The rice is not much; you need to add more rice, hehehe. The chicken rendang is delicious but it's cold.

Review: I've tried nasi lemak here and there in Malaysia and this one is so far the yummiest of all despite its moderate prices. The spicy beef with coconut sauce is the second best next to Rendang. The owner has been very hospitable too and the staff is efficient. Next time I'm in KL again, I'll definitely go there again for the food.
English Review: I've tried nasi lemak here and there in Malaysia, and this one is by far the yummiest of all, despite its moderate prices. The spicy beef with coconut sauce is the second-best, next to rendang. The owner has been very hospitable, and the staff is efficient. The next time I'm in KL again, I'll definitely go there again for the food.

Review: Mahal nk mampus..org KL mmg benak kot byr mahal2 lps tu ckp sedap..ye la da byr mahal takkan nk kata tak sedap pulak
English Review: Expensive to the point of death... People in KL must be crazy to pay such high prices and then say it's delicious. Well, of course, after paying so much, who would admit it's not delicious.

Review: Very good nasi lemak, eventough many cat in there but it really amazing food
English Review: Very good nasi lemak, eventhough many cat in there but it really amazing food

Review: Had nasi lemak at the shop in the evening. The nasi was nice but not as flavourful as I hoped. The dishes were cold and limited. However, the staff were friendly and service was good. I will suggest maybe going in the morning or early afternoon will probably be better.
English Review: Had nasi lemak at the shop in the evening. The rice was nice but not as flavourful as I hoped. The dishes were cold and limited. However, the staff was friendly and service was good. I will suggest maybe going in the morning or early afternoon will probably be better.

Review: Set in the heart of Kampung Baru, I feel this Nasi Lemak over shadows the more famously known Antarabangsa. The crowd justifies this. The rice is fluffy top with sambal which is slightly sweet for my liking. Rendang chicken, fried chicken and sambal chicken is decent. Good and systematic service for eat it or take out.
English Review: Set in the heart of Kampung Baru, I feel this Nasi Lemak over shadows the more famously known Antarabangsa. The crowd justifies this. The rice is fluffy top with sambal which is slightly sweet for my liking. Rendang chicken, fried chicken and sambal chicken is decent. Good and systematic service for eat it or take out.

Review: Very nice nasi lemak..good taste also...can go there again....yum2
English Review: Very nice nasi lemak..good taste also...can go there again....yum2

Review: So far one of the best ones I’ve tried. Tasty sambal, juicy chicken, good service and surprisingly pretty clean because cleanliness is not something you normally encounter in Kampung Baru or most gerai in general. I take away one star because they’re not that generous with sambal and rice.
English Review: So far one of the best ones I've tried. Tasty sambal, juicy chicken, good service and surprisingly pretty clean because cleanliness is not something you normally encounter in Kampung Baru or most restaurants in general. I take away one star because they're not that generous with sambal and rice.

Review: You want the best nasi lemak in KL area? This is the place.
English Review: You want the best nasi lemak in KL area? This is the place.

Review: Love the food. The sambal its not spicy can be eat who want to try for the first time. Its better to eat while the food still hot. Will repeat again for sambal kerang??
English Review: Love the food. The sambal its not spicy can be eat who want to try for the first time. Its better to eat while the food still hot. Will repeat again for sambal kerang

Review: Good space for dine in... Clean & fresh
English Review: Good space for dine in... Clean & fresh

Review: I can tell you something..It's not that tasty nor that yummy..No parking space for cars too..
English Review: I can tell you something..It's not that tasty nor that yummy..No parking space for cars too..

Review: Rasanya indah khabar dari rupa. Harga memang
English Review: The taste is far from the appearance. The price is indeed expensive.

Review: Best nasi lemak in town. The rice has just enough coconut milk inside it and the sambal taste so good you'll want to ask for extra. Can't give 5 stars because a bit pricey for a nasi lemak.
English Review: Best nasi lemak in town. The rice has just enough coconut milk inside it and the sambal taste so good you'll want to ask for extra. Can't give 5 stars because a bit pricey for a nasi lemak.

Review: rasa sedap tapi untuk rm4 nasi lemak biasa, nasi dia sikit. lain semua okay, nasi je sikit. next time kalau pergi mungkin saya beli 2 nasi ahahahah.
English Review: The taste is good, but for RM4 for a regular nasi lemak, the portion of rice is small. Everything else is okay, just the rice is a bit lacking. Next time, if I go, maybe I'll buy two portions of rice, hahaha.

Review: The ayam sambal i think almost going to spoil
English Review: The ayam sambal i think almost going to spoil

Review: Rude staff manning the nasi lemak & drinks counter! The lady at the nasi lemak counter didn't bother asking me which part of the chicken that I wanted. She was making faces when I told her that I wanted a different part of the chicken than the one given!
English Review: Rude staff manning the nasi lemak & drinks counter! The lady at the nasi lemak counter didn't bother asking me which part of the chicken that I wanted. She was making faces when I told her that I wanted a different part of the chicken than the one given!

Review: good atmosphere, good food, but the rice portion is a bit small, so if come here with hungry stomach, make sure u tell them to put more rice for u. the price is ok for KL
English Review: good atmosphere, good food, but the rice portion is a bit small, so if come here with hungry stomach, make sure you tell them to put more rice for you. the price is ok for KL

Review: Nice local place and very cheap. The nasi lemak tasted amazing!
English Review: Nice local place and very cheap. The nasi lemak tasted amazing!

Review: Tempat best untuk makan/beli nasi lemak.Memang favorite port untuk keluarga dan rakan-rakan
English Review: The best place to eat/buy nasi lemak.

Review: Sedap.kedai dibuka seawal jam 7 pagi.bagi penggemar nasi lemak,pastikan anda merasai nasi lemak Wan Jo kampung baru.
English Review: Delicious food. The store is open as early as 7am.

Review: Great food and systematic to get food. 1 Lane for dine-in, and 1 lane just for takeaways. Long queue but very fast serving. Varieties of dishes to go with nasi lemak. I like the rendang limpa
English Review: Great food and systematic to get food. 1 Lane for dine-in, and 1 lane just for takeaways. Long queue but very fast serving. Varieties of dishes to go with nasi lemak. I like the rendang limpa

Review: One of the best if not the best nasi lemak i have tasted. Its at a different level from other nasi lemaks i have tasted. Will look forward to having it each time when in KL
English Review: One of the best, if not the best, nasi lemak I have tasted. It's at a different level from other nasi lemaks I have tried. I will look forward to having it each time when in KL.

Review: kebetulan nama aku pon wanjo.. jadi memang terbaik nasi lemak kat sini.. padu.
English Review: Coincidentally, my name is Wanjo too, so the nasi lemak here is indeed the best. Excellent.

Review: Datang jauh nak cuba makan nasi lemak wanjo, tapi datang datang je tengok 80% pekerja mask letak kat dagu. Baik tak payah pakai mask kalau mcm tu. kes covid tak turun lagi, kenapa sebegitu ringan ambik mudah SOP
English Review: Came from afar to try Nasi Lemak Wanjo, but upon arrival, noticed that 80% of the staff had their masks below their chins. It's better not to wear masks at all if that's the case. The COVID cases haven't decreased yet, why take SOP so lightly.

Review: Nasi lemak tk di nafikan sedap..tpi yg paling frust q utk take away slow nak mampos..yg dine in lagi laju kot.. dri kul 8-8.45 anggarran dlm 10 org di depan masih tk settle pelik jugak..lebih baik dine jer tpi tmpt pack pulak..
English Review: The deliciousness of the nasi lemak cannot be denied, but the most frustrating thing is the incredibly slow service for takeaways. Dining in is faster, from 8 to 8:45, the service for around 10 people in front still hasn't been settled, it's strange. It's better to just dine in but the packing area is also slow.

Review: Great tasting Nasi lemak. This is a popular place. They just started serving in the evening too to complement their morning hours. Their extra topping choices like rendang and chicken and cockles are delicious. Two thumbs up!!
English Review: Great tasting Nasi lemak. This is a popular place. They just started serving in the evening too to complement their morning hours. Their extra topping choices like rendang and chicken and cockles are delicious. Two thumbs up!!

Review: Okay Nasi lemak place. It has awesomely good fried chicken though! Couple that with freshly fried egg, we have ourselves a winner. While at that, the front of the shop also has a blended fruit drink stall which is also good. Tempe here is so so.
English Review: Okay nasi lemak place. It has awesomely good fried chicken, though! Couple that with a freshly fried egg, we have ourselves a winner. While at that, the front of the shop also has a blended fruit drink stall which is also good. Tempe here is so-so.

Review: Berbaloi. Antara nasi lemak yang tersedap di Kuala Lumpur. Harga di sini amat berpatutan dan servis di sini juga pantas sekali. Amat recommend bagi sesiapa yang datang singgah ke Kampung Baru.
English Review: Worth it. Among the most delicious nasi lemak in Kuala Lumpur. The price here is very reasonable, and the service is also very fast. Highly recommended for anyone who stops by Kampung Baru.

Review: Great nasi lemak ! Delicious sambal and rendang. A lot of food choices, good for nasi lemak lover. The environment is lively and nice, the restaurant are clean. The service is great and very friendly. Nice. Suitable to come with family and colleagues. The problem is the parking is limited
English Review: Great nasi lemak ! Delicious sambal and rendang. A lot of food choices, good for nasi lemak lover. The environment is lively and nice, the restaurant are clean. The service is great and very friendly. Nice. Suitable to come with family and colleagues. The problem is the parking is limited

Review: Simply Superb & Amazing tasty Nasi Lemak.!!
English Review: Simply Superb & Amazing tasty Nasi Lemak.!!

Review: Nice place to dine-in when it not on peek hours.
English Review: Nice place to dine-in when it not on peak hours.

Review: Little bit to busy, but I really like lthe Nasi lemak
English Review: Little bit to busy, but I really like lthe Nasi lemak

Review: I think this place overrated.. the taste.. so-so.. sedap la jg.. the price standard kl price la.. theres a lot stall serve delicious nasi lemak with cheapers price.. but if u want to dine in with children this is the right place for you.. they follow SOP and the place is spacious..
English Review: I think this place is overrated. The taste is normal, it's good but not exceptional. The price is standard KL price. Many stalls serve delicious nasi lemak at a cheaper price. However, if you want to dine in with children, this is the right place for you. They follow SOP, and the place is spacious.

Review: Nasi lemak was just ok, not bad but overrated. My sambal sotong masih hanyir. But very comfortable and convenient place for family outing.
English Review: Nasi lemak was just okay, not bad but overrated. My sambal sotong still had a fishy smell. However, it's a very comfortable and convenient place for a family outing.

Review: The food no quality at all..rice potion too little
English Review: The food no quality at all..rice portion too little

Review: Servis & sistem okay sebab dia asing line bungkus dan dine-in. Meja pun banyak. Banyak pilihan lauk. Tempat bersih. Cuma sambal manis sikit.
English Review: The service and system are okay because they separate the lines for takeaway and dine-in. There are plenty of tables. Many choices for side dishes. The place is clean. Just the sambal is a bit sweet.

Review: My favorite place to have Nasi Lemak in KL!!Food is delicious and prices very fair.Also love the smothies
English Review: My favorite place to have Nasi Lemak in KL!!Food is delicious and prices very fair.Also love the smothies

Review: Great authentic food at reasonable prices and clean
English Review: Great authentic food at reasonable prices and clean

Review: Come before 6.40am if you don't want to que.Parking: Best to use LRT if you're coming for lunch
English Review: Come before 6.40am if you don't want to que.Parking: Best to use LRT if you're coming for lunch

Reviewer: Yatie Cha aka Kakyatt Lekir Sitiawan
Review: Nice place to hang out. Love the fruit juice smoothies, affordable and delicious.
English Review: Nice place to hang out. Love the fruit juice smoothies, affordable and delicious.

Review: Nasi lemak biasa ajerr tapi harga kayangan. boleh la pergi kalau takde pilihan lain sangat.
English Review: Just an ordinary nasi lemak but with a premium price. You can go if there are not many other options available.

Review: nasi lemak memang sedap. Ayam goreng pun rangup. Servis pun cepat. Cuma nak cari parking...azab nya.
English Review: Nasi lemak is delicious.The fried chicken is crunchy.The service is fast.Just to find parking ... the torment.

Review: Nasi lemak dia memang purely rasa nasi lemak..rasa bau pandannya..sambal terbaik..customer service pun terbaik..siap bg free vitagen lg untuk budak2..jus buah murah dan terbaikk, rm5 ja..
English Review: Their nasi lemak has a pure nasi lemak taste, with the fragrance of pandan. The sambal is the best. Customer service is also excellent, they even provide free Vitagen for kids. The fruit juice is cheap and excellent, only RM5.

Review: Very helpful staff make it easy to get an outstanding meal very quickly.Canteen style service and dining. Spotlessly clean.Very tasty chicken curry with all the trimmings and rice. Excellent.
English Review: Very helpful staff make it easy to get an outstanding meal very quickly.Canteen style service and dining. Spotlessly clean.Very tasty chicken curry with all the trimmings and rice. Excellent.

Review: Beratur pepagi buta nak makan nasi lemak sini. Service laju.banyak pilihan sambal dan lauk. Jemput datang makan.
English Review: Queueing early in the morning to eat nasi lemak here. Fast service. Many choices of sambal and side dishes. You're welcome to come and eat.

Review: Rasa biasa je..Sambal x pedas.Nk mkn pagi2 xda bnyk sngt org dlm jam 8pagi. Tpi parking.. Sendiri mau cari. Nk msuk dlm tu jem
English Review: The taste is just average. The sambal is not spicy. If you want to eat in the morning, there aren't too many people around 8 AM. However, parking is self-managed, and entering the place can be congested.

Review: I’m nasi lemak sambal sotong die hard fan and normally I give rating from all aspects. 1stly the sambal was bad, cili tak cukup masak. 2nd, sambal sotong also the same thing even worst package with rubbery feel. Bilis was from low grade
English Review: I'm a hardcore fan of nasi lemak with sambal sotong, and usually, I rate it based on all aspects. Firstly, the sambal was bad; the chili was not well-cooked. Secondly, the sambal sotong was also the same, even worse, packaged with a rubbery feel. The anchovies were of low grade.

Review: Good experience to eat here
English Review: Good experience to eat here

Review: Makanan semua memang sedap..harga agak keras sikit..Tapi berbaloi la..Lemak Santan nasi tu memang terasa..
English Review: All the food is delicious, and the prices are a bit steep, but it's worth it. The coconut milk richness in the rice is really noticeable.

Review: The food was okay, my opinion the price need to reduce a bit. Even want to eat inside aircond place also need to charge RM1 per person.
English Review: The food was okay, my opinion the price need to reduce a bit. Even want to eat inside aircond place also need to charge RM1 per person.

Review: The only word i can describe, the nasi lemak and lots of varities can be choose from is "Power!". Love the sambal!!
English Review: The only word I can describe, the nasi lemak and lots of varieties can be chosen from is great. Love the sambal!!

Review: I came at 4pm. The chicken and beef-lung is not warm, a bit cold. I dont know what is the red chili sauce called but it's the soul of the dish. It's really good, sweet and a little spicy. I deep everything with that sauce and it tastes like heaven! Overall it costs RM 12.2 included ice milk tea. A bit pricey compared to others but still an appropriate price. Definitely come back here in the morning so that I can try warmer/ hot foods.
English Review: I came at 4pm. The chicken and beef-lung is not warm, a bit cold. I dont know what is the red chili sauce called but it's the soul of the dish. It's really good, sweet and a little spicy. I deep everything with that sauce and it tastes like heaven! Overall it costs RM 12.2 included ice milk tea. A bit pricey compared to others but still an appropriate price. Definitely come back here in the morning so that I can try warmer/ hot foods.

Review: So delicious!
English Review: Food is so delicious!

Review: the nasi lemak is soo good!! the sambal is not too spicy, just nice, the rice is so fragrant, the nut and the anchovies is very crunchy!! delicious and very cheap!! will come again!!
English Review: the nasi lemak is soo good!! the sambal is not too spicy, just nice, the rice is so fragrant, the nut and the anchovies is very crunchy!! delicious and very cheap!! will come again!!

Review: Makanan sedap...cuma ada certain staff yg muka kerek...menyombong..minta tambah lauk & kuah buat muka...geleng² kepala...
English Review: The food is delicious... It's just that there are certain staff members with a stern and arrogant expression... When asked for extra side dishes and gravy, they make a face and shake their heads.

Review: If you like your nasi lemak 'sebutir-sebutir'. The sambal is nice but on the sweet side.. The telur goreng is fully cooked, not runny.
English Review: If you like your nasi lemak with 'sebutir-sebutir' rice, then come here. The sambal is nice but on the sweet side. The fried egg is fully cooked, not runny.

Review: Actually I ate at a restaurant near this one yesterday. But the last time I am here the nasi lemak was ok. Lot of options for lauk. And to be honest taste wise is bit better than nasi lemak antarabangsa.
English Review: Actually I ate at a restaurant near this one yesterday. But the last time I am here the nasi lemak was ok. Lot of options for side dishes. And to be honest taste wise is a bit better than nasi lemak antarabangsa.

Review: The food was good. Worth the money
English Review: The food was good. Worth the money

Review: Doesn't deserve the hype. Sambal too sweet, rice grain still a bit hard,  overpriced. Should change it to Nasi Campur. Lacking the lemak in the rice. That happens when you sacrifice quality for quantity.Would I come back again? No.Will I recommend to my friends? Never.
English Review: Doesn't deserve the hype. Sambal too sweet, rice grain still a bit hard,  overpriced. Should change it to Nasi Campur. Lacking the lemak in the rice. That happens when you sacrifice quality for quantity.Would I come back again? No.Will I recommend to my friends? Never.

Review: Sebagai tempat nasi lemak, nasi lemaknya boleh tahan. Sedap. Pekerja semua cekap bila tempat sedang sibuk. Mahal itu biasalah, kolumpo. Tapi saiz hidangan kecil berbanding kedai-kedai nasi lemak lain di kawasan Kg. Baru.
English Review: As a place for nasi lemak, its nasi lemak is quite good. Delicious. The staff is efficient when the place is busy. It's expensive, but that's usual, considering it's Kuala Lumpur. However, the portion size is small compared to other nasi lemak stalls in the Kg. Baru area.

Review: No parking here, you park elsewhere then come walking here.Nasi lemak average
English Review: No parking here, you park elsewhere then come walking here.Nasi lemak biasa2 jer

Review: nasi lemak is quite pricey, the sambal is bitter, you could get a better nasi lemak from other warung
English Review: nasi lemak is quite pricey, the sambal is bitter, you could get a better nasi lemak from other warung

Review: Expensive. Nasi lemak ayam biasa orang jual 5.50 je. Makan dua orang pun setakat lauk ayam nak dekat 20. Ko raseee?? Not satisfied. First n last datang. Nasi lemak cinta sayang, nasi lemak city garden is recommended.
English Review: Expensive. Ordinary chicken nasi lemak is usually sold for only 5.50. Eating for two people, with chicken as the main dish, costs nearly 20. What do you think? Not satisfied. This is my first and last visit. Nasi lemak Cinta Sayang and Nasi Lemak City Garden are recommended.

Review: If you are fan of Nasi Lemak, don't ever come here. It's the worst food ever. Too pricey, very small portion and horrible taste. The way they served food was very bad
English Review: If you are fan of Nasi Lemak, don't ever come here. It's the worst food ever. Too pricey, very small portion and horrible taste. The way they served food was very bad

Review: Yang menggunakan kenderaan untuk datang makan di kedai ini, lebih baik letak di tempat letak kereta berbayar.. tak perlu berharap sangat dapat tempat letak kereta berhampiran dan percuma.. laluan utama dan sentiasa sesak.. harga berpatutan.. makanan baik dan puashati..
English Review: Those using vehicles to come eat at this shop, it's better to park in the paid parking area. Don't expect to find parking nearby for free; the main road is always congested. The prices are reasonable, and the food is good and satisfying.

Review: Meja banyak selesa mkn walaupun ramai org .
English Review: The table is a lot of comfort even though many people.

Review: Definitely worth a revisit given the new, clean and spacious premise and excellent menu to go along with the ever aromatic nasi lemak at very competitive costs.
English Review: Definitely worth a revisit given the new, clean and spacious premise and excellent menu to go along with the ever aromatic nasi lemak at very competitive costs.

Review: Must try...best nasi lemak in town
English Review: Must try...best nasi lemak in town

Review: Good but not extraordinary. The quantity of rice is small and the sambal is extra sweet
English Review: Good but not extraordinary. The quantity of rice is small and the sambal is extra sweet

Review: Not as great as the sambal buzzed to be. Unless you really craved for Nasi Lemak & it's piping hot would the experience be worthwhile. Still better than most served at small eateries.
English Review: Not as great as the sambal buzzed to be. Unless you really craved for Nasi Lemak & it's piping hot would the experience be worthwhile. Still better than most served at small eateries.

Review: Takde 4.57??, sedap nasinyer dan kawasan bersih, resit ja takda, kalau tak dah bagi full 5
English Review: No 4.57??, the rice is delicious, and the area is clean. Only issue is no receipt, otherwise would have given a full 5.

Review: Sedap nasi lemak dia. Brp Kali dah ulang ni. Mmg best
English Review: The nasi lemak is delicious. How many times have I repeated this? Really good.

Review: Famous with foreigners/tourist. Maybe because their sambal is not spicy. It was too sweet for me tho. Price is ok, not cheap but not expensive either. Got a nasi lemak with extra rice & a chicken rendang(1/4) for RM9.(attached photo)
English Review: Famous with foreigners/tourists, perhaps because their sambal is not spicy. However, it was too sweet for me. The price is okay, not cheap but not expensive either. I got nasi lemak with extra rice and a quarter chicken rendang for RM9. (attached photo)

Review: Decent nasi lemak. Boleh di kenal kan kpd pelancong. ?? Opposite kedai ni ada parking best.
English Review: Decent nasi lemak. Can be recommended to tourists. Opposite this shop, there is good parking.

Review: Nasi lemak yang amat sedap. Cuma yg x berapa best ialah jalan jem nak masuk sini. Parking pun susah. Apapun berbaloi datang. Kedai pun dh moden dan bersih. Boleh la rekomen kawan-kawan.
English Review: Extremely delicious nasi lemak. The only drawback is the congested road to enter here. Parking is also challenging. Nevertheless, it's worth coming. The shop is modern and clean. Can recommend to friends.

Review: To me this is one of KL's best nasi lemak place. I know there are plenty but l love the choices that are offered here and the sambal is done just the way i like it.... A bit sweet but not too hot.. Just plain yummy
English Review: To me this is one of KL's best nasi lemak place. I know there are plenty but l love the choices that are offered here and the sambal is done just the way i like it.... A bit sweet but not too hot.. Just plain yummy

Review: Wasnt as good as the hype. A normal plate of Nasi Lemak with little portion of rice. But still unsure why there are so many people here
English Review: Wasn't as good as the hype. A normal plate of Nasi Lemak with little portion of rice. But still unsure why there are so many people here

Review: Came here for breakfast for the Nasi Lemak and was not disappointed. Delicious!
English Review: Came here for breakfast for the Nasi Lemak and was not disappointed. Delicious!

Review: It serves the usual nasi lemak with add on,  like fried chicken, sambal shackles or squids, and even rendang chicken or beef.  Very very common.My opinion of its food is acceptable but nothing spectacular.
English Review: It serves the usual nasi lemak with add on,  like fried chicken, sambal shackles or squids, and even rendang chicken or beef.  Very very common.My opinion of its food is acceptable but nothing spectacular.

Review: Nasi lemak sedap di kampung baru .
English Review: Delicious nasi lemak in Kg Baru.

Review: One of the more cleaner stores in kampung baru.Sambal is great . Rice can be a little inconsistent but still good
English Review: One of the cleaner stores in Kampung Baru. The sambal is great. The rice can be a little inconsistent but is still good.

Review: Nasi lemak sini biasa2 saja. Popular sebab diviralkan saja. Apapun lauknya pelbagai dan agak menarik
English Review: The nasi lemak here is just average. It's popular because it has been viral. However, the side dishes are diverse and somewhat interesting.

Review: Great place for some authentic nasi lemak. Very fluffy santan rice with sambal that is not too overpowering. It's not terribly spicy and slightly on the sweet side, which may be an acquired taste for some locals who want sambal that can pack a punch in the gut and bowels.
English Review: Great place for some authentic nasi lemak. Very fluffy santan rice with sambal that is not too overpowering. It's not terribly spicy and slightly on the sweet side, which may be an acquired taste for some locals who want sambal that can pack a punch in the gut and bowels.

Review: mediocre nasi lemak stall but have a variety of other lauk eg. kerang, paru-paru
English Review: Mediocre Nasi Lemak Stall has a variety of other side dishes.shellfish, lungs

Review: One of the best Nasi Lemak out there.
English Review: One of the best Nasi Lemak out there.

Review: Nasi Lemak is tasty, rice itself rich with flavor and the sambal is the star of the show. Sambal kerang is alright, I prefer sambal sotong more. A little expensive for a Nasi Lemak but I guess that's the standard these days especially at that area. Seatings are proper and spacious; and better lit. Parking at this area is always a problem, so there's nothing to say about it.
English Review: Nasi Lemak is tasty, rice itself rich with flavor and the sambal is the star of the show. Sambal kerang is alright, I prefer sambal sotong more. A little expensive for a Nasi Lemak but I guess that's the standard these days especially at that area. Seatings are proper and spacious; and better lit. Parking at this area is always a problem, so there's nothing to say about it.

Review: Worth trying out their food (only nasi lemak served here)... sweet n spicy.. the price for nasi lemak sotong is RM 8... Spacious seating area.. buat parking is a bit limited.
English Review: Worth trying out their food (only nasi lemak served here)... sweet and spicy.. the price for nasi lemak sotong is RM 8... Spacious seating area.. buat parking is a bit limited.

Review: Although there is usually a queue, it's moving quite fast as they have many staffs to assist you. Only problem is the number of seats so typically people shouldn't be taking their own sweet time and should just move once they're done eating
English Review: Although there is usually a queue, it's moving quite fast as they have many staffs to assist you. Only problem is the number of seats so typically people shouldn't be taking their own sweet time and should just move once they're done eating

Review: Overrated. Sambal tastes too strong and sweet. Doesn't look or taste like freshly ground chili. Tastes more like it's made using chilli boh. Pricey too. RM8 for a plate with egg and fried chicken. Fried chicken tasted quite nice. Will I crave for this nasi lemak? Definitely not! Have tasted much better nasi lemak sold by the roadsides in the morning. Need to factor in the parking charges too: RM5 per entry. Drinks are not freshly made, pre-made: milo ais, kopi ais, teh ais. Overall, DISAPPOINTED! 4/10 Max!
English Review: Overrated. Sambal tastes too strong and sweet. Doesn't look or taste like freshly ground chili. Tastes more like it's made using chilli boh. Pricey too. RM8 for a plate with egg and fried chicken. Fried chicken tasted quite nice. Will I crave for this nasi lemak? Definitely not! Have tasted much better nasi lemak sold by the roadsides in the morning. Need to factor in the parking charges too: RM5 per entry. Drinks are not freshly made, pre-made: milo ais, kopi ais, teh ais. Overall, DISAPPOINTED! 4/10 Max!

Review: This is kind of too overrated compared with other stalls. Let me start off from pricing, 4 ringgit for a basic nasi lemak including rice, cucumber, egg and sambal is too overpriced and yet it only gives such a less amount of it. The pricing for add ons are reasonable.
English Review: This is kind of too overrated compared with other stalls. Let me start off from pricing, 4 ringgit for a basic nasi lemak including rice, cucumber, egg and sambal is too overpriced and yet it only gives such a less amount of it. The pricing for add ons are reasonable.

English Review: This place is great. Nasi lemak with liver. The vibe is just amazing. Must go again when in KL. A definite must!

Review: Use to be really good but lately the food is just OK. Service is OK and sitting area is spacious though it can be quite crowded.

Review: Tempatnya bersih dan luas meskipun kalau datang siang hari terasa panas dan cukup gerah didalamnya. Dari segi rasa tidak berbeda jauh dg nasi lemak lain di Selangor dan KL tapi dg harga diatas rata rata. Sambel nasi lemaknya aliran manis. Tersedia baby chair.
English Review: The place is clean and spacious, although it feels hot and quite stuffy inside when you come during the daytime. In terms of taste, it's not much different from other nasi lemak in Selangor and KL, but the price is above average. The sambal for the nasi lemak has a sweet flow. Baby chairs are available.

Review: Just had to come back here for authentic nasi lemak and most importantly for their fresh fruit smoothies! Mango Smoothie here is the best so far in KL!  Sorry! No photo, too excited to eat! HahahaVegetarian options: Not much except for just fried egg, cucumber and begedel (potato pancake). I don't eat meat either but I tasted  the gravy only for both Ayam Masak Merah and Daging Rendang - very flavourful.Parking: There is a residential unit just across the small street at  Wanjo that operates a small car park within their premise. Very reasonable price!
English Review: Just had to come back here for authentic nasi lemak and most importantly for their fresh fruit smoothies! Mango Smoothie here is the best so far in KL!  Sorry! No photo, too excited to eat! HahahaVegetarian options: Not much except for just fried egg, cucumber and begedel (potato pancake). I don't eat meat either but I tasted  the gravy only for both Ayam Masak Merah and Daging Rendang - very flavourful.Parking: There is a residential unit just across the small street at  Wanjo that operates a small car park within their premise. Very reasonable price!

Review: When i looking for dinner place, i ordered grab to another nasi lemak restaurant. And the grab driver recommend Nasi Lemak Wanjo Kampung Bharu. Their staff so nicely welcoming us and give us recommendation menu. The foods was so good and i fall in love with the taste, the rice, sotong, ayam, etc. I love them all, when i go back to hotel i ordered again for take away.
English Review: When i looking for dinner place, i ordered grab to another nasi lemak restaurant. And the grab driver recommend Nasi Lemak Wanjo Kampung Bharu. Their staff so nicely welcoming us and give us recommendation menu. The foods was so good and i fall in love with the taste, the rice, sotong, ayam, etc. I love them all, when i went back to the hotel i ordered again for takeaway.

Review: Okey la sambal nye kurang pedas,layanan tiptop
English Review: Okey la sambal nye less spicy, TipTop service

Review: Nasi lemak sedap.
English Review: Nasi lemak is delicious.

Review: We had nasi lamak with 2 different types of chicken and beef randang, food was really fresh and.very tasty, simple yet delicious food at very reasonable price .great customer service with a smile.deffo worth a visit, you will not be disappointed.
English Review: We had nasi lemak with 2 different types of chicken and beef rendang, The food was fresh and very tasty, simple yet delicious food at a very reasonable price. great customer service with a smile. definitely worth a visit, you will not be disappointed.

Review: Mantap, sesuai harga... wajib cobain perkedel / bergedil bahasa orang melayu... rendang ayam, rendang daging oke...
English Review: Great, worth the price... a must-try are the Malay-style potato patties. The chicken rendang and beef rendang are good too.

Review: Mmg skali jela aku mkn sini haha.Aku bkn jenis suka buang2 mkanan so aku habiskn jela hakikatnya rasa biasa sgt. Aku harapkn wow sbb rmai review sedap haha rupanya hurmmm. Tpi 1 yg bagus kedai sentiasa bersih ini bagus.
English Review: I only ate here once, haha. I'm not the type to waste food, so I finished it, but the taste was quite ordinary. I was hoping for a "wow" factor because of many good reviews, but it turns out, hmm. But one good thing is that the shop is always clean, which is good.

Review: Nasi Lemak wanjo Mantap
English Review: Nasi lemak Wanjo is great

Review: Overrated.. Small portion rice, not full of cup.. Nasi tambah pun tak macam nasi tambah.. Nak letak nasi full kan cup, bukan kaut sikit letak je atas pinggan.. Disappointed
English Review: Overrated. Small portion of rice, not even filling the cup. The additional rice doesn't resemble extra rice; they just sprinkle a bit on the plate. Disappointed.

Review: Semua ok. Layanan pun baik. Bagus nya ada pilihan, kalau x nak bayau rm 1 utk duduk air cond, boleh duduk luar. Apa2 pun yg penting bersih ðŸ‘ðŸ» teratur âœ¨ï¸
English Review: Everything is okay. The service is good too. The good thing is there's a choice  if you don't want to pay RM 1 to sit in the air conditioning, you can sit outside. Anyway, the important thing is that it's clean and well-organized.

The beef lungs are tough, and the beef rendang is overly salty, inedible. Just wasted tens of ringgit. The nasi lemak from the auntie by the roadside is much tastier.

Review: kalau nak makan, kena order nasi tambah siap2 ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£
English Review: If you want to eat, you have to order extra rice in advance. ????

Review: Ni 1st time dpt makan kat sini selama ni x dpt g sbb setiap kali pergi xde parking.. alhamdulillah mlm td ada lah parking berdekatan.. so gagahkan jugalah.. berbaloi pergi..
English Review: This is the first time I got to eat here; all this time, I couldn't go because every time I went, there was no parking. Alhamdulillah, last night there was parking nearby, so I decided to go for it. It was worth it.

Review: Rasa nya nikmat, aneka menu makanan dan minuman dengan harga terjangkau, cuma jika ingin makan ruangan ac kena cas 1 ringgit/orang
English Review: The taste is delightful, various food and drink options at affordable prices. However, if you want to dine in the air-conditioned area, there is a charge of 1 ringgit per person.

Review: Pelayanan cepat dan bersih, jadi walaupun ramai jadinya tetep nyaman, terbuka tapi banyak kipas jadi gak gerah, untuk pilihan lauknya banyak, start from 5 RM tergantung lauknya, sambalnya pedas manis jadi bisa dinikmati, ikan terinya enak
English Review: Fast and clean service, so even though it's crowded, it's still comfortable. It's open, but there are many fans, so it's not stuffy. There are many choices for side dishes, starting from 5 RM depending on the side dish. The sambal is sweet and spicy, so it can be enjoyed, and the fried fish is delicious.

Review: Nasi SGT SEDIKIT. Xkena dgn harga. Rasa oklah. Cuma NOT WORTH IT
English Review: Very LITTLE rice. Doesn't match the price. The taste is okay. Just NOT WORTH IT.

Review: makanan yang sedap, perkhidmatan yang cepat, suasana yang baik â­â­â­â­
English Review: Delicious food, fast service, good atmosphere

Review: Cepat, sedap dan selesa.
English Review: Fast, tasty and comfortable.

Review: Actually overrated harga dia , tapi sebabkan die WANJO kan... So ramai orang tutup mata , also die kat center of KL .
English Review: Actually, it's overrated in terms of price, but because it's popular (WANJO), many people overlook it. Also, it's in the center of KL.

Review: Slow bungkus â€¦ Q panjang sebab lembab bungkusâ€¦ food ok price expensive
English Review: Slow packaging... Long queue because of the slow wrapping... Food is okay, but the prices are expensive.

Review: Ooh i love it. The taste is good. And they have free flow water too.But the juice stuff didnt really our fave things in here. The rest is awesome ðŸ’™
English Review: Ooh i love it. The taste is good. And they have free flow water too.But the juice stuff didnt really our fave things in here. The rest is awesome

Review: Kedai sangat bersih, wangi, makanan sedap.
